original: nga yis kun la khyab pa ye nas chub //
analyzed: nga yis kun la khyab pa ye nas chub //
translated: I am all-pervading, and so am timelessly and completely lucid.

original: nga yis rang bzhin gsal ba ye nas sems //
analyzed: nga yis rang bzhin gsal ba ye nas sems //
translated: I am the nature of mind, and so am timelessly and naturally lucid.

original: nga ni nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: nga ni nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: I am like space, and so am timelessly and naturally lucid.

original: ye nas yin pa'i byang chub sems kyis ni //
analyzed: ye nas yin pa'i byang chub sems kyis ni //
translated: With awakened mind, which is timelessly such,

original: 'jig rten sgyu mar snang ba'i chos bzhin du //
analyzed: 'jig rten sgyu mar snang ba'i chos bzhin du //
translated: I am like the illusory appearances of the world.

original: sku gsum ston pa dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The three kayas, the teachers, the buddhas of the three times,

original: bu dang tsha bo 'khor gyi tshul byung nas //
analyzed: bu dang tsha bo 'khor gyi tshul byung nas //
translated: appear as my sons and grandsons and retinue

original: ma nor bden pa'i gdam ngag 'bogs pa bzhin //
analyzed: ma nor bden pa'i gdam ngag 'bogs pa bzhin //
translated: and impart the unerring instructions of truth.🔽Having revealed awakened mind to be like space,

original: byang chub sems ni nam mkha' bzhin bstan nas; ;kun byed byung tshul nam mkha' bzhin du bstan //🔽ces gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni nam mkha' bzhin bstan nas; ;kun byed byung tshul nam mkha' bzhin du bstan // ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las //
translated: I reveal the source of all that arises to be like space.

original: chos thams cad byang chub sems kun byed las byung ba'i khungs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
analyzed: chos thams cad byang chub sems kun byed las byung ba'i khungs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
translated: This is the twentieth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, the tantra of awakened mind, “The Source of All Dharmas Arising from the All-Creating Awakened Mind.”

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir nyid @40b las byung ba'i tshig 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir nyid @40b las byung ba'i tshig 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, because the all-creating king, awakened mind, is the source of all phenomena, he spoke these words, which come from that very source:

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig /
translated: Ah! Listen, great and courageous one, Vajra!

original: nga ni chos rnams kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: nga ni chos rnams kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: I am the all-creating monarch of phenomena.

original: sku gsum ston pa'i pha ma nga yin la //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa'i pha ma nga yin la //
translated: I am the mother and father of the teachers of the three kayas.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin //
translated: I am the grandfather of all buddhas of the three times.

original: 'khor gnas dus kyi ston pa'i sgron ma byed //🔽kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las //
analyzed: 'khor gnas dus kyi ston pa'i sgron ma byed // kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las //
translated: I am the lamp that illuminates the teachers, retinues, abodes, and times.🔽From the three aspects of my nature as the all-creating one

original: sku gsum ston pa nga las byung bas ni //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa nga las byung bas ni //
translated: come the teachers of the three kayas,

original: sku gsum de yi bshad lugs rnam gsum gyis //
analyzed: sku gsum de yi bshad lugs rnam gsum gyis //
translated: and from them come the three ways of explaining the three kayas.

original: chos kyi bshad lugs rnam pa gsum yang bstan //
analyzed: chos kyi bshad lugs rnam pa gsum yang bstan //
translated: They also reveal three ways of explaining phenomena.

original: de yang kun byed nga yis bstan pa yin //
analyzed: de yang kun byed nga yis bstan pa yin //
translated: And all of this is revealed by me, the all-creating one.

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yis rang bzhin 'di //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yis rang bzhin 'di //
translated: This nature of me, the all-creating monarch,

original: ston pa kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ston pa kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir //
translated: is superior to all teachings.

original: gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam pa lngas //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam pa lngas //
translated: The system of explanation of the reason is fivefold.🔽

original: ma nor nges pa'i gtan tshigs khungs bstan to //
analyzed: ma nor nges pa'i gtan tshigs khungs bstan to //
translated: The unerring definitive reasoning is revealed through five topics.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
translated: awakened mind, the all-creating monarch,

original: byang chub sems ni ye nas rdzogs pa che //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni ye nas rdzogs pa che //
translated: is awakened mind, timelessly and supremely so.

original: rdzogs pa chen po rgyu 'bras 'das //🔽rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i bshad lugs bstan pa dang // kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po rgyu 'bras 'das // rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i bshad lugs bstan pa dang // kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las //
translated: The Great Perfection is beyond causality.🔽The teaching on what is beyond causality is revealed,🔽and the teaching on the nature of all-creating awakened mind

original: sku gsum ston pa byung ba'i bshad lugs dang // rnam pa gnyis kyi bshad lugs bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa byung ba'i bshad lugs dang // rnam pa gnyis kyi bshad lugs bstan pa'o //
translated: reveals the teaching on the two aspects.

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyi bshad lugs ni //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyi bshad lugs ni //
translated: The teaching on all-creating awakened mind🔽is explained through five topics

original: byang chub sems ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir //🔽gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lnga yis bshad //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir // gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lnga yis bshad //
translated: because awakened mind is beyond causality.

original: sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi bshad lugs ni /
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi bshad lugs ni /
translated: The teaching on the three teachers of the three kayas

original: @41a *// phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga nang du //
analyzed: @41a *// phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga nang du //
translated: is revealed within the fivefold excellence.

original: chos kyi sku ni byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad //
analyzed: chos kyi sku ni byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad //
translated: The dharmakaya is explained through its blessing.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bo ston //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bo ston //
translated: The sambhogakāya shows its essence.

original: sprul pa'i sku ni don rnams tshig tu sdeb //🔽sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ste //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku ni don rnams tshig tu sdeb // sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ste //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya sets forth the meaning in words.🔽These are the three ways of explaining the three kāyas.

original: nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum bshad lugs yin //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum bshad lugs yin //
translated: They are the three ways of explaining my nature.

original: kun byed nga ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa ste //
analyzed: kun byed nga ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa ste //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am beyond causes and results.

original: rgyu 'bras 'das pas spyod yul kun las 'das //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras 'das pas spyod yul kun las 'das //
translated: Since I am beyond causes and results, I transcend all objects.

original: kun las 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems //
analyzed: kun las 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems //
translated: The nature of phenomena, which transcends all, is awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying po yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying po yin //
translated: Awakened mind is the heart essence of everything.🔽Since it is the heart essence, the source is also shown to be trustworthy.

original: snying po yin pas yid ches khungs kyang bstan; ;byang chub sems ni chos kun rtsa ba ste //
analyzed: snying po yin pas yid ches khungs kyang bstan; ;byang chub sems ni chos kun rtsa ba ste //
translated: Awakened mind is the root of all phenomena.

original: rtsa ba yin pas thams cad don yang 'dus //
analyzed: rtsa ba yin pas thams cad don yang 'dus //
translated: Since it is the root, the meaning of everything is subsumed.

original: byang chub sems ni khyad par kun las 'phags //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni khyad par kun las 'phags //
translated: Awakened mind is superior to all distinctions.

original: khyad par 'phags pas theg pa'i shan yang 'byed //
analyzed: khyad par 'phags pas theg pa'i shan yang 'byed //
translated: Since it is superior, it also distinguishes the vehicles.

original: byang chub sems rtogs chos nyid kun sangs rgyas //
analyzed: byang chub sems rtogs chos nyid kun sangs rgyas //
translated: When awakened mind is realized, the nature of phenomena is awakened in all.

original: des na skal ldan dgos ched bstan pa yin //
analyzed: des na skal ldan dgos ched bstan pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is taught for the fortunate to fulfill their purpose.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin tshig tu brjod med ste; ;ma brjod sems kyi rang bzhin mi snang bas //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin tshig tu brjod med ste; ;ma brjod sems kyi rang bzhin mi snang bas //
translated: The nature of mind is inexpressible in words,🔽and without words, the nature of mind does not appear.

original: mi snang mtshon du med ces ma brjod na //
analyzed: mi snang mtshon du med ces ma brjod na //
translated: If it is said that it does not appear and cannot be characterized,

original: kun kyang rang sems ma mthong rtsol sgrub byed //
analyzed: kun kyang rang sems ma mthong rtsol sgrub byed //
translated: then all who do not see their own mind will strive to achieve it.

original: des na brjod med tshig gi don yang bshad //🔽des na gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lngas //
analyzed: des na brjod med tshig gi don yang bshad // des na gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lngas //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of inexpressibility is explained in words.

original: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems kyi don //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems kyi don //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the all-creating monarch, awakened mind,

original: ma nor nges par gtan la 'bebs par byed //
analyzed: ma nor nges par gtan la 'bebs par byed //
translated: is ascertained without error through five ways of explaining the significance of the axioms.

original: rgyu @41b 'bras med par gtan la phab pa yin //🔽thams cad byang chub sems yin yid kyang ches //
analyzed: rgyu @41b 'bras med par gtan la phab pa yin // thams cad byang chub sems yin yid kyang ches //
translated: The axiom of the absence of causality is ascertained.🔽Be confident that everything is awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems yin ye nas yid ches pas //
analyzed: byang chub sems yin ye nas yid ches pas //
translated: Be confident that everything is awakened mind from the beginning.

original: sems la btsal ba med par yid kyang ches //
analyzed: sems la btsal ba med par yid kyang ches //
translated: Be confident that there is nothing to seek in the mind.

original: btsal du ye nas med par yid ches pas //
analyzed: btsal du ye nas med par yid ches pas //
translated: Be confident that there never has been anything to seek.

original: mi rtsol bde ba chen po ngang la gnas //
analyzed: mi rtsol bde ba chen po ngang la gnas //
translated: Abide in the state of supreme bliss, which entails no effort.

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin de ltar gnas //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin de ltar gnas //
translated: The nature of me, the all-creating one, abides in this way.

original: kun byed nga la sangs rgyas gzhan med do; ;zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kun byed nga la sangs rgyas gzhan med do; ;zhes gsungs so //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am buddhahood itself, and there is no buddhahood apart from me.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This is the twenty-first chapter of The All-Creating Sovereign, Mind of Perfect Purity,

original: gtan tshigs bshad lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
translated: in which the system of explanation is given.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du gzhag pa'i phyir bya med rdzogs pa'i lung khungs chen po 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du gzhag pa'i phyir bya med rdzogs pa'i lung khungs chen po 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating sovereign, mind of perfect purity, spoke these great words of transmission, the perfection of nonaction, in order to settle mind in its natural state:🔽Kye!

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig /
translated: Heroic being, listen!

original: kye; bya med yul ni mi gnas nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: kye; bya med yul ni mi gnas nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: Kye! The domain of nonaction is like space, in which nothing abides.

original: mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam //
analyzed: mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam //
translated: It is the nonconceptual path of phenomena, in which nothing abides and nothing is reified.

original: bsngo ba'i cha shas phra mo'i yul la byung ba ste //
analyzed: bsngo ba'i cha shas phra mo'i yul la byung ba ste //
translated: It is the domain of the subtle aspects of dedication.

original: rtog sgom chos kyi sku ni khyad par don med pas //
analyzed: rtog sgom chos kyi sku ni khyad par don med pas //
translated: Since the dharmakaya, which is conceptual meditation, has no special significance,

original: rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas //
translated: naturally occurring timeless awareness, nonconceptual and all-pervasive, abides just as it is.

original: bya bral yul la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med //
analyzed: bya bral yul la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med //
translated: In the domain of nonaction, which does not abide in any specific way, there is nothing to be contrived by means of an antidote.

original: yan lag chos kyi dbang gis snying po'i yul tshol zhing //
analyzed: yan lag chos kyi dbang gis snying po'i yul tshol zhing //
translated: Seeking the domain of the heart essence through the influence of the teachings that are its branches,

original: rnam pa cir yang mi rtog thabs kyis de la rol //
analyzed: rnam pa cir yang mi rtog thabs kyis de la rol //
translated: One should play with that by the method of not conceiving any form.

original: snying po rang bzhin 'byung bas chos sku gzhan na med //
analyzed: snying po rang bzhin 'byung bas chos sku gzhan na med //
translated: Since the essence arises by nature, the dharmakāya is not elsewhere.

original: rdul phran gcig la gtses @42a *//
analyzed: rdul phran gcig la gtses @42a *//
translated: A single atom is harmed

original: shing phyogs bcu kun dang bral //
analyzed: shing phyogs bcu kun dang bral //
translated: and is free from all the ten directions.

original: mi gnas don nyid legs pa'i ye shes rang 'byung ste //
analyzed: mi gnas don nyid legs pa'i ye shes rang 'byung ste //
translated: The meaning that does not abide is the self-originated pristine consciousness of the bhagavān.

original: mngon sum kun la mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po la //
analyzed: mngon sum kun la mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po la //
translated: The vast, nonconceptual essence is directly perceived by all.

original: rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob //
analyzed: rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob //
translated: Having entered that pure path, the king of uniformity is attained.

original: mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pas chags pa'i gnas med de //
analyzed: mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pas chags pa'i gnas med de //
translated: Since there is no change or transformation, there is no place of attachment.

original: de bzhin bzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med //
analyzed: de bzhin bzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med //
translated: Likewise, there is no object to grasp and no place for the mind.

original: mngon sum thob par 'dod nas rgyu la rtag tu sgom //
analyzed: mngon sum thob par 'dod nas rgyu la rtag tu sgom //
translated: Desiring to attain the direct perception, always meditate on the cause.

original: sgom chags bde ba de la mnyam pa'i don mi 'byung //
analyzed: sgom chags bde ba de la mnyam pa'i don mi 'byung //
translated: The meaning of uniformity does not arise in that bliss of attachment to meditation.

original: sku gcig kun la khyab pas bsnan pa'i chos med de //🔽mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med //
analyzed: sku gcig kun la khyab pas bsnan pa'i chos med de // mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med //
translated: Since one kāya pervades all, there is no phenomenon to add.🔽Since there is no end, there is no decrease in the dhātu.

original: chos kyi rol pas nyams phag lhag pa'i gnas med de //
analyzed: chos kyi rol pas nyams phag lhag pa'i gnas med de //
translated: Since there is no increase in the field of the dharmakāya, there is no place of superiority.

original: rang 'byung che ba'i yul la kun tu ji bzhin gnas //
analyzed: rang 'byung che ba'i yul la kun tu ji bzhin gnas //
translated: Abides in the field of the great self-originated one just as it is.

original: ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la mthong ba'i mig /
analyzed: ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la mthong ba'i mig /
translated: The eye that sees does not see that which is a field of amazing vision.

original: gang la thos par mi rigs snyad pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: gang la thos par mi rigs snyad pa kun dang bral //
translated: It is not reasonable to hear it, and it is free from all designations.

original: chos dang chos min rtag tu 'dres shing mtshungs //
analyzed: chos dang chos min rtag tu 'dres shing mtshungs //
translated: Dharma and non-dharma are always mixed and the same.

original: don dam chos shes lhag pa'i gnas shes bshad pa'ang med //
analyzed: don dam chos shes lhag pa'i gnas shes bshad pa'ang med //
translated: There is no explanation of the dharma of the ultimate, the knowledge of the higher abodes.

original: 'khrul dang byang chub lam de rtog pas thob pa'ang med //
analyzed: 'khrul dang byang chub lam de rtog pas thob pa'ang med //
translated: There is no attainment of the path of delusion and awakening through concepts.

original: rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' dang bral //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' dang bral //
translated: Self-originated pristine consciousness itself is free from the extremes of words.

original: yi  nas rgyal ba'i bdag nyid mngon sum gnas pa la //
analyzed: yi  nas rgyal ba'i bdag nyid mngon sum gnas pa la //
translated: After that, the nature of the Victor is present in a direct perception.

original: grib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin de la rtog pa 'byung //
analyzed: grib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin de la rtog pa 'byung //
translated: A concept arises in that one, like the example of a shadow and a form.🔽It is not nonexistent, but it is not nonexistent. The essence of nonexistence arises.

original: med de med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po @42b 'byung; ;stong de stong pa ma yin stong pa'i yul la gnas //
analyzed: med de med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po @42b 'byung; ;stong de stong pa ma yin stong pa'i yul la gnas //
translated: It is empty, but it is not empty. It abides in the field of emptiness.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'byung ba'i dran pa skye //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'byung ba'i dran pa skye //
translated: The memory of the elements arises in that one, the nature of space.

original: bya bral zin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa med pas len //
analyzed: bya bral zin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa med pas len //
translated: The bliss of being free from activity is taken up without desire.

original: bza' ba'i yul med de la ye shes 'byung ba rtsom //
analyzed: bza' ba'i yul med de la ye shes 'byung ba rtsom //
translated: In that there is no object to be eaten, the arising of pristine consciousness is begun.

original: sngon gyi drang srong rjes su chags pa'i yid kyang 'jog /
analyzed: sngon gyi drang srong rjes su chags pa'i yid kyang 'jog /
translated: The mind that is attached to the past ṛṣis is also placed.

original: rnam rtsol 'bad pa'i gdung bas kun tu zin ta re //
analyzed: rnam rtsol 'bad pa'i gdung bas kun tu zin ta re //
translated: Alas! It is seized by the torment of striving and exertion.

original: rang bzhin lam der zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
analyzed: rang bzhin lam der zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
translated: By entering the path of the natural state, omniscience

original: ji bzhin pa zhes rnam rtog de phyir rtog bsgom pa //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa zhes rnam rtog de phyir rtog bsgom pa //
translated: is not attained. The pristine consciousness of the buddhas🔽is not attained by the path of the mind.🔽The pristine consciousness of the buddhas🔽is not attained by the path of the mind.

original: bde ba chen po 'dod pas chags pa'i nad yin te //
analyzed: bde ba chen po 'dod pas chags pa'i nad yin te //
translated: The one who desires great bliss is the sickness of desire.

original: mi g-yo mnyam par gnas pas sman chen ma byas na //
analyzed: mi g-yo mnyam par gnas pas sman chen ma byas na //
translated: If the great medicine of remaining in equipoise without wavering

original: mtho ris bgrod pa'i rgyu des nyon mongs zin par 'gyur //
analyzed: mtho ris bgrod pa'i rgyu des nyon mongs zin par 'gyur //
translated: is not taken, the cause of traveling to the higher realms will be seized by affliction.

original: lam med lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi nad che ba //
analyzed: lam med lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi nad che ba //
translated: The great sickness of those who enter the path without a path

original: phyin par 'dod pas ri dvags smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra //
analyzed: phyin par 'dod pas ri dvags smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra //
translated: is like a deer chasing a mirage.

original: rnyed pa'i yul med 'jig rten gsum du mi 'byung zhing //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i yul med 'jig rten gsum du mi 'byung zhing //
translated: Since there is no object to be attained, it does not arise in the three worlds.

original: sa bcur ltos pa'i gnas kyang byang chub sgrib pa yin //
analyzed: sa bcur ltos pa'i gnas kyang byang chub sgrib pa yin //
translated: The stage of the ten stages is also an obscuration to enlightenment.

original: shin tu myur ba'i ye shes bsam pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: shin tu myur ba'i ye shes bsam pa kun dang bral //
translated: The very swift pristine consciousness is free from all thoughts.

original: bshes gnyen kun las 'byung ba'i nor bu rin chen bzhin //
analyzed: bshes gnyen kun las 'byung ba'i nor bu rin chen bzhin //
translated: Like a precious jewel that comes from all the spiritual friends.

original: dmigs pa med cing 'gyur pa'i gnas la mi ltos par //
analyzed: dmigs pa med cing 'gyur pa'i gnas la mi ltos par //
translated: Without reference point, not relying on a changing basis,

original: rang gi rang bzhin legs par re ba thams cad skong //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin legs par re ba thams cad skong //
translated: One’s own nature fulfills all hopes.

original: brtags na med la bzhag na legs pa 'byung ba che //
analyzed: brtags na med la bzhag na legs pa 'byung ba che //
translated: When examined, it is nonexistent, but when left alone, it is a great benefit.

original: dngos su mi snang chags pa'i cha lugs kun la stan //
analyzed: dngos su mi snang chags pa'i cha lugs kun la stan //
translated: Not actually appearing, it is displayed in all the aspects of attachment.

original: bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod //
translated: The teacher who is free from self and other is a precious treasure.

original: thams cad grub pa'i yul zhes bdag med snying rjes bstan //
analyzed: thams cad grub pa'i yul zhes bdag med snying rjes bstan //
translated: The domain of the accomplishment of all is taught by selfless compassion.

original: nang nas ma g-yos nang du btsal ba'i gnas @43a *//
analyzed: nang nas ma g-yos nang du btsal ba'i gnas @43a *//
translated: Not moving from within, there is no place to search within.

original: med de; ;yul phyir chags la yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med //
analyzed: med de; ;yul phyir chags la yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med //
translated: Not attached to objects, there is no reference point for dedicating to objects.

original: mi 'byung mi 'jug bdag med snying rje de yis ni //
analyzed: mi 'byung mi 'jug bdag med snying rje de yis ni //
translated: That selfless compassion does not arise or engage.

original: gzhan gyi nong min mi 'ong ye nas gnas pa yin //🔽bde ba 'dod na bde la rgyab kyis phyogs //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nong min mi 'ong ye nas gnas pa yin // bde ba 'dod na bde la rgyab kyis phyogs //
translated: It is not another’s fault, nor does it come, but abides timelessly.🔽If you want happiness, turn your back on happiness.

original: bde bas zin te bde bas bde ba tshol //
analyzed: bde bas zin te bde bas bde ba tshol //
translated: Seized by happiness, seek happiness with happiness.

original: byang chub 'khrul pa ye rnga ma chos la za //
analyzed: byang chub 'khrul pa ye rnga ma chos la za //
translated: The Dharma of the nonarising primordial drum of delusion is awakened.

original: 'di lta'i yul can sangs rgyas mthong ba med //
analyzed: 'di lta'i yul can sangs rgyas mthong ba med //
translated: In this way, the mind that sees buddha is not seen.

original: sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med //
translated: Since there is no buddha, there is not even the name “buddha.”

original: sangs rgyas ston pas ming du brtags pa nor //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ston pas ming du brtags pa nor //
translated: The name imputed by the teacher Buddha is lost.

original: sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob byed nor pa'i lam //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob byed nor pa'i lam //
translated: The path of error is obtained from another buddha.

original: gzugs med chos kun bshad pa rdul tsam med //
analyzed: gzugs med chos kun bshad pa rdul tsam med //
translated: There is not even an atom of explanation of all formless Dharmas.

original: zin dang chags dang bral dang zhi //
analyzed: zin dang chags dang bral dang zhi //
translated: Grasping, attachment, separation, and pacification

original: dngos po med dang rnam par spong //
analyzed: dngos po med dang rnam par spong //
translated: are nonexistent entities and complete abandonment.

original: bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la //
translated: The nature of great nectar

original: bza' ba'i thabs la rag pa med //
analyzed: bza' ba'i thabs la rag pa med //
translated: is not dependent on the method of eating.

original: yangs so che'o chos chen po //
analyzed: yangs so che'o chos chen po //
translated: Vast, great, and very great,

original: chung ngu rnams kyi gnyen po yin //🔽che la dmigs pa'i cha bsnyams nas //
analyzed: chung ngu rnams kyi gnyen po yin // che la dmigs pa'i cha bsnyams nas //
translated: it is the antidote for the small.🔽Having compared the great and small,

original: chung che de rnams dmigs dang bral //
analyzed: chung che de rnams dmigs dang bral //
translated: those small and great are free from reference points.

original: gsung dang rgyas dang dmigs dang snang //
analyzed: gsung dang rgyas dang dmigs dang snang //
translated: Speech, expansion, reference points, and appearances

original: sgyu mkhan ri mo'i rnam pa bzhin //
analyzed: sgyu mkhan ri mo'i rnam pa bzhin //
translated: are like the forms of an illusionist.

original: 'byung 'jug ye shes rmugs pa yis //
analyzed: 'byung 'jug ye shes rmugs pa yis //
translated: The wisdom of arising and entering is confused,

original: de yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur //
translated: and it arises from the power of that.

original: 'di ni theg pa kun gyi rgyal //
analyzed: 'di ni theg pa kun gyi rgyal //
translated: This is the king of all vehicles.

original: btang ngo bzhag go rang bzhin te //
analyzed: btang ngo bzhag go rang bzhin te //
translated: It is the nature of letting go and resting,

original: 'dod pa med cing len pa med //
analyzed: 'dod pa med cing len pa med //
translated: Without desire or grasping,

original: brod pa rdul tsam mi bskyed do //
analyzed: brod pa rdul tsam mi bskyed do //
translated: Not producing even an atom of pride.

original: khyung chen nam mkha' lding ba bzhin //🔽spro ba med cing bsdu ba med //
analyzed: khyung chen nam mkha' lding ba bzhin // spro ba med cing bsdu ba med //
translated: Like a great garuḍ soaring in the sky,🔽Without expansion or contraction,

original: stor bar mi dogs bza' ba med //
analyzed: stor bar mi dogs bza' ba med //
translated: Not fearing loss or having nothing to eat,

original: rgya mtsho bzhin du ye gnas la //
analyzed: rgya mtsho bzhin du ye gnas la //
translated: Dwelling eternally like an ocean,

original: chos @43b rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar byed //
analyzed: chos @43b rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar byed //
translated: It produces the variety of phenomena.

original: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
analyzed: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
translated: Its qualities are equal to the limits of space.

original: bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med //
translated: There is no certainty in the basis of gathering.

original: byang chub snying por de ma thag /
analyzed: byang chub snying por de ma thag /
translated: Immediately at the essence of enlightenment,

original: ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po 'byung //
analyzed: ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po 'byung //
translated: The great king of samādhis arises.

original: snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin //
analyzed: snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin //
translated: Appearances are like the great ocean.

original: mi rtog nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs //
analyzed: mi rtog nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs //
translated: Nonconceptuality is as vast as the limits of space.

original: kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la //
translated: In the domain of Samantabhadra,

original: skye zhing 'pho ba'i chos med de //
analyzed: skye zhing 'pho ba'i chos med de //
translated: There is no dharma of arising and transmigration.

original: rgyu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis po //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis po //
translated: The twelve links of causes and conditions

original: skur pas brtags pas bshad pa yin //
analyzed: skur pas brtags pas bshad pa yin //
translated: Are explained by imputation.

original: 'khrul pa rnams kyi sgo tsam du //
analyzed: 'khrul pa rnams kyi sgo tsam du //
translated: The door of delusion

original: mkhas pas de bzhin shes par gyis //
analyzed: mkhas pas de bzhin shes par gyis //
translated: The wise should understand it in this way.

original: 'gro ba rgyud drug snang ba yang //
analyzed: 'gro ba rgyud drug snang ba yang //
translated: The appearances of the six classes of migrating beings

original: dang po'i lam du shes par bya //
analyzed: dang po'i lam du shes par bya //
translated: Should be known as the path of the first.

original: 'dod spyod snying rjes brlan pas na //
analyzed: 'dod spyod snying rjes brlan pas na //
translated: Since desire is moistened with compassion,

original: gang du dga' bar byang chub spyod //
analyzed: gang du dga' bar byang chub spyod //
translated: One should practice enlightenment wherever one likes.

original: shan pa smad 'tshong mtshams med lnga //
analyzed: shan pa smad 'tshong mtshams med lnga //
translated: Butchers, prostitutes, and the five inexpiable actions

original: kha na ma tho 'jig rten spong //
analyzed: kha na ma tho 'jig rten spong //
translated: Are abandoned in the world.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa chos kyi rtsis //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa chos kyi rtsis //
translated: The complete nectar of the Dharma🔽Is nothing other than great bliss.

original: bde ba che las gzhan med do; ;yang chos thams cad de bas na //
analyzed: bde ba che las gzhan med do; ;yang chos thams cad de bas na //
translated: Since all phenomena are like that,

original: chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin pas //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin pas //
translated: The nature of phenomena is the same.🔽The nature of phenomena is sought with phenomena,🔽Space is sought with space,

original: chos kyis chos nyid btsal ba dang // nam mkha' nam mkhas btsal ba dang // gzhan la ltos pa'i chos nyid ni //
analyzed: chos kyis chos nyid btsal ba dang // nam mkha' nam mkhas btsal ba dang // gzhan la ltos pa'i chos nyid ni //
translated: And the nature that depends on another

original: me yis me gsod pa 'dra ste //
analyzed: me yis me gsod pa 'dra ste //
translated: Is like fire extinguishing fire.

original: shin tu dka' ba'i las byed pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dka' ba'i las byed pa'o //
translated: It is an extremely difficult action.

original: rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di //
translated: This nonconceptual essence

original: yongs kyi rgyud la sbas pa med //
analyzed: yongs kyi rgyud la sbas pa med //
translated: Is not hidden in any tantra.

original: mi len byang chub spyod rnams la //
analyzed: mi len byang chub spyod rnams la //
translated: In the conduct of non-grasping enlightenment,

original: rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gnas //
translated: It naturally abides in all aspects.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu las //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu las //
translated: Thus it is.

original: mi gnas yul med kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: mi gnas yul med kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This completes the twenty-second chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the transmission of the effortless perfection.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun @44a *//
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun @44a *//
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind,

original: byed rgyal po des lta ba yul med kyi lung 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: byed rgyal po des lta ba yul med kyi lung 'di gsungs so //
translated: gave the following transmission on the view that has no object:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Oh great and courageous one, listen!

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni //
translated: Since all phenomena, however they appear,🔽are awakened mind,

original: rang gi byang chub sems yin pas; ;de la blta ba'i yul ma mchis //
analyzed: rang gi byang chub sems yin pas; ;de la blta ba'i yul ma mchis //
translated: there is no object to be viewed.

original: mi rtog pas na mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: mi rtog pas na mnyam pa nyid //
translated: Since there is no concept of it, it is evenness.

original: de bzhin nam mkha'i dgongs pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin nam mkha'i dgongs pa ste //
translated: Likewise, it is the transcendent state of space,

original: rnal 'byor zhes ni de la bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes ni de la bya //
translated: and that is what is called ‘yoga.’

original: dbang po lnga la snang ba rnams //
analyzed: dbang po lnga la snang ba rnams //
translated: The appearances to the five sense faculties

original: rang gsal de la mi rtog pas //
analyzed: rang gsal de la mi rtog pas //
translated: are naturally clear, and since there is no concept of them,

original: de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas //
analyzed: de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas //
translated: they abide in the transcendent state of space.

original: rnal 'byor de bzhin nyid du gnas //🔽tshig dang yi ge don brtags pas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de bzhin nyid du gnas // tshig dang yi ge don brtags pas //
translated: Yoga abides in suchness.🔽Since the meaning of words and syllables is examined,

original: tshig yig don la brtag med pas //
analyzed: tshig yig don la brtag med pas //
translated: since there is no examination of the meaning of words and syllables,

original: rtog med mnyam pa de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: rtog med mnyam pa de bzhin nyid //
translated: nonconceptual evenness is suchness.

original: de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas //
analyzed: de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas //
translated: is present.

original: bsam du med pa'i don 'di ni //
analyzed: bsam du med pa'i don 'di ni //
translated: This meaning, which is inconceivable,

original: nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas so //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas so // zhes gsungs so //
translated: is timelessly present, like space.

original: bya med rdzogs pa las; lta ba yul med kyi nam mkha'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: bya med rdzogs pa las; lta ba yul med kyi nam mkha'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the thirty-third chapter, on the transcendent state of space, the view that has no object, from The Tantra of the Great and Perfect Dynamic Energy of the Lion.🔽THE WAY THE SCRIPTURAL TRANSMISSION OF PERFECT TIMELESSNESS WITHOUT ACTION IS PRESENT

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des bya med rdzogs pa'i lung phyag rgya bzhugs tshul kyi le'u 'di bstan to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des bya med rdzogs pa'i lung phyag rgya bzhugs tshul kyi le'u 'di bstan to //
translated: Then, the awakened mind of all-creating enlightened king revealed this chapter on the way the scriptural transmission of perfect timelessness without action—the seal of abiding—is present:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: sems nyid kun tu bzang po yi //
analyzed: sems nyid kun tu bzang po yi //
translated: The way of abiding of mind itself, Samantabhadra,

original: bzhugs tshul bstan pa 'di lta ste //
analyzed: bzhugs tshul bstan pa 'di lta ste //
translated: is revealed as follows:🔽As for the way of abiding in awakened mind,

original: byang chub sems su bzhugs tsam na; ;chos rnams kun gyi snying por bzhugs //
analyzed: byang chub sems su bzhugs tsam na; ;chos rnams kun gyi snying por bzhugs //
translated: it abides as the heart essence of all phenomena.

original: de rtogs kun byed rgyal po yin //
analyzed: de rtogs kun byed rgyal po yin //
translated: To realize that is to be the all-creating monarch.

original: kun byed rgyal po 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po 'gyur ba med //
translated: The all-creating monarch is unchanging.

original: des na 'gyur ba med par bstan //
analyzed: des na 'gyur ba med par bstan //
translated: Therefore, it is shown to be unchanging.

original: chos kyi sku ru @44b bzhugs tsam na //
analyzed: chos kyi sku ru @44b bzhugs tsam na //
translated: As for the way of abiding in dharmakaya,

original: bzung 'dzin spros dang bral nas bzhugs //
analyzed: bzung 'dzin spros dang bral nas bzhugs //
translated: it abides free of the elaborations of dualistic perception.

original: gzung 'dzin bral la 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin bral la 'gyur ba med //
translated: There is no change in the absence of percepts and perceivers.

original: longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhugs tsam na //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhugs tsam na //
translated: When abiding in the sambhogakaya,

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas //🔽'dod pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas // 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs //
translated: endowed with the five qualities of desire,🔽one abides in the perfect fulfillment of desire.

original: sprul pa'i sku ru bzhugs tsam na //🔽gang gis 'dul ba'i dus tsam na //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku ru bzhugs tsam na // gang gis 'dul ba'i dus tsam na //
translated: When abiding in the nirmanakaya,🔽at the time of taming whomever,

original: gang la gang dgos sku sprul nas //
analyzed: gang la gang dgos sku sprul nas //
translated: whatever is needed, emanations are sent forth,

original: dgos pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs //
analyzed: dgos pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs //
translated: and one abides in the perfect fulfillment of needs.

original: dus gsum 'gyur ba med par bzhugs //
analyzed: dus gsum 'gyur ba med par bzhugs //
translated: Abiding without change in the three times,

original: chos kun phyag rgya nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: chos kun phyag rgya nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: all phenomena are the seal of space.

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid //
translated: The characteristic of space is suchness.

original: sku gsum mtshan nyid de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: sku gsum mtshan nyid de bzhin gnas //
translated: The characteristic of the three kayas abides in suchness.

original: thams cad de bzhin nyid du gnas //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin nyid du gnas //
translated: Everything abides in suchness.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos kun ni //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos kun ni //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,

original: ji bzhin pa la bcos su med //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la bcos su med //
translated: are just as they are, without contrivance.🔽There is not a single one who has arrived

original: btsal zhing bsgrub pa thams cad kyis //🔽snga ba bgrod pas phyin pa gcig kyang med //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgrub pa thams cad kyis // snga ba bgrod pas phyin pa gcig kyang med //
translated: through searching and striving.🔽There is not a single one who has finished

original: snga pa byas pas zin pa gcig kyang med //
analyzed: snga pa byas pas zin pa gcig kyang med //
translated: through doing something earlier.

original: bsgrubs shing btsal bas snga ba grub pa med //
analyzed: bsgrubs shing btsal bas snga ba grub pa med //
translated: Since it is accomplished and sought, it is not established as something prior.

original: thams cad ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med //🔽ces gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //
analyzed: thams cad ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med // ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //
translated: In the way things are, there is no change.

original: bya med rdzogs pa phyag rgya 'gyur med kyi lung gi le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: bya med rdzogs pa phyag rgya 'gyur med kyi lung gi le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This is the fourth chapter: the transmission of the unchanging mudra, perfection without activity.🔽THE TEACHING THAT ONE’S MIND IS THE TEACHER

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des khams gsum gyi sems can la rang gi sems ston pa yin par bstan pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des khams gsum gyi sems can la rang gi sems ston pa yin par bstan pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: THEN, THE BODHISATTVA SAMANTABHADRA, the king of all deeds, spoke these words to the teacher of the three realms, the bodhisattva Vajra of Mind:🔽KYE!

original: kye / khams gsum sems can thams cad kun //
analyzed: kye / khams gsum sems can thams cad kun //
translated: All sentient beings of the three realms,

original: rang gi byang chub sems de ni //🔽ston pa yin @45a *//
analyzed: rang gi byang chub sems de ni // ston pa yin @45a *//
translated: your awakened mind

original: par mngon bstan na //
analyzed: par mngon bstan na //
translated: is revealed to be the teacher.🔽Since you have not seen your mind as the teacher

original: bskal pa brgya phrag stong du ni //🔽rang sems ston par ma mthong bas //
analyzed: bskal pa brgya phrag stong du ni // rang sems ston par ma mthong bas //
translated: for hundreds and thousands of eons,

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
translated: I, the all-creating king,

original: rang sems ston pa mngon phyung bas //
analyzed: rang sems ston pa mngon phyung bas //
translated: have revealed your mind as the teacher.

original: rang sems ston pa'i chos nyon cig /
analyzed: rang sems ston pa'i chos nyon cig /
translated: Listen to the teaching of the mind as the teacher.

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
translated: I, the all-creating king,

original: kun rgyu byang chub sems las ni //
analyzed: kun rgyu byang chub sems las ni //
translated: The all-pervading bodhicitta

original: sems kyi ngo bo 'byung chen lnga //
analyzed: sems kyi ngo bo 'byung chen lnga //
translated: Arises as the five great elements of the essence of mind.

original: ston pa byang chub sems lnga phyung //
analyzed: ston pa byang chub sems lnga phyung //
translated: The teacher is the five bodhicitta elements.

original: sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //🔽chos ni rang gi ngo bos 'chad //
analyzed: sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku // chos ni rang gi ngo bos 'chad //
translated: The body is the saṃbhogakāya.🔽The Dharma is explained by its own essence.

original: ston ni rang gi rang bzhin ston //
analyzed: ston ni rang gi rang bzhin ston //
translated: The teacher teaches its own nature.

original: ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku de //
analyzed: ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku de //
translated: That teacher, the saṃbhogakāya,

original: dgongs pa nyid la nyid mi rtog /
analyzed: dgongs pa nyid la nyid mi rtog /
translated: Does not think about itself in its own transcendent state.

original: yul chos gzhan la'ang rtog mi byed //
analyzed: yul chos gzhan la'ang rtog mi byed //
translated: It does not think about other objects and Dharmas.

original: byang chub sems kyi ston pa lngas //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ston pa lngas //
translated: The five teachers of bodhicitta

original: kun kyang chos nyid de bzhin ston //
analyzed: kun kyang chos nyid de bzhin ston //
translated: All teach dharmatā as it is.

original: byang chub sems kyi ye shes des //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ye shes des //
translated: That pristine consciousness of bodhicitta

original: ston pa sa yi skur byung nas //
analyzed: ston pa sa yi skur byung nas //

analyzed: tshig dang yi ges mi ston te //
translated: It is not taught with words and syllables.

original: rang gi rang bzhin ston byed pa //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin ston byed pa //

analyzed: bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog /

original: mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston //
analyzed: mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston //

original: byang chub sems kyi ye shes des //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ye shes des //
translated: The pristine consciousness of bodhicitta

analyzed: ston pa nam mkha'i skur byung nas //
translated: Arises as the kāya of the sky, the teacher.

original: tshig dang yi ges mi ston te //
analyzed: tshig dang yi ges mi ston te //
translated: It is not taught with words and letters.

original: rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa //
translated: The Dharma is taught by its own essence

original: bdag gzhan gnyis su mi rtog par //
analyzed: bdag gzhan gnyis su mi rtog par //
translated: Without conceptualizing a duality of self and other.

original: mi 'byed pa yi dgongs pa ston //
analyzed: mi 'byed pa yi dgongs pa ston //
translated: It is taught with the transcendent state that is not differentiated.

original: khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis //
analyzed: khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis //
translated: All sentient beings of the three realms🔽Should understand that all those

original: sngon phyung ston pa de rnams kyis //
analyzed: sngon phyung ston pa de rnams kyis //
translated: Who have previously been teachers

original: rang gi ngo bos chos 'chad pa //🔽'di yis kun kyang rig par gyis //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos chos 'chad pa // 'di yis kun kyang rig par gyis //
translated: Explain the Dharma with their own essence.

original: kye; khams gsum sems can thams cad kun //
analyzed: kye; khams gsum sems can thams cad kun //
translated: “Oh! All sentient beings of the three realms

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
translated: Are created by me, the all-creating king.

original: khyed rnams nga yis byas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: khyed rnams nga yis byas pa'i phyir //
translated: Because you all are created by me,

original: nga yi sras yin nga dang mnyam //🔽nga dang mi @46a *//
analyzed: nga yi sras yin nga dang mnyam // nga dang mi @46a *//
translated: I am the son, equal to me.

original: gnyis nga yin phyir //
analyzed: gnyis nga yin phyir //
translated: I am not two, but one.

original: nga yis khyed la mngon phyung ba //
analyzed: nga yis khyed la mngon phyung ba //
translated: Therefore, I have revealed myself to you.

original: nga yi ngo bo ston pa lngas //
analyzed: nga yi ngo bo ston pa lngas //
translated: Through these five teachers who reveal my essence,

original: rang bzhin rnam lnga gcig tu bstan //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam lnga gcig tu bstan //
translated: The five aspects of my nature are taught as one.🔽Since one is the all-creating one,

original: gcig ni kun byed pa yin gyi; ;de bzhin khyed kyang yid ches kyis //
analyzed: gcig ni kun byed pa yin gyi; ;de bzhin khyed kyang yid ches kyis //
translated: you should have confidence in that.

original: kye; khams gsum sems can ma lus kun //
analyzed: kye; khams gsum sems can ma lus kun //
translated: O all sentient beings of the three realms,

original: nga med tsam na khyed kyang med //
analyzed: nga med tsam na khyed kyang med //
translated: if I did not exist, you would not exist.

original: khyed med tsam gyi dus tsam na //
analyzed: khyed med tsam gyi dus tsam na //
translated: At the very moment you do not exist,

original: ston pa lnga yang 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ston pa lnga yang 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: even the five teachers would not appear.

original: mi rtog chos kyang ston mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtog chos kyang ston mi 'gyur //
translated: Even the teaching of the nonconceptual Dharma would not appear.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: From The All-Creating Sovereign, Mind of Perfect Purity,

original: rang sems ston par phyung ba'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: rang sems ston par phyung ba'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o ////
translated: the fifth chapter, revealing one’s mind as the teacher.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems las byung ba'i chos chen po lnga ston par byung ba'i rtags su ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems las byung ba'i chos chen po lnga ston par byung ba'i rtags su ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, in order to show the five great phenomena that arise from mind, the all-creating king of awakened mind, the teacher accepted the request to reveal unborn awakened mind and spoke the following.🔽Kye!

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: Listen, great and courageous one!

original: bsam 'das brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: bsam 'das brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: Awakened mind, beyond imagination and inexpressible,

original: ston pa'i sgron mar gyur pas yon tan rab bsngags pa //
analyzed: ston pa'i sgron mar gyur pas yon tan rab bsngags pa //
translated: is praised as the teacher’s excellent quality,

original: chos kyi snying por gyur pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyid //🔽bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas //
analyzed: chos kyi snying por gyur pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyid // bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas //
translated: the youthful Mañjuśrī, the essence of phenomena.

original: tshul khrims la sogs spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa'i //
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa'i //
translated: It is the ground of the ocean of conduct, such as that of ethical discipline,

original: ji snyed rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan pa //
analyzed: ji snyed rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan pa //
translated: and the path taught for complete freedom.

original: bde gshegs yum 'gyur kun gyi mtshungs lam de //
analyzed: bde gshegs yum 'gyur kun gyi mtshungs lam de //
translated: The path of the sugatas’ mother is the same for all.

original: de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam //
analyzed: de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam //
translated: Without it, there is no freedom; therefore, it is the supreme path of complete freedom.

original: phra zhing shes dka' kun gyi lam @46b ste mi rtog rtog las 'das //
analyzed: phra zhing shes dka' kun gyi lam @46b ste mi rtog rtog las 'das //
translated: It is subtle and difficult to know, the path of all, nonconceptual, beyond imagination.

original: mi gnas mi dmigs spros med bsam pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: mi gnas mi dmigs spros med bsam pa kun dang bral //
translated: It is not a reference point, is free from elaborations, and is free from all thoughts.

original: tshig gis mi phebs dbyibs dang kha dog spyod yul med //
analyzed: tshig gis mi phebs dbyibs dang kha dog spyod yul med //
translated: It cannot be reached with words, has no shape or color, and is not an object of experience.

original: bstan cing brtag par dka' la brjod du rdul tsam med //
analyzed: bstan cing brtag par dka' la brjod du rdul tsam med //
translated: It is difficult to demonstrate and examine, and not even an atom of it can be expressed.

original: sngon gyi drang srong lam du gang zhugs pa //
analyzed: sngon gyi drang srong lam du gang zhugs pa //
translated: Those who follow the path of the sages of the past

original: bsgom chags lam gyi nad kyis zin ta re //
analyzed: bsgom chags lam gyi nad kyis zin ta re //
translated: Are seized by the illness of the path of attachment to meditation.

original: ston pa'i lung bzhin tshig gi mtha' spyod lam du de mthong na //
analyzed: ston pa'i lung bzhin tshig gi mtha' spyod lam du de mthong na //
translated: If they see that path as a verbal extreme, in accordance with the teacher’s scriptures,

original: de ni rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra //
analyzed: de ni rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra //
translated: They are like someone chasing a mirage, following a stream of thoughts.

original: yang dag lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med //
analyzed: yang dag lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med //
translated: The true path cannot be indicated with words.

original: yang dag nyid du bstan pa nga yis 'khrul //
analyzed: yang dag nyid du bstan pa nga yis 'khrul //
translated: I am mistaken in teaching it as true.

original: dag dang ma dag gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs //
analyzed: dag dang ma dag gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs //
translated: Pure and impure are not two, but mixed and equal.🔽Wisdom is not divided into any aspects, and is free from delusion and obstruction,

original: rnam pa cir yang mi 'byed ye shes gti mug dang // thogs med gsal ba'i mar me bsam pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: rnam pa cir yang mi 'byed ye shes gti mug dang // thogs med gsal ba'i mar me bsam pa kun dang bral //
translated: Like a clear lamp, free from all thoughts.

original: ngang gis mi g-yo rmugs shing ting 'dzin rgyal por gnas //
analyzed: ngang gis mi g-yo rmugs shing ting 'dzin rgyal por gnas //
translated: It naturally does not waver, and abides as the king of samādhis.

original: mngon sum mthong bas mthong med mngon sum mthong ba'i mig /
analyzed: mngon sum mthong bas mthong med mngon sum mthong ba'i mig /
translated: The eye that sees the unseen through direct perception

original: de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes de la bya //
analyzed: de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes de la bya //
translated: Is therefore called the eye of omniscience.🔽In the all-encompassing essence without extremes or middle,

original: mtha' dang dbus med yongs pa'i snying po la; ;mi len mi 'dor mnyam pa'i rgyal por gnas //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med yongs pa'i snying po la; ;mi len mi 'dor mnyam pa'i rgyal por gnas //
translated: One abides as the impartial king, neither accepting nor rejecting.

original: sems dang bag chags gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs //
analyzed: sems dang bag chags gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs //
translated: Mind and traces are undifferentiated and equal.

original: 'dzin pas brtags shing snang ba'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: 'dzin pas brtags shing snang ba'i chos rnams ni //
translated: The phenomena of clinging, imputed and apparent,

original: rang gi rgyan du snang bas mi 'dor spong mi byed //
analyzed: rang gi rgyan du snang bas mi 'dor spong mi byed //
translated: Are not rejected or abandoned, appearing as one’s own ornament.

original: cir yang mi dgongs thabs kyis de la rol //
analyzed: cir yang mi dgongs thabs kyis de la rol //
translated: Without any thought, one enjoys them with skillful means.

original: kun dang mi mthun yongs kyis spong ba'i chos //🔽nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams @47a *//
analyzed: kun dang mi mthun yongs kyis spong ba'i chos // nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams @47a *//
translated: The Dharma that is incompatible with all and utterly rejected,

original: med lnga po yi //
analyzed: med lnga po yi //
translated: The five afflictions and the five inexpiable acts,

original: rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob //
analyzed: rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob //
translated: Having entered that pure path, one attains the impartial king.

original: bud med la sogs kun kyang spong mi byed //
analyzed: bud med la sogs kun kyang spong mi byed //
translated: One does not reject women and so forth.

original: lo rgyus don gnyis tshad //
analyzed: lo rgyus don gnyis tshad //
translated: The two limits of the meaning of the stories

original: ma'i blor bzhag nas //
analyzed: ma'i blor bzhag nas //
translated: are placed in the mind.

original: ting 'dzin gsum po brten nas grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum po brten nas grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa //
translated: Practicing the tenets based on the three samadhis,

original: rtsod bral lung las gol zhes 'khrul pa yin //
analyzed: rtsod bral lung las gol zhes 'khrul pa yin //
translated: To say straying from the uncontested transmission is a mistake.

original: bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas //
analyzed: bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas //
translated: Free of activity, perfect spontaneously, you abide in the very essence of bliss.

original: ye shes rang 'byung che ba'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: ye shes rang 'byung che ba'i snying po nyid //
translated: The very essence of the supreme spontaneous presence of awareness

original: mi g-yo mi 'gyur bsnyad pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: mi g-yo mi 'gyur bsnyad pa kun dang bral //
translated: is unwavering and unchanging, free of all that can be described.

original: zin pa'i bdud rtsis rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms //
analyzed: zin pa'i bdud rtsis rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms //
translated: The nectar of what is embraced conquers the suffering of striving.

original: bya bral zin pa'i yul la ji bzhin gnas //
analyzed: bya bral zin pa'i yul la ji bzhin gnas //
translated: Abiding just as it is in the domain of what is embraced, free of activity,

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: chos rnams thams cad thig le chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na //🔽spros pa med cing bsdus pa med //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad thig le chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na // spros pa med cing bsdus pa med //
translated: Since all phenomena are by nature the great sphere of being,🔽they are beyond elaboration and beyond being encompassed.

original: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
analyzed: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
translated: They are unborn and unceasing,

original: 'gog pa med par de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: 'gog pa med par de bzhin gnas //
translated: and abide just so, without ceasing.

original: rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di //
translated: This nonconceptual heart essence

original: nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas //
translated: is timelessly present like space.

original: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das /
analyzed: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das /
translated: It transcends the domain of conceptual expression and thought.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is.

original: bya med rdzogs pa sgom du med pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o ////
analyzed: bya med rdzogs pa sgom du med pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o ////
translated: From The Precious Treasury of the Way of Abiding, this is the sixth topic, reaching the definitive conclusion about the ultimate heart essence, supreme original purity.🔽From The Precious Treasury of the Way of Abiding, this is the seventh topic, reaching the definitive conclusion about the supreme secret of the Great Perfection.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi gdams ngag phog pa dang mthun pa'i lung chen po rim gyis bstan te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi gdams ngag phog pa dang mthun pa'i lung chen po rim gyis bstan te /
translated: Then, the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, revealed the great transmission in stages, in accord with the pith instructions it had given.🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: Listen, O great and courageous one!

original: chos rnams thams cad nga las byung ba na //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad nga las byung ba na //
translated: Since all phenomena come from me,

original: ji ltar snang @47b ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang @47b ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: all phenomena, however they appear,

original: ye nas rnam dag dbyings kyi lung du bstan //
analyzed: ye nas rnam dag dbyings kyi lung du bstan //
translated: are revealed to be the transmission of basic space, timelessly pure.

original: phyi dang nang kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: phyi dang nang kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The entire universe, both outer and inner, is timelessly the basic space of phenomena.

original: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la //
analyzed: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la //
translated: Within the realm of experience that is timelessly pure,

original: sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis su med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis su med //
translated: buddhas and ordinary beings are not a duality.

original: lam dang gnyen pos bcos su ga la yod //
analyzed: lam dang gnyen pos bcos su ga la yod //
translated: How could there be any contrivance through spiritual approaches and antidotes?

original: bsgrub med rtsal sbrugs smon pa med pas na //
analyzed: bsgrub med rtsal sbrugs smon pa med pas na //
translated: Since there is nothing to be accomplished, no effort to be exerted, and no hope to be invested,

original: bya med lhun rdzogs snga ma de nyid don //
analyzed: bya med lhun rdzogs snga ma de nyid don //
translated: the ultimate meaning of the original state is one of effortless spontaneous perfection.

original: rtog spyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la //
analyzed: rtog spyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la //
translated: Within the nondual basic space of phenomena, pure of conceptual activity,

original: log rtog byis pa'i spyod pas ci zhig bslus //
analyzed: log rtog byis pa'i spyod pas ci zhig bslus //
translated: what is one to make of the confusion created by the childish behavior of distorted conceptualization?

original: gnyis med bde chen sems can kun spyod la //
analyzed: gnyis med bde chen sems can kun spyod la //
translated: All beings experience the nondual state of great bliss.

original: 'khrul pas nor pa'i lam du bstan pa yang //
analyzed: 'khrul pas nor pa'i lam du bstan pa yang //
translated: The path of error, taught by delusion, is also

original: gong du bstan pa'i lam chen de la mi gnyis pas //
analyzed: gong du bstan pa'i lam chen de la mi gnyis pas //
translated: Not the path of the great teaching above.

original: mnyam par shes pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje //
analyzed: mnyam par shes pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje //
translated: Since it is known to be the same, it is the lord of all buddhas.

original: nga dang bdag tu rtog pa mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam //
analyzed: nga dang bdag tu rtog pa mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam //
translated: The path of error of the tīrthikas is the concept of “I” and “self.”

original: byis pas bslus pas chos spyod rtog pa'i lam la btsud pa ni //
analyzed: byis pas bslus pas chos spyod rtog pa'i lam la btsud pa ni //
translated: Since they are deceived by childishness, they are led onto the path of concepts that are religious practices.

original: phyin pa'i dus med rtogs pa'i dus med pas //
analyzed: phyin pa'i dus med rtogs pa'i dus med pas //
translated: There is no time to arrive and no time to realize

original: chos nyid chos tshol rnyed par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: chos nyid chos tshol rnyed par ga la 'gyur //
translated: Dharma, so how could the dharma be found by searching for it?

original: tshad mar ma gyur slob dpon spre 'dra'i lung //
analyzed: tshad mar ma gyur slob dpon spre 'dra'i lung //
translated: The babbling of a teacher who is not a valid person is like a monkey.

original: bstan dang lam nor rtog pas zin ta re //🔽de bas gser la nag tshur gtong ba yi //
analyzed: bstan dang lam nor rtog pas zin ta re // de bas gser la nag tshur gtong ba yi //
translated: Beware of being caught by the concepts of a mistaken teaching and path.

original: slob dpon yang dag ston pa'i rin chen mdzod //🔽rin thang dpag tu med pas blu bar 'os /
analyzed: slob dpon yang dag ston pa'i rin chen mdzod // rin thang dpag tu med pas blu bar 'os /
translated: Therefore, the teacher who is the precious treasury of the perfect teaching

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Is worthy of being ransomed with a gift of gold of incalculable value.🔽CHAPTER 7🔽THE PREDICTION OF THE DHARMA OF THE FRUITION

original: bya med rdzogs pa rnam dag dbyings kyi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: bya med rdzogs pa rnam dag dbyings kyi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: THAT IS NOT ACCOMPLISHED BY ACTION

original: @48a *// de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin 'gyur med 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: @48a *// de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin 'gyur med 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating mind of awakening, the sovereign, spoke these words about its unchanging nature:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: Oh great and courageous one, listen!

original: nga yi rang bzhin dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
translated: The basic space of my nature is unchanging.

original: nga yi ye shes nam mkha' 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: nga yi ye shes nam mkha' 'gyur ba med //
translated: My wisdom is unchanging space.

original: nga yi chos nyid rang bzhin 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: nga yi chos nyid rang bzhin 'gyur ba med //
translated: The nature of my dharmatā is unchanging.

original: nga sems chos kyi snying po 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: nga sems chos kyi snying po 'gyur ba med //
translated: My mind, the heart essence of phenomena, is unchanging.

original: de bzhin thams cad 'gyur ba med pa la //
analyzed: de bzhin thams cad 'gyur ba med pa la //
translated: In the same way, everything is unchanging.

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: The three teachers who arise from me

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur chos la ming brtags nas //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur chos la ming brtags nas //
translated: label phenomena with the names of causes and results.

original: sprul pas lung bstan dbang po yul spong 'gyur //
analyzed: sprul pas lung bstan dbang po yul spong 'gyur //
translated: The emanations give prophecies and reject the objects of the senses.

original: rang rkyen chos lnga 'chang ba'i sems can la //
analyzed: rang rkyen chos lnga 'chang ba'i sems can la //
translated: To sentient beings who possess the five dharmas of their own conditions,

original: rang 'byung chos nyid yin par lung ma bstan //
analyzed: rang 'byung chos nyid yin par lung ma bstan //
translated: the naturally occurring dharmatā is not prophesied.

original: ngan 'gro sdig sgrib che zhes lung bstan nas //
analyzed: ngan 'gro sdig sgrib che zhes lung bstan nas //
translated: After prophesying that the lower realms are due to great negativity and obscuration,

original: lus ngag yid gsum sdig spong dge bcu spyod; ;rang 'byung chos la blang dor spyad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum sdig spong dge bcu spyod; ;rang 'byung chos la blang dor spyad pa'i phyir //
translated: And in order to practice the Dharma of self-origination,

original: rang 'byung ye shes bskal mang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes bskal mang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: One will not encounter self-originated wisdom for many eons.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Oh, great and courageous being, listen!

original: sprul pa rang las 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la //
analyzed: sprul pa rang las 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la //
translated: To the assembly of emanations gathered from oneself,

original: rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi chos spangs la //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi chos spangs la //
translated: Abandon the Dharma of the five self-originated wisdoms,

original: ye shes lnga spong dgra lnga choms lung bstan //
analyzed: ye shes lnga spong dgra lnga choms lung bstan //
translated: And conquer the five enemies who abandon the five wisdoms.

original: dgra lnga rang 'byung ye shes ma rtogs te //
analyzed: dgra lnga rang 'byung ye shes ma rtogs te //
translated: The five enemies do not realize self-originated wisdom,

original: rang sems spong 'gyur nga yis lung ma bstan //
analyzed: rang sems spong 'gyur nga yis lung ma bstan //
translated: And abandon their own mind. I do not prophesy that.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Oh, great and courageous being, listen!

original: rang gi sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: rang gi sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la //
translated: In the dharmatā that arises from one’s own mind,

original: don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis //
analyzed: don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis //
translated: Through the two truths, the ultimate and the relative,

original: sbyangs nas rgyu las @48b 'bras bu 'byung zer nas //
analyzed: sbyangs nas rgyu las @48b 'bras bu 'byung zer nas //
translated: It is said that the result arises from the cause.

original: bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sbyong byed pa //
analyzed: bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sbyong byed pa //
translated: Those who train for three eons

original: sdom dang pha rol phyin bcus rang mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sdom dang pha rol phyin bcus rang mi 'gyur //
translated: Will not become buddhas through the vows and the ten perfections.🔽“Oh, great and courageous being, listen!

original: sems nyid 'gyur ba rang yis lung ma bstan //
analyzed: sems nyid 'gyur ba rang yis lung ma bstan //
translated: The mind-itself that is not ascertained by itself is neutral.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: rang sems chos nyid ting 'dzin byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: rang sems chos nyid ting 'dzin byin brlabs nas //
translated: Having blessed the dharmatā of one’s mind as samādhi,

original: dag pas chu zla bzhin du gsal byas nas //
analyzed: dag pas chu zla bzhin du gsal byas nas //
translated: and having clarified it like the moon in water,

original: rjer ltas de la mnyes pa'i mchod phul bas //
analyzed: rjer ltas de la mnyes pa'i mchod phul bas //
translated: if one makes offerings to please the lord,

original: de la re 'dod grub pa thob re ba //
analyzed: de la re 'dod grub pa thob re ba //
translated: one will obtain the accomplishment of one’s hopes and desires.

original: chu zla med de rang sems ma rtogs pas //🔽skye ba bdun gyi bar du rang 'byung gi /
analyzed: chu zla med de rang sems ma rtogs pas // skye ba bdun gyi bar du rang 'byung gi /
translated: Since the moon in water does not exist and one’s mind is not realized,🔽for seven lifetimes, I do not prophesy that

original: ye shes yod ces nga yis lung ma bstan //
analyzed: ye shes yod ces nga yis lung ma bstan //
translated: one will have self-originated pristine consciousness.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽rang sems byin brlabs cho 'phrul bsgoms pa yi //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig / rang sems byin brlabs cho 'phrul bsgoms pa yi //
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: ting 'dzin ye shes sems dpa' grogs mnyam des //
analyzed: ting 'dzin ye shes sems dpa' grogs mnyam des //
translated: The samādhi of the wisdom being, the friend who is the same,🔽is the blessing of one’s mind as a miracle.

original: bdag 'dod pa yi dngos grub ster re ba //
analyzed: bdag 'dod pa yi dngos grub ster re ba //
translated: One hopes that it will bestow the desired siddhi.

original: rang 'byung chos nyid de la 'dod len med //
analyzed: rang 'byung chos nyid de la 'dod len med //
translated: That self-originated dharmatā does not have any desire.

original: rang sems bya med mi tshe gsum mi phrad //
analyzed: rang sems bya med mi tshe gsum mi phrad //
translated: One’s mind without activity will not meet with the life of three.

original: kun byed nga yis lung bstan ma yin no //
analyzed: kun byed nga yis lung bstan ma yin no //
translated: I, the all-creating one, do not prophesy that.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: rang las byung ba'i chos nyid lhar byas nas //
analyzed: rang las byung ba'i chos nyid lhar byas nas //
translated: Having made the dharmatā that arises from oneself into a deity,

original: phyag rgya bzhi dang snying po 'phro 'du yis //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi dang snying po 'phro 'du yis //
translated: through the emanation and gathering of the four mudras and the essence,

original: mi 'gyur ba yi chos nyid rgyur sgrub byed //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba yi chos nyid rgyur sgrub byed //
translated: the cause is accomplished as the unchanging dharmatā.

original: sems kyi ting 'dzin dbang gis thob sems pa //
analyzed: sems kyi ting 'dzin dbang gis thob sems pa //
translated: It is thought that it is attained through the power of mental samādhi.

original: des kyang thob par nga yis lung ma bstan //
analyzed: des kyang thob par nga yis lung ma bstan //
translated: I do not prophesy that it will be attained by that.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: gzhi ma dbyings la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhi ma dbyings la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the basis, the dhātu, does not change,

original: dbyings de 'gyur par nga yis lung ma bstan //🔽dbyings la dbang @49a *//
analyzed: dbyings de 'gyur par nga yis lung ma bstan // dbyings la dbang @49a *//
translated: I do not prophesy that the dhātu changes.

original: bsgyur byed pa'i sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: bsgyur byed pa'i sku gsum gyis //
translated: The three kāyas that control power over the dhātu

original: rang 'khor zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin bstan //
analyzed: rang 'khor zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin bstan //
translated: demonstrate the samādhi that seeks śamatha for one’s retinue.

original: des na 'dren pa'i lung du bstan pa yin //
analyzed: des na 'dren pa'i lung du bstan pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is explained in the scriptures of the guides.

original: de bzhin nam mkha' 'gyur ba med pa de //
analyzed: de bzhin nam mkha' 'gyur ba med pa de //
translated: Likewise, that unchanging space

original: rang nyid nam mkhas nam mkha' 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang nyid nam mkhas nam mkha' 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: will not be accomplished by space itself.

original: de bzhin chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa de //
analyzed: de bzhin chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa de //
translated: Likewise, that unchanging dharmatā

original: rang nyid chos kyis chos nyid 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang nyid chos kyis chos nyid 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: will not be accomplished by the dharmatā itself.

original: de bzhin sems nyid 'gyur ba med pa de //
analyzed: de bzhin sems nyid 'gyur ba med pa de //
translated: Likewise, the unchanging nature of mind

original: sems nyid rang gi sems nyid 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sems nyid rang gi sems nyid 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: Is not accomplished by the nature of mind itself.

original: mi 'gyur sgyur bar byed pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
analyzed: mi 'gyur sgyur bar byed pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
translated: The samādhi that transforms the unchanging

original: dus dang smon lam re ba 'jog pa yi //
analyzed: dus dang smon lam re ba 'jog pa yi //
translated: Is the placement of hopes and aspirations in time.

original: dus la ltos pas ting 'dzin tshi chad 'gyur //
analyzed: dus la ltos pas ting 'dzin tshi chad 'gyur //
translated: Since samādhi depends on time, it is cut off.

original: kun byed nga yis nges lung bstan pa med //
analyzed: kun byed nga yis nges lung bstan pa med //
translated: I, the all-creating one, do not give definitive prophecies.

original: ces gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽From the Tantra of the Great and Perfect Dynamic Energy of the Lion, this is chapter 8:🔽The Uncontrived Nature of Mind, the Unchanging and Undeluded Ground of Being.

original: bya med rdzogs pa 'gyur med btsal mi rnyed pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: bya med rdzogs pa 'gyur med btsal mi rnyed pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER 9🔽The Nature of Mind🔽The King of the Awakened Mind, the All-Creating Monarch,

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po nges sems rnal du bzhag pa 'di gsungs so //
