analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po nges sems rnal du bzhag pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Speaks of the Nature of Mind, Resting in Its Natural State🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: Listen, great and courageous one!

original: nga ni kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga ni kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: I am the all-creating awakened mind.

original: chos rnams thams cad nga yin te //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad nga yin te //
translated: I am all phenomena.

original: nga yi rang bzhin thams cad ni //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin thams cad ni //
translated: The nature of all of me

original: ye nas rnal du bzhag pa yin //
analyzed: ye nas rnal du bzhag pa yin //
translated: Is timelessly and naturally at rest.

original: nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
translated: The nature of me, the all-creating one, is shown to be

original: rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya //
translated: Should be understood as fivefold.

original: ston pa bstan pa 'khor gnas dus //
analyzed: ston pa bstan pa 'khor gnas dus //
translated: The teacher, the teaching, the retinue, the place, and the time

original: rnam lnga rang bzhin rnal du bzhag /
analyzed: rnam lnga rang bzhin rnal du bzhag /
translated: Are the five natures that rest in naturalness.

original: ston pa'i rang @49b bzhin 'di ltar bzhag /
analyzed: ston pa'i rang @49b bzhin 'di ltar bzhag /
translated: The nature of the teacher is left in this way:

original: chos sku ma bcos rnal du bzhag /
analyzed: chos sku ma bcos rnal du bzhag /
translated: The unfabricated dharmakāya rests in naturalness.

original: rang nga'i rang bzhin de bzhag yin //🔽longs spyod ma bcos ngo bo bzhag /🔽nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa yin //
analyzed: rang nga'i rang bzhin de bzhag yin // longs spyod ma bcos ngo bo bzhag / nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa yin //
translated: The nature of my own nature is left.

original: sprul pa ma bcos thugs rje bzhag /
analyzed: sprul pa ma bcos thugs rje bzhag /
translated: The essence of the unfabricated sambhogakāya is left.

original: nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa ste //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa ste //
translated: The nature of my own nature is left.

original: rang 'byung ye shes bzhag pa yin //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes bzhag pa yin //
translated: The nature of self-originated pristine consciousness is left.

original: gnas ni gang na gnas pa'i gnas //
analyzed: gnas ni gang na gnas pa'i gnas //
translated: The place is the place where anything is left.

original: de yang rnal du bzhag pa yin //🔽dus ni snga phyi gang tshogs dus //
analyzed: de yang rnal du bzhag pa yin // dus ni snga phyi gang tshogs dus //
translated: That also is left in naturalness.🔽The time is the time when anything is gathered.

original: rnal bzhag dus su tshogs pa yin //
analyzed: rnal bzhag dus su tshogs pa yin //
translated: The gathering is left in the time.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig /🔽phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig / phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga //
translated: Oh! Great being, listen now!🔽The five perfections

original: ma bcos rnal du bzhag pa las //
analyzed: ma bcos rnal du bzhag pa las //
translated: Are left in the unfabricated state of naturalness.

original: chos zhes bya ba gzhan yod med //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba gzhan yod med //
translated: Apart from that, there is no so-called dharma.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Oh! Great being!

original: phun sum tshogs par ma 'dus pa'i //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs par ma 'dus pa'i //
translated: There is not a single phenomenon🔽That is not included in the perfect

original: chos ni gcig kyang yod ma gsungs //
analyzed: chos ni gcig kyang yod ma gsungs //
translated: He did not teach any dharma at all.🔽

original: kye; nga ni rnal du bzhag pa yis //
analyzed: kye; nga ni rnal du bzhag pa yis //
translated: Kyé! Since I am in natural rest,

original: thams cad chos nyid grol ba yin //🔽ston pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin //
analyzed: thams cad chos nyid grol ba yin // ston pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin //
translated: Everything is liberated in dharmatā.🔽The unfabricated dharmatā of the teacher is liberated.

original: bstan pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin //
analyzed: bstan pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin //
translated: The unfabricated dharmatā of the teaching is liberated.

original: 'khor yang ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin //
analyzed: 'khor yang ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin //
translated: The unfabricated dharmatā of the retinue is liberated.

original: kye; thams cad grol bar bshad pas na //
analyzed: kye; thams cad grol bar bshad pas na //
translated: Kyé! Since everything is explained as liberated,

original: rang lus ma bcos lha ma bsgom //
analyzed: rang lus ma bcos lha ma bsgom //
translated: Do not fabricate the body and meditate on the deity.

original: smra ba'i tshig dang ngag ma 'chos //
analyzed: smra ba'i tshig dang ngag ma 'chos //
translated: Do not fabricate speech and words.

original: ting 'dzin ma byed sems ma 'chos //🔽bcos pas rnal du 'byor med pas //🔽rnal du ma 'byor grol mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ting 'dzin ma byed sems ma 'chos // bcos pas rnal du 'byor med pas // rnal du ma 'byor grol mi 'gyur //
translated: Do not fabricate samādhi and mind.🔽Since there is no natural rest through fabrication,🔽If there is no natural rest, there is no liberation.

original: ma grol chos nyid mnyam mi thob //
analyzed: ma grol chos nyid mnyam mi thob //
translated: If there is no liberation, the equality of dharmatā is not attained.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste //
translated: Kyé! Great and courageous one, it is like this:

original: byang chub sems kyi kun byed rgyal po ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi kun byed rgyal po ni //
translated: The all-creating King of Awakened Mind

original: ye nas @50a *//
analyzed: ye nas @50a *//
translated: Is primordially

original: 'das pa'i rnal du bzhag pa la //
analyzed: 'das pa'i rnal du bzhag pa la //
translated: In natural rest beyond.

original: lta ba rnams kyis rnal du 'jog mi shes //
analyzed: lta ba rnams kyis rnal du 'jog mi shes //
translated: The views do not know how to rest in naturalness.

original: rdzogs chen kun byed ye nas rnal bzhag la //
analyzed: rdzogs chen kun byed ye nas rnal bzhag la //
translated: In the Great Perfection, the primordial natural state of the all-creating one,

original: nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyis thos mthong na //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyis thos mthong na //
translated: if the hearers and solitary realizers hear or see it,

original: dug skye zer nas rang sems spong 'gegs 'gyur //
analyzed: dug skye zer nas rang sems spong 'gegs 'gyur //
translated: they will say that it is poisonous and will reject or block their own minds.

original: des kyang lta ba rnal du 'jog ma shes //
analyzed: des kyang lta ba rnal du 'jog ma shes //
translated: They do not know how to rest in the natural state of the view.

original: bskal pa grangs med 'jog mi shes la gnas //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med 'jog mi shes la gnas //
translated: They remain in a state of not knowing how to rest for countless eons.

original: theg chen mdo sdes rdzogs chen thos 'gyur na //
analyzed: theg chen mdo sdes rdzogs chen thos 'gyur na //
translated: If they hear the Great Perfection from the sutras of the Mahayana,

original: rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te //
analyzed: rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te //
translated: they will not realize their own mind as suchness.

original: ji bzhin nyid du 'jog pa ma shes te //
analyzed: ji bzhin nyid du 'jog pa ma shes te //
translated: They will not know how to rest in suchness.

original: bgrod cing spyod la bskal pa gsum du gnas //
analyzed: bgrod cing spyod la bskal pa gsum du gnas //
translated: They will remain for three eons on the path of conduct.

original: rjes su rnal 'byor sems dpas thos 'gyur na //
analyzed: rjes su rnal 'byor sems dpas thos 'gyur na //
translated: If the bodhisattvas of subsequent yoga hear it,

original: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams de bzhin la //🔽rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs par //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams de bzhin la // rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs par //
translated: they will think that phenomena, which appear in this way, are suchness.🔽Without realizing their own mind as suchness,

original: ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma shes pas //
analyzed: ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma shes pas //
translated: they will not know how to rest in the natural state of suchness.

original: byang chub yan lag cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis //
translated: Through the various magical displays of the branches of enlightenment,

original: byin rlobs sems la mi tshe bdun par gnas //
analyzed: byin rlobs sems la mi tshe bdun par gnas //
translated: they will remain for seven human lifetimes in a state of blessing their minds.

original: rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis thos 'gyur na //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis thos 'gyur na //
translated: If the great yogis hear this,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin pas na //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin pas na //
translated: Because it is the nature of cause and effect,

original: ye nas yin la gdod rtsol sgrub par byed //
analyzed: ye nas yin la gdod rtsol sgrub par byed //
translated: They have always been so, but now they strive and accomplish.

original: stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag drug tu ni //
analyzed: stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag drug tu ni //
translated: In two thousand and six hundred years,

original: ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa mi shes te //
analyzed: ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa mi shes te //
translated: They will not know how to rest in the natural state just as it is,

original: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sa la gnas par byed //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sa la gnas par byed //
translated: And they will abide on the stage of the three samadhis.

original: yongs su rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na //
analyzed: yongs su rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na //
translated: If the thoroughly dedicated yogis hear this,

original: ye nas yin la rgyu 'bras ming brtags nas //
analyzed: ye nas yin la rgyu 'bras ming brtags nas //
translated: They have always been so, but having designated cause and effect,

original: ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma @50b shes te //
analyzed: ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma @50b shes te //
translated: They will not know how to rest in the natural state just as it is.

original: rgyu ni dag pa chos kyi dbyings su grub //
analyzed: rgyu ni dag pa chos kyi dbyings su grub //
translated: The cause is established in the pure dhatu of phenomena.

original: 'bras bu dag pa ye shes dkyil 'khor grub //
analyzed: 'bras bu dag pa ye shes dkyil 'khor grub //
translated: The result is established in the pure mandala of wisdom.

original: bar mchod kyis mi tshe gcig tu gnas //
analyzed: bar mchod kyis mi tshe gcig tu gnas //
translated: They will abide for a human lifetime in the middle offering.

original: shin tu rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na //
translated: If the extremely dedicated yogis hear this,

original: ye nas sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: ye nas sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur //
translated: They will always abide on the stage of buddhahood.

original: bya med bde ba chen po 'di yis thob //
analyzed: bya med bde ba chen po 'di yis thob //
translated: They will attain this great bliss without activity.

original: bsgrub pa med par ye nas sangs rgyas thob //
analyzed: bsgrub pa med par ye nas sangs rgyas thob //
translated: They will attain buddhahood without accomplishment.

original: lha mi sems can dbang po mi mthun te //🔽la la dbang po sbyangs pa'i 'phro can yod //
analyzed: lha mi sems can dbang po mi mthun te // la la dbang po sbyangs pa'i 'phro can yod //
translated: The faculties of gods, humans, and sentient beings are not the same.🔽Some have faculties that are ready to be refined.

original: la la dbang po ye nas chig chod yod //
analyzed: la la dbang po ye nas chig chod yod //
translated: Some have faculties that are completely resolved from the beginning.

original: des na dgos ched don zhes bstan pa yin //
analyzed: des na dgos ched don zhes bstan pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is explained as the meaning of the purpose.🔽Atiyoga, the Great Perfection

original: aa ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ba; ;aa ti zhes ni sgra yi tshig tu bstan //
analyzed: aa ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ba; ;aa ti zhes ni sgra yi tshig tu bstan //
translated: Ati is explained as a verbal term.

original: aa ni ma skyes chos nyid rnal du bzhag /
analyzed: aa ni ma skyes chos nyid rnal du bzhag /
translated: A is the unborn nature of phenomena, resting in naturalness.

original: ti ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub par bsten //
analyzed: ti ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub par bsten //
translated: Ti is the effortless attainment of non-aspiration.

original: yo ga shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen la //
analyzed: yo ga shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen la //
translated: In the Great Perfection, the extremely unelaborate yoga,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu yod zer smra byed pa //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu yod zer smra byed pa //
translated: Those who say there is cause and effect

original: de ni rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i don mi ldan //
analyzed: de ni rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i don mi ldan //
translated: Do not possess the realized meaning of the Great Perfection.

original: don dam kun rdzob gnyis su smra byed na //
analyzed: don dam kun rdzob gnyis su smra byed na //
translated: If one speaks of the two, the ultimate and the relative,

original: sgro dang skur ba 'debs pa'i tshig yin te //
analyzed: sgro dang skur ba 'debs pa'i tshig yin te //
translated: It is a statement that superimposes and denigrates.

original: de yis gnyis su med pa rtogs pa med //
analyzed: de yis gnyis su med pa rtogs pa med //
translated: By that, nonduality is not realized.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yang //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yang //
translated: The realization of the buddhas of the three times

original: gnyis su ma mthong rnal bzhag nyid du 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mthong rnal bzhag nyid du 'dod //
translated: Is also asserted as the natural equipoise of non-dualistic vision.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: In the Bodhichitta Vajra Pañjarā, it says:🔽🔽

original: dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o ////
translated: This is the thirty-ninth chapter of The All-Creating Sovereign, the mind of perfect enlightenment, “The Transcendent State of Resting in Naturalness.”

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi snying po sems dpa' rdo rje la /
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi snying po sems dpa' rdo rje la /
translated: Then the all-creating sovereign, the mind of perfect enlightenment,

original: sems @51a *// dpa' rdo rje nyid kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa'i lung mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: sems @51a *// dpa' rdo rje nyid kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa'i lung mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di gsungs so //
translated: taught the vajra being, the essence of its own being, the transmission of perfection free of action, the victory banner that never falls.

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig /🔽sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid la //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig / sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid la //
translated: “Oh, listen, vajra being!🔽Vajra being, I will teach you

original: nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan par bya //
analyzed: nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan par bya //
translated: the nature of your own being.

original: nyid ni kun byed nga yin te //
analyzed: nyid ni kun byed nga yin te //
translated: I am the all-creating one,

original: nga ni ye nas byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga ni ye nas byang chub sems //
translated: and I am timelessly awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems ni 'di lta'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni 'di lta'o //
translated: Awakened mind is like this:

original: des na byang chub gyi sems kun byed rgyal po des mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan nam mkha' che 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: des na byang chub gyi sems kun byed rgyal po des mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan nam mkha' che 'di gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the all-creating sovereign, awakened mind, taught this victory banner that never falls, the vast sky.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che //
translated: Vajra being, vast sky,

original: kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings //
translated: Samantabhadra, the vast expanse of reality,

original: rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir //
analyzed: rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir //
translated: In order to liberate all on the great, pure path,

original: mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs //
analyzed: mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs //
translated: Do not give rise to, do not cease, and do not think of anything.

original: byams pas don nyid rnam sbyangs phyir //
analyzed: byams pas don nyid rnam sbyangs phyir //
translated: In order to purify the meaning itself with love,

original: snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad //
analyzed: snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad //
translated: Do not do anything with great compassion.🔽The great one, with the great profundity,

original: che bas che ba'i zab mo yis; ;yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med //
analyzed: che bas che ba'i zab mo yis; ;yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med //
translated: Does not praise any qualities at all.

original: don rnams ji bzhin mi bskyod de //
analyzed: don rnams ji bzhin mi bskyod de //
translated: The meaning is just as it is, unshakable,

original: bya ba med pas grol bas grol //
analyzed: bya ba med pas grol bas grol //
translated: Liberated by being without activity.

original: nges 'byung ye shes btsal med pas //
analyzed: nges 'byung ye shes btsal med pas //
translated: Since there is no search for the wisdom of renunciation,

original: grol na grol ba'i lam yang ston //
analyzed: grol na grol ba'i lam yang ston //
translated: If liberated, the path of liberation is also shown.

original: 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The great elements are the Bhagavān,

original: grol ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: grol ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
translated: Naturally abiding in all liberations.

original: phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang //
translated: Even though they are imagined in error,🔽Liberation is self-arisen, not from another.

original: grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min; ;che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min; ;che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba //
translated: The great wisdom that is difficult to attain

original: shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub //
analyzed: shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub //
translated: Is accomplished by relying on wisdom and method.

original: ming tsam gzhan la brten 'dra yang //
analyzed: ming tsam gzhan la brten 'dra yang //
translated: Although it seems to rely on another that is merely a name,

original: mngon sum bde ba rang las 'byung //
analyzed: mngon sum bde ba rang las 'byung //
translated: The bliss of direct perception arises from oneself.

original: cho 'phrul @51b chen po dka' ba min //
analyzed: cho 'phrul @51b chen po dka' ba min //
translated: The great miracle is not difficult.

original: yon tan kun dang stobs kyi rnams //
analyzed: yon tan kun dang stobs kyi rnams //
translated: All qualities and powers

original: ji bzhin rtog pa phra ba yis //
analyzed: ji bzhin rtog pa phra ba yis //
translated: The subtle concept just as it is

original: de ma thag tu rang las 'byung //
analyzed: de ma thag tu rang las 'byung //
translated: arises from itself in an instant.

original: snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
translated: The dharmatā free from appearances

original: ma btsal bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin //
analyzed: ma btsal bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin //
translated: is the meditation of resting without searching.

original: de dang der ni rnam btsal na //
analyzed: de dang der ni rnam btsal na //
translated: Having searched here and there,

original: de las de bzhin de mi 'byung //
analyzed: de las de bzhin de mi 'byung //
translated: that does not arise from that.

original: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni //
translated: The dharmatā of the supreme secret

original: rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur //
translated: is not heard with the other ear.

original: de bzhin lce yi dbang pos kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin lce yi dbang pos kyang //
translated: Likewise, the organ of the tongue

original: de la brjod du rdul tsam med //
analyzed: de la brjod du rdul tsam med //
translated: does not express even a particle of that.

original: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems //
translated: The suffering of migrating beings

original: kun tu chub pas rnam par grol //
analyzed: kun tu chub pas rnam par grol //
translated: is completely liberated through bodhicitta.

original: de la bskyod pa med bzhin du //
analyzed: de la bskyod pa med bzhin du //
translated: Although there is no movement in that,

original: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam par gnas //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam par gnas //
translated: it is the same as the end of space.

original: khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa la //
analyzed: khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa la //
translated: In the sameness of all special things,

original: las so zhes ni rnam par brtags //
analyzed: las so zhes ni rnam par brtags //
translated: karma is imputed.

original: ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na //
analyzed: ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na //
translated: If it were under the power of karma,

original: rang 'byung ye shes yod ma yin //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes yod ma yin //
translated: there would be no self-originated pristine consciousness.

original: rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra //
analyzed: rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra //
translated: The cause itself is like a vajra condition.

original: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med //
analyzed: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med //
translated: Since it is not born, it does not perish.

original: gdod nas snying po byang chub la //
analyzed: gdod nas snying po byang chub la //
translated: In the beginning, the essence is enlightenment.

original: btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod //
analyzed: btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod //
translated: The realm is unmoved by the thought of searching.🔽The concentration of great qualities

original: yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni; ;bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du med //
analyzed: yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni; ;bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du med //
translated: is not to be thought of because of being concentration.

original: ma bsam ma sbyangs chos bzhin du //
analyzed: ma bsam ma sbyangs chos bzhin du //
translated: Not thinking, not training, in accordance with the Dharma,

original: rnam rtog nyid las ye shes skyes //
analyzed: rnam rtog nyid las ye shes skyes //
translated: wisdom arises from conceptuality itself.

original: phra ba'i sgo mor ming brtags te //
analyzed: phra ba'i sgo mor ming brtags te //
translated: A name is designated as the subtle gateway,

original: sems kyi dben pa lam tshol zhing //
analyzed: sems kyi dben pa lam tshol zhing //
translated: and the mind seeks the path of solitude.

original: dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin cing //
analyzed: dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin cing //
translated: Grasping at solitude in the lineage of the forest,

original: brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom //
analyzed: brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom //
translated: if analyzed, it is conceptual meditation.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur ming btags te //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur ming btags te //
translated: A name is designated as cause and effect,

original: dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par @52a *//
analyzed: dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par @52a *//
translated: and both virtue and evil are eliminated.

original: sel; ;'jig rten 'di las 'byung ngo zhes //
analyzed: sel; ;'jig rten 'di las 'byung ngo zhes //
translated: “I will emerge from this world,”

original: blang dor phrod pa mchog tu bskyed //
analyzed: blang dor phrod pa mchog tu bskyed //
translated: and the supreme is generated in the equipoise of acceptance and rejection.

original: chags dang ma chags tshig gi lam //🔽dbu ma bzhin te brag cha 'dra; ;bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes //
analyzed: chags dang ma chags tshig gi lam // dbu ma bzhin te brag cha 'dra; ;bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes //
translated: The path of words, attached and unattached,🔽is like the middle and is like an echo.🔽The protector of beings, the bodhisattva, said,

original: 'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs //
translated: “Happiness and suffering are concordant causes.”

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang //
translated: Attachment, anger, and stupidity

original: byang chub chen po'i lam las byung //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i lam las byung //
translated: And arise from the path of great awakening.

original: kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang //
analyzed: kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang //
translated: The five qualities of conduct

original: chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs //
analyzed: chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs //
translated: Are said to be the ornaments of the dharmadhatu.

original: nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing //
analyzed: nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing //
translated: Space is non-arising, free from concepts,

original: rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: And that very concept is like space.

original: mi chags nam mkha'i sngo ba las //
analyzed: mi chags nam mkha'i sngo ba las //
translated: From the non-attachment of the blue sky,

original: rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung //
analyzed: rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung //
translated: The great self-benefit, space, arises.

original: rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku //
analyzed: rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku //
translated: The non-conceptual, uniform dharmakaya

original: gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra //
analyzed: gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra //
translated: Cannot be grasped, like a moon in water.

original: kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis //
translated: Through the display of Samantabhadra,

original: a'a li k'a li zab tu bstan //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zab tu bstan //
translated: The Ali Kali is profoundly revealed.

original: 'di ni aa dang mdzes pa'i ta //
analyzed: 'di ni aa dang mdzes pa'i ta //
translated: This is the A and the beautiful T,

original: pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin //
analyzed: pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin //
translated: Like the four elaborations of the branches.

original: 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la //
analyzed: 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la //
translated: In the domain of all worldly conduct,

original: sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung //
translated: The profound speech of the Buddha arises.

original: ae ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di //
analyzed: ae ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di //
translated: Emaho! This domain of the Buddha

original: btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de //
analyzed: btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de //
translated: Is not a place to be found through searching.

original: drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas //🔽mdongs pas nam mkha' bsnyabs pa bzhin //
analyzed: drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas // mdongs pas nam mkha' bsnyabs pa bzhin //
translated: Since there is no object like the dharma of the six,🔽It is like a blind person reaching for the sky.

original: gong nas gong du tshangs pa'i lam //
analyzed: gong nas gong du tshangs pa'i lam //
translated: The path of Brahma from above to above

original: bya bral chos dang mthun pa min //
analyzed: bya bral chos dang mthun pa min //
translated: And not in accord with the Dharma of freedom from activity.

original: ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na //
analyzed: ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na //
translated: If one were to traverse a path,

original: nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med //
translated: There would be no attainment, like the end of space.

original: de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir //
translated: Thus, just as it is, for that reason,🔽That is taught, and that is attained.

original: de la de bstan de yang @52b thob; ;de ni snying po de bas na //
analyzed: de la de bstan de yang @52b thob; ;de ni snying po de bas na //
translated: That is the essence, therefore,

original: de las de 'byung ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: de las de 'byung ngo mtshar che //
translated: That arises from that is most amazing.

original: sngon gyi de dang da ltar de //
analyzed: sngon gyi de dang da ltar de //
translated: That of the past and that of the present

original: de bzhin de yi gnas su che //
analyzed: de bzhin de yi gnas su che //
translated: Are just so, great in that place.

original: de ltar de yi lam 'dra ba //
analyzed: de ltar de yi lam 'dra ba //
translated: Thus, that path is similar to that;

original: de ni de yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni de yi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is its nature.

original: de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam //
translated: The path of all that is similar

original: zla ba las byung rten dang bcas //
analyzed: zla ba las byung rten dang bcas //
translated: Is supported by the arising of the moon.

original: kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la //
analyzed: kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la //
translated: Since it is the equality of all,

original: phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med //
analyzed: phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med //
translated: It is not established by looking in a direction.

original: da ltar bde dang phyi mar bde //
analyzed: da ltar bde dang phyi mar bde //
translated: Happiness now and happiness later

original: mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas 'byung //
analyzed: mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas 'byung //
translated: Are direct and arise from behind.

original: de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas //
translated: Since that is also a fault of the aspect,

original: de la brten par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la brten par mi bya'o //
translated: Do not rely on that.

original: dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med //
analyzed: dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med //
translated: The three times are one, without distinctions.

original: sngon med phyis med gdod nas 'byung //
analyzed: sngon med phyis med gdod nas 'byung //
translated: Without before and after, it arises from the beginning.

original: chos skus khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: chos skus khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of being pervaded by the dharmakāya, they are one.

original: che ba'i chen po rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: che ba'i chen po rang bzhin gnas //
translated: The great of the great is naturally abiding.

original: srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang //
analyzed: srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang //
translated: Even though there is engagement in the three existences,

original: ming tsam sgyu mar snang ba ste //
analyzed: ming tsam sgyu mar snang ba ste //
translated: it is merely a name, appearing as an illusion.

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnas chen yang //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnas chen yang //
translated: Even though there is a great place for a cakravartin,

original: sgyu ma sbyong ba'i bsti gnas yin //
analyzed: sgyu ma sbyong ba'i bsti gnas yin //
translated: it is a place for training in illusion.

original: rnam spyod dus la ltos pa rnams //
analyzed: rnam spyod dus la ltos pa rnams //
translated: Those who depend on the time of conduct

original: dus de 'byung bar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: dus de 'byung bar mi 'gyur te //
translated: will not have that time arise.

original: ma bral smon pa spyod pas na //
analyzed: ma bral smon pa spyod pas na //
translated: Since one is not separated from the conduct of aspiration,

original: stong pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bzhin //
analyzed: stong pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bzhin //
translated: it is as it is said, the characteristic of emptiness.

original: gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med //
analyzed: gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med //
translated: It is one, but it is completely nonexistent.

original: rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas //
translated: Yoga is abiding in the path of the sky bird.

original: ma byung ma skyes snying po la //
analyzed: ma byung ma skyes snying po la //
translated: In the unborn, nonarising heart essence,

original: sgros btags chos kun ga la yod //
analyzed: sgros btags chos kun ga la yod //
translated: how could there be any phenomena that are imputed with labels?🔽The outer and the inner are both outer and both inner,

original: phyi nang gnyis ka phyi nyid nang; ;zab mo cha shas rtogs yul med //
analyzed: phyi nang gnyis ka phyi nyid nang; ;zab mo cha shas rtogs yul med //
translated: without an object to be realized in the profound parts.

original: srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs //
analyzed: srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs //
translated: Existence is merely a name, the power of error.

original: de bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral //
analyzed: de bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral //
translated: Therefore, it is free from the sameness of samādhi.

original: de la tha tshig phyi dang nang //
analyzed: de la tha tshig phyi dang nang //
translated: The outer and inner of that

original: rang bzhin phung po khams @53a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin phung po khams @53a *//
translated: are the aggregates and elements of the nature.

original: bzhin gnas // dus gsum 'di dang mi 'bral bas //
analyzed: bzhin gnas // dus gsum 'di dang mi 'bral bas //
translated: Since it is inseparable from this present moment of the three times,

original: tha tshig ming du btags pa med //
analyzed: tha tshig ming du btags pa med //
translated: there is no name designated as a pledge.

original: mi g-yo ba ni sku yi rgya //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ni sku yi rgya //
translated: The seal of the body is unwavering.

original: mi bskyod pas ni ye shes te //
analyzed: mi bskyod pas ni ye shes te //
translated: The pristine consciousness is unmoving.

original: mi len pa ni bdag med cing //
analyzed: mi len pa ni bdag med cing //
translated: Not accepting is the absence of a self,

original: mi 'dor tshig bral mnyam nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'dor tshig bral mnyam nyid do //
translated: and not rejecting is the equality free from words.

original: gang dang gang gi gang du yang //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi gang du yang //
translated: In any place, for anyone,

original: kun 'khol kun spyod bdag las byung //🔽'di la skyes pa bud med ces //
analyzed: kun 'khol kun spyod bdag las byung // 'di la skyes pa bud med ces //
translated: the self arises as the universal enjoyment and universal activity.

original: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs //
translated: The king of equality has never said

original: 'di la brtul zhugs drag shul gyis //
analyzed: 'di la brtul zhugs drag shul gyis //
translated: that there are men and women in this.

original: gnas su bya ba'i ming med de //
analyzed: gnas su bya ba'i ming med de //
translated: There is no name for a place🔽that is to be made by the strict discipline of austerities.

original: aa dang par ni rnam ldan na //
analyzed: aa dang par ni rnam ldan na //
translated: If one possesses the first a,

original: sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar 'dod //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar 'dod //
translated: the bliss of illusion is said to arise.

original: rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas //
translated: Since the nature is not ascertained as one thing,

original: ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang //
analyzed: ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang //
translated: it appears as it is seen.

original: snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang //
analyzed: snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang //
translated: The mind of effort that wishes for appearances

original: de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin //
analyzed: de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin //
translated: is a great fault that obscures that.

original: byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgo //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgo //
translated: The door of all the branches of enlightenment

original: cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin //
analyzed: cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin //
translated: is like a reflection of the moon in water through the cultivation of attire.

original: ma gos ma chags 'byung 'gyur yang //
analyzed: ma gos ma chags 'byung 'gyur yang //
translated: Although one becomes free from defilement and attachment,

original: bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin //
analyzed: bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin //
translated: Through meditation, it is like the domain of childish beings.

original: dkyil 'khor khro gnyer cha lugs kyis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor khro gnyer cha lugs kyis //
translated: With a wrathful demeanor in the maṇḍala,

original: khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas //
analyzed: khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas //
translated: Having taken on the body of the great lord of wrath,

original: yi ge mngon du byung na yang //
analyzed: yi ge mngon du byung na yang //
translated: Even though the syllables manifest,

original: zhi bde nyid mthong ba min //
analyzed: zhi bde nyid mthong ba min //
translated: The state of peace is not seen.

original: nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis na //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis na //
translated: Under the power of afflictions,🔽Like the head of a palm tree,🔽Or a seed burned by fire,

original: ta la'i mgo bo bcad pa dang // sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang // de yi dbang du mi 'gyur ston //
analyzed: ta la'i mgo bo bcad pa dang // sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang // de yi dbang du mi 'gyur ston //
translated: One is shown to be powerless.

original: rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa //
analyzed: rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa //
translated: The various [teachings] are more than a hundred thousand,

original: gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye //
analyzed: gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye //
translated: But no matter how they are practiced, a flower will not grow.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i dbang @53b gis ni //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i dbang @53b gis ni //
translated: Under the power of signlessness,

original: bsti gnas de las 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsti gnas de las 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: One will not emerge from that place.

original: gleng bral 'di la gnas pa ni //
analyzed: gleng bral 'di la gnas pa ni //
translated: One who abides in this silence

original: rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang //
translated: Is a fortunate yogī.

original: bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas //
translated: Since one does not distinguish between one's own and others' benefit,

original: sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol //
analyzed: sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol //
translated: One enjoys the effortless, illusory domain.

original: lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs //
translated: Since there is nothing left, it is totally perfect.

original: 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas //
translated: Unchanging, it abides straight.

original: nam mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing //
translated: Like space, it is equal to the limits.

original: gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin //
translated: It is not a phenomenon that depends on something else.

original: lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen de //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen de //
translated: That spontaneously present great bliss

original: mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis //
translated: Is the incomparable wisdom.

original: rang gi mthu yi rig pa las //
analyzed: rang gi mthu yi rig pa las //
translated: From the awareness of one’s own power,

original: chos ni gzhan las 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: chos ni gzhan las 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: The Dharma does not arise from another.

original: sla zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'//
analyzed: sla zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'//
translated: Easy and difficult, because of easy, difficult.

original: mngon sum mi gnas kun tu khyab //
analyzed: mngon sum mi gnas kun tu khyab //
translated: Directly perceived, not abiding, all-pervading.

original: ming tsam 'di zhes bstan par ni //
analyzed: ming tsam 'di zhes bstan par ni //
translated: This is taught to be merely a name.

original: rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med //
translated: Vajrasattva cannot illustrate it.

original: ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di //
analyzed: ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di //
translated: This marvelous, wondrous display

original: bya bral nam mkha' bzhin du gnas //
analyzed: bya bral nam mkha' bzhin du gnas //
translated: Abides like space, free of activity.

original: cir yang mi dmigs gti mug las //
analyzed: cir yang mi dmigs gti mug las //
translated: Not perceived as anything, from delusion

original: de ma thag tu rang las byung //
analyzed: de ma thag tu rang las byung //
translated: It arises instantly from oneself.

original: 'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam //
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam //
translated: This is the path equal to everything,

original: 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas //
translated: The nature of all migrating beings.

original: bus pas bslad pas 'khrul pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bus pas bslad pas 'khrul pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of being deluded by childish contamination,

original: sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin //
analyzed: sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin //
translated: Like a medicine itself seeking a doctor.

original: go ba'i yul na bde ba che //
analyzed: go ba'i yul na bde ba che //
translated: In the field of understanding, there is great bliss.

original: 'di ni rnam dag 'jig rten yin //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam dag 'jig rten yin //
translated: This is the pure world.

original: de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas //
analyzed: de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas //
translated: The light of the directions gathers there,

original: phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og 'grub //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og 'grub //
translated: And the four directions, the intermediate directions, above and below, are established.

original: ma nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las //
analyzed: ma nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las //
translated: From the indeterminate colors of the rainbow,

original: rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang //🔽de bzhin g-yo rdul mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang // de bzhin g-yo rdul mi g-yo ba //
translated: The distinctions of the families manifestly appear.🔽In the same way, the five elements

original: 'byung ba lnga bas gtso chen yin //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga bas gtso chen yin //
translated: Are more important than the five elements of movement, dust, and immobility.

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs @54a *//🔽da ltar gyi //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs @54a *// da ltar gyi //
translated: The past, future, and present

original: tha snyad ming la mi gnas te //
analyzed: tha snyad ming la mi gnas te //
translated: Do not abide in conventional names.

original: skye 'gag med par rnam brtags shing //
analyzed: skye 'gag med par rnam brtags shing //
translated: Imagining them to be without arising and ceasing,

original: de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor //
analyzed: de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor //
translated: They are connected to the great three times.

original: mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med //
analyzed: mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med //
translated: Since they are the same, there is no arrangement in stages.

original: gcig pas phyogs bcu bsod dang bral //
analyzed: gcig pas phyogs bcu bsod dang bral //
translated: Since they are one, the ten directions are free from merit and sin.

original: tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang //🔽rang bzhin gnas pas 'grim pa med //
analyzed: tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang // rang bzhin gnas pas 'grim pa med //
translated: The adornments of the assembly are also🔽Arranged in the natural abode.🔽Since they are spontaneously present, they are not dedicated,

original: lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsngo zhing; ;gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin //
analyzed: lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsngo zhing; ;gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin //
translated: And since they are primordially pure, they are nectar.

original: 'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par du //
analyzed: 'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par du //
translated: The twelve sense bases are distinguished

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas bzung ba med //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas bzung ba med //
translated: And not grasped with higher intention.

original: yid kyis bsam pas yon gdags te //
analyzed: yid kyis bsam pas yon gdags te //
translated: The mind imagines and offers gifts.

original: bltas pas tshogs ni bkram pa'o //
analyzed: bltas pas tshogs ni bkram pa'o //
translated: By looking, the assembly is spread out.

original: mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la //
analyzed: mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la //
translated: By seeing, there is spiritual power.

original: de nyid mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o //
translated: That itself is the perfection of equipoise.

original: yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin //
analyzed: yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin //
translated: By holding for a moment, there is union.🔽By being delighted, there is the pledge.

original: dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig ste; ;thabs kyis gar thabs bskyod pa yis //
analyzed: dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig ste; ;thabs kyis gar thabs bskyod pa yis //
translated: By the dance movement of the method,

original: gnyis med sbyor ba phul ba yin //
analyzed: gnyis med sbyor ba phul ba yin //
translated: the offering of nondual union is made.

original: mi bzung gtong bas gtong ma yin //
analyzed: mi bzung gtong bas gtong ma yin //
translated: By not holding, there is no giving up.

original: bya ba med pa'i las rnams te //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i las rnams te //
translated: The actions are without activity.

original: mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas //
analyzed: mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas //
translated: Having cleared away hindrances with nonconceptual gnosis,

original: ma gsungs mnyam gzhag sngags tshig go /
analyzed: ma gsungs mnyam gzhag sngags tshig go /
translated: the mantra words of equipoise are not spoken.

original: bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang //
analyzed: bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang //
translated: Worship of the guru, giving, and likewise all merit🔽are without the power of nonattachment and nondistraction;

original: ma chags mi g-yo'i stobs med na; ;byas na 'ching ba chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: ma chags mi g-yo'i stobs med na; ;byas na 'ching ba chen por 'gyur //
translated: if done, they become great bondage.

original: de bas de lung de nyid la //
analyzed: de bas de lung de nyid la //
translated: Therefore, in that very scripture

original: de la de sbyar sgrib par 'gyur //
analyzed: de la de sbyar sgrib par 'gyur //
translated: that is applied to that, there is obscuration.

original: de ltar de la de rtog na //
analyzed: de ltar de la de rtog na //
translated: Thus, if that is imagined in that,

original: de la de nyid grub pa med //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de la de nyid grub pa med //🔽ces gsungs so //
translated: that is not established in that.

original: byang @54b chub kyis sems kun byed rgyal po las /🔽rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////🔽de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des kun byed kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub pa 'di gsungs /🔽kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang //
analyzed: byang @54b chub kyis sems kun byed rgyal po las / rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o //// de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des kun byed kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub pa 'di gsungs / kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig / sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang //
translated: 1. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽2. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽3. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽4. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽5. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽6. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽7. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽8. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽9. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽10. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽11. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽12. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽13. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽14. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽15. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽16. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽17. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽18. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽19. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽20. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽21. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽22. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽23. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽24. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽25.
