The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽32. The Nature of the King, Who is the Primordial State🔽33. The Nature of the King

original: cha shas nyid du spros dang bral //🔽ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang //🔽rnam par snang mdzad kun tu bzang //🔽zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te //🔽lhun gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /🔽rdo rje tshig drug gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: cha shas nyid du spros dang bral //🔽ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang //🔽rnam par snang mdzad kun tu bzang //🔽zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te //🔽lhun gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /🔽rdo rje tshig drug gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o ////
translated: This is the thirty-first chapter, on the vajra pinnacle, from The Tantra of the Secret Essence Definitive Nature Just As It Is, Called The Definitive Nature of All Phenomena.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la ma byas don grub kyi lung nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la ma byas don grub kyi lung nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, the all-creating mind of awakening, the sovereign, spoke this chapter of four verses of definitive transmission to the bodhisattva Vajra, the one who accomplishes what is to be done.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar don rig gis //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar don rig gis //
translated: O great bodhisattva, in this way, know the meaning:

original: ji ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid du gcig /
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid du gcig /
translated: What appears is one with suchness.

original: 'di la su yang 'chos par ma byed cig /
analyzed: 'di la su yang 'chos par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not contrive anything in this.

original: ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de la ni //
analyzed: ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de la ni //
translated: In that uncontrived, uniform king,

original: mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa de la gnas //
analyzed: mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa de la gnas //
translated: the nonconceptual transcendent state of dharmakaya is present.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This is the thirty-second chapter.

original: nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////🔽de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid las byung ba'i chos @55a *//
analyzed: nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //// de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid las byung ba'i chos @55a *//
translated: The chapter on the definitive four verses from the all-creating mind of awakening, the sovereign.

original: nyid de nyid kyi rig pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba /
analyzed: nyid de nyid kyi rig pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba /
translated: Then, the bodhisattva Vajra, the one who knows the nature of phenomena that arises from the all-creating mind of awakening, the sovereign, is called “the awareness wisdom being.”

original: chos thams cad rig par byed pa'i rgyal po rang 'byung gi ye shes de la nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba 'di bstan to //
analyzed: chos thams cad rig par byed pa'i rgyal po rang 'byung gi ye shes de la nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba 'di bstan to //
translated: The king who makes all phenomena known, self-originated pristine consciousness, is difficult to realize.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /🔽yid kyi dbang pos sgra rtogs shig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po / yid kyi dbang pos sgra rtogs shig /
translated: O great and courageous one,🔽the meaning of the words should be understood with the mental faculty.

original: sgra yis don de rtogs rigs byos //
analyzed: sgra yis don de rtogs rigs byos //
translated: The meaning of the words should be understood with the mind.

original: kun gyi gnas ni chos kyi dbyings yin na //
analyzed: kun gyi gnas ni chos kyi dbyings yin na //
translated: If the place of all is the dharmadhātu,

original: dbyings kyi sgra don ji ltar rig par byed //
analyzed: dbyings kyi sgra don ji ltar rig par byed //
translated: how is the meaning of the word dhātu to be understood?

original: kun gyi lung yul nam mkha'i khams 'di la //
analyzed: kun gyi lung yul nam mkha'i khams 'di la //
translated: If the domain of the scriptures of all is the element of space,

original: nam mkha'i sgra don ji ltar rig par byed //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sgra don ji ltar rig par byed //
translated: how is the meaning of the word space to be understood?

original: mngon du gsal ba 'byung ba lnga yin na //
analyzed: mngon du gsal ba 'byung ba lnga yin na //
translated: If the five elements that appear manifestly are the manifest appearances,

original: mngon du snang ba'i don ni ji ltar rig /
analyzed: mngon du snang ba'i don ni ji ltar rig /
translated: how is the meaning of the manifest appearances to be understood?

original: de las byung ba'i khams gsum sems can ni //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i khams gsum sems can ni //
translated: If the sentient beings of the three realms arise from that,

original: de yi don ni ji ltar rig par byed //
analyzed: de yi don ni ji ltar rig par byed //
translated: how is the meaning of that to be understood?

original: rig pa'i rgyal pos nyid phyir nga la nyon //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal pos nyid phyir nga la nyon // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Listen to me, the king of vidyā, who am myself.

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: O teacher, teacher of all, all-creating king,

original: khyod kyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
analyzed: khyod kyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
translated: Your nature is extremely difficult to realize.

original: rnam bzhi bstan pa'i sgra yis bdag gis rtogs //🔽dbyings kyi sgra yis 'byed pa med par rtogs //
analyzed: rnam bzhi bstan pa'i sgra yis bdag gis rtogs // dbyings kyi sgra yis 'byed pa med par rtogs //
translated: I realize it through the sound of the teaching of the four topics.🔽I realize it without division through the sound of the dhātu.

original: nam mkha'i sgra yis ma bsgribs gsal bar rtogs //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sgra yis ma bsgribs gsal bar rtogs //
translated: I realize it as an unobscured clarity through the sound of space.

original: 'byung ba'i sgra yis kun gyi snying por rtogs //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sgra yis kun gyi snying por rtogs //
translated: I realize it as the heart essence of all through the sound of the elements.

original: sems can sems kyis sgra don de rig byed //
analyzed: sems can sems kyis sgra don de rig byed //
translated: Sentient beings should understand that sound’s meaning through their minds.

original: de rig kun byed shin tu rtogs dka' rig /🔽kun byed nyid las gzhan zhes bstan pa med //
analyzed: de rig kun byed shin tu rtogs dka' rig / kun byed nyid las gzhan zhes bstan pa med //
translated: Understanding that, they understand the all-creating, extremely difficult to realize.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: It is taught that there is nothing other than the all-creating one.

original: de nas kun byed rgyal @55b pos rig pa'i rgyal po la slar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas kun byed rgyal @55b pos rig pa'i rgyal po la slar gsungs pa /
translated: Then the all-creating king spoke again to the king of awareness:

original: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs dka' 'di rig na //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs dka' 'di rig na //
translated: “When you realize this, my nature that is difficult to realize,

original: chos kyi mdo rtsa yan lag kun rig gis //
analyzed: chos kyi mdo rtsa yan lag kun rig gis //
translated: you will realize all the major and minor topics of the Dharma.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su mtshan yang btags //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su mtshan yang btags //
translated: You will be called the king of awareness.

original: kye; byed pa'i rgyal po kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: kye; byed pa'i rgyal po kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: O king of activities, all-creating bodhicitta,

original: khyod kyi rang bzhin 'di lta chos nyid 'di //
analyzed: khyod kyi rang bzhin 'di lta chos nyid 'di //
translated: this nature of yours is the dharmatā.

original: sems dang ye shes chos nyid rig pa ste //
analyzed: sems dang ye shes chos nyid rig pa ste //
translated: Mind, timeless awareness, and the nature of phenomena are awareness.

original: de yi rang bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar mthong //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar mthong //
translated: I have seen their nature to be like this.

original: sems nyid spros bral sgra ni chos nyid sgra //
analyzed: sems nyid spros bral sgra ni chos nyid sgra //
translated: The sound of mind itself, free of elaboration, is the sound of the nature of phenomena.

original: sems nyid ma bsgribs sgra ni nam mkha'i khams //
analyzed: sems nyid ma bsgribs sgra ni nam mkha'i khams //
translated: The sound of mind itself, unobscured, is the realm of space.

original: sems nyid ngo bo snying po 'byung ba'i sgra //
analyzed: sems nyid ngo bo snying po 'byung ba'i sgra //
translated: The sound of the essence, heart essence, and elements of mind itself

original: rig pa so sor rtog pa sems can sems //
analyzed: rig pa so sor rtog pa sems can sems //
translated: is awareness, discerning awareness, the mind of ordinary beings.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med de //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med de //
translated: There is nothing other than the nature of mind.

original: kun byed rgyal po sems las gzhan med do //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po sems las gzhan med do //
translated: There is nothing other than mind, the all-creating monarch.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: nga yi rang bzhin de rig na //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin de rig na //
translated: if you know my nature,

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rig pa yin //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rig pa yin //
translated: you know the nature of me, the all-creating one.

original: nga rig gcig rig kun rig thams cad rig /
analyzed: nga rig gcig rig kun rig thams cad rig /
translated: Knowing me is knowing the one, knowing all, knowing everything.

original: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod la ni //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod la ni //
translated: O great and courageous one, Vajra,

original: rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su ming btags so //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su ming btags so //
translated: you are given the name “king of awareness.”

original: kye; rig pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rig gyur na //
analyzed: kye; rig pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rig gyur na //
translated: O king of awareness, if you know in this way,

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: the teachers who emerge from me, the three buddha bodies,🔽will also know the one, knowing all, knowing everything.

original: bstan pa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum byung nas //
analyzed: bstan pa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum byung nas //
translated: The teachings have arisen as three vehicles.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod pa gsum gyis ni //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod pa gsum gyis ni //
translated: The three who desire the result from the cause

original: bya ba'i las ni lta spyod sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: bya ba'i las ni lta spyod sna tshogs kyis //
translated: With various activities of view and conduct

original: 'bras bu gsum ni gang dang gang sgrub pa //
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum ni gang dang gang sgrub pa //
translated: Accomplish whatever the three results are.

original: rig pa'i rgyal pos chos de ji ltar rig /🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal pos chos de ji ltar rig / ces gsungs so //
translated: O King of Awareness, how do you know those phenomena?”

original: rig @56a *// pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa //
analyzed: rig @56a *// pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa //
translated: The King of Awareness replied:

original: kye; kun byed rgyal po khyod las byung ba yi //🔽sku gsum ston pa khyod kyi ngo bo gsum //
analyzed: kye; kun byed rgyal po khyod las byung ba yi // sku gsum ston pa khyod kyi ngo bo gsum //
translated: “O all-creating king,🔽The three teachers of the three kayas are your three essences.

original: de gsum bstan pa rnam gsum khyod kyi ldem dgongs te //
analyzed: de gsum bstan pa rnam gsum khyod kyi ldem dgongs te //
translated: Those three teachings are your three implied teachings.

original: rig pa so so'i sems la ldem dgongs bstan //
analyzed: rig pa so so'i sems la ldem dgongs bstan //
translated: The implied teachings are taught to the individual awarenesses of the minds.

original: de dag gang la dgongs nas ldem po bsten //
analyzed: de dag gang la dgongs nas ldem po bsten //
translated: What is the intention of those implied teachings?

original: mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol la dgongs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol la dgongs pa'i phyir //
translated: The intention is to seek nondistraction and stillness.

original: rang re gang 'thad yul la ldem du gzhug /
analyzed: rang re gang 'thad yul la ldem du gzhug /
translated: One should engage in the implied teachings in whatever is suitable for the individual.

original: sku gsum ston pa drang lung ston pa des //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa drang lung ston pa des //
translated: The teacher of the three kayas, the teacher of the implied teachings,

original: la las sa dang lam gyi 'bras bu bstan //
analyzed: la las sa dang lam gyi 'bras bu bstan //
translated: Teaches some the result of the paths and stages.

original: la las dngos min chu zla'i 'bras bu bstan //
analyzed: la las dngos min chu zla'i 'bras bu bstan //
translated: Some are taught the result that is not real, the reflection of the moon in water.

original: la las nyid kyis nyid bsgrub 'bras bu bstan //
analyzed: la las nyid kyis nyid bsgrub 'bras bu bstan //
translated: Some are taught the result that is established by itself.

original: sku gsum bstan pa ldem dgongs lung bstan te //
analyzed: sku gsum bstan pa ldem dgongs lung bstan te //
translated: The teaching on the three kāyas is an explanation of the definitive meaning.

original: nges par ma bstan drang ba'i lung bstan te //
analyzed: nges par ma bstan drang ba'i lung bstan te //
translated: The explanation of the provisional meaning is not definitive.

original: mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin yin //🔽rgyu 'bras theg chen drang ba'i lung du bstan //
analyzed: mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin yin // rgyu 'bras theg chen drang ba'i lung du bstan //
translated: The samādhi that is sought in the pacification of non-diffusion

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: is taught in the provisional sūtras of the Mahāyāna of cause and effect.

original: kye; rig pa'i rgyal po sems dpa' rdo rje nyon //
analyzed: kye; rig pa'i rgyal po sems dpa' rdo rje nyon //
translated: O King of Awareness, listen!

original: don dam nges pa'i lung zhes bstan pa ni //
analyzed: don dam nges pa'i lung zhes bstan pa ni //
translated: The teaching on the “sūtras of the definitive ultimate meaning”

original: rig pa'i rgyal pos rig gam bstan du med //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal pos rig gam bstan du med //
translated: is not something that can be taught or known by the king of awareness.

original: mi gnas dmigs par bya ba'i yul ma yin //
analyzed: mi gnas dmigs par bya ba'i yul ma yin //
translated: It is not an object that can be observed without abiding.

original: mi rtog rtog las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: mi rtog rtog las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: The nature of nonconceptuality is beyond thought.

original: ting 'dzin mi bsgom bsam pa'i yul dang bral //
analyzed: ting 'dzin mi bsgom bsam pa'i yul dang bral //
translated: In samādhi, there is no meditation, only freedom from conceptual objects.

original: 'dod pa'i sems med blang ba'i 'bras bu med //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sems med blang ba'i 'bras bu med //
translated: Without a desirous mind, there is no result to accept.

original: mi rtog ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des //
analyzed: mi rtog ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des //
translated: By abiding in the nonconceptual just as it is,

original: lam la ma bgrod sangs rgyas sa ru phyin //
analyzed: lam la ma bgrod sangs rgyas sa ru phyin //
translated: one reaches the stage of buddhahood without traveling on a path.

original: rig pa ma sbyangs rang @56b 'byung ye shes rnyed //
analyzed: rig pa ma sbyangs rang @56b 'byung ye shes rnyed //
translated: Without training awareness, you find naturally occurring timeless awareness.

original: phrin las ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: phrin las ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
translated: Without striving in enlightened activities, they are spontaneously accomplished by nature.

original: dam tshig mi sdom rang bzhin rnam par dag /
analyzed: dam tshig mi sdom rang bzhin rnam par dag /
translated: Without observing any limits, you are pure by nature.

original: yul dang dbang po de bzhin nyid du gsal //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po de bzhin nyid du gsal //
translated: The field and the sense faculties are clearly evident in suchness.

original: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su ma mthong ste //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su ma mthong ste //
translated: You do not see buddhas and ordinary beings as a duality.

original: de bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig par mthong //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig par mthong //
translated: You see everything as being the same in suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid la gcig dang du ma med //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gcig dang du ma med //
translated: In suchness, there is neither oneness nor multiplicity.

original: ma byung ma skyes pa yi snying po la //
analyzed: ma byung ma skyes pa yi snying po la //
translated: In the heart essence, which is unborn and nonoccurring,

original: sgros kyis btags pa'i tha snyad ga la yod //
analyzed: sgros kyis btags pa'i tha snyad ga la yod //
translated: how could there be any labels or conventions?

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal //
translated: O great and courageous one, king of awareness,

original: sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun //
translated: all buddhas, ordinary beings, and the entire universe of appearances and possibilities

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin sgros skur bral //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin sgros skur bral //
translated: are the nature of me, the allcreating one, beyond labels and reification.

original: nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la //
translated: In the single suchness that is my nature,

original: sku gsum ston pas so sor bstan pa yang //🔽de bzhin nyid la drang ba'i lung bstan yin //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pas so sor bstan pa yang // de bzhin nyid la drang ba'i lung bstan yin //
translated: the teachers of the three kayas have also revealed it individually,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: so that suchness is revealed to be the transmission of the direct lineage.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: This is the thirty-third chapter, the chapter that presents the definitive and provisional scriptures, of The Sacred Tantra of the Secret Nucleus entitled The Lotus Speech.

original: nges pa'i lung dang / drang ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: nges pa'i lung dang / drang ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER THIRTY-FOUR🔽The Assembly of All Buddhas

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nyid la 'dus pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nyid la 'dus pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the enlightened mind, the All-Creating King, taught this sutra, the assembly of the transcendent thoughts of all the buddhas:

original: kye; rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgra nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgra nyon cig /
translated: O King of Realization, listen to my words!

original: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni //
translated: I am the All-Creating King,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi; ;dgongs pa'i don ni nga la 'dus //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi; ;dgongs pa'i don ni nga la 'dus //
translated: and the meaning of the transcendent thought of all the buddhas of the three times is subsumed within me.

original: nga yi rang bzhin 'di la ni //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin 'di la ni //
translated: In this nature of mine,

original: sku 'dus gsung 'dus dgongs pa 'dus //🔽nga yi sgra nyon dgongs 'dus gyis //
analyzed: sku 'dus gsung 'dus dgongs pa 'dus // nga yi sgra nyon dgongs 'dus gyis //
translated: the body is subsumed, speech is subsumed, and thought is subsumed.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Listen to my words and understand that thought is subsumed.

original: kye; @57a *// ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; @57a *// ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: O teacher, All-Creating King,

original: chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs //
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs //
translated: the body of reality, the body of perfect rapture,🔽Samantabhadra, Vajrasattva,

original: kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rnam gzigs gtsug tor la sogs te //
analyzed: kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rnam gzigs gtsug tor la sogs te //
translated: Vipaśyin, Śikhin, and so forth,

original: rabs bdun sh'akya thub pa dang // stong rtsa gnyis kyi sangs rgyas dang // lhun gyis grub dang rdul snyed kyi //
analyzed: rabs bdun sh'akya thub pa dang // stong rtsa gnyis kyi sangs rgyas dang // lhun gyis grub dang rdul snyed kyi //
translated: And the buddhas as numerous as atoms in the universe—

original: dgongs pa khyod la 'dus lags sam //
analyzed: dgongs pa khyod la 'dus lags sam //
translated: Have their intentions been gathered into you?

original: zhes zhus so //
analyzed: zhes zhus so //
translated: Thus he asked.

original: de nas kun byed rgyal po sa yin pa'i sgra brjod pa //
analyzed: de nas kun byed rgyal po sa yin pa'i sgra brjod pa //
translated: Then the all-creating king expressed the sound of “is”:🔽“Kye!

original: kye; rtogs pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; rtogs pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig /
translated: King of realization, listen to this!

original: ho ho yin pa'i sgra brjod de //
analyzed: ho ho yin pa'i sgra brjod de //
translated: The sound of “is” is expressed as “ho ho.”

original: dpe dang don dang rtog gsum gyis //
analyzed: dpe dang don dang rtog gsum gyis //
translated: Through example, meaning, and thought,

original: dgongs pa 'dus pa'i don bstan pa //
analyzed: dgongs pa 'dus pa'i don bstan pa //
translated: The meaning of the gathered intention is explained.

original: nga yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: My nature is like space.

original: nga yi don ni chos nyid yin //
analyzed: nga yi don ni chos nyid yin //
translated: My meaning is dharmata.

original: nga yi ngo bo byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga yi ngo bo byang chub sems //
translated: My essence is awakened mind.

original: kye; nga ni ma bsgribs rtog pa med //
analyzed: kye; nga ni ma bsgribs rtog pa med //
translated: Kye! I am unobscured and nonconceptual.

original: rtog med nam mkha' chos kyi sku; ;nga ni mi rtog blang dor med //🔽blang dor med de nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: rtog med nam mkha' chos kyi sku; ;nga ni mi rtog blang dor med // blang dor med de nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: Nonconceptual space is the dharmakaya. I am nonconceptual and without acceptance or rejection.🔽Without acceptance or rejection, I am like space.

original: nam mkha' blang dor med pa bzhin //
analyzed: nam mkha' blang dor med pa bzhin //
translated: Just as space is without acceptance or rejection,

original: kun tu bzang la blang dor med //
analyzed: kun tu bzang la blang dor med //
translated: Samantabhadra is without acceptance or rejection.

original: blang dor med pa nga las 'dus //
analyzed: blang dor med pa nga las 'dus //
translated: Being without acceptance or rejection is gathered into me.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽kye; nga ni ma skyes nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig / kye; nga ni ma skyes nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!🔽I am unborn, like space.

original: ma skyes pa yin nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: ma skyes pa yin nam mkha' bzhin //
translated: Unborn, I am like space.

original: rdo rje sems la skye ba med //
analyzed: rdo rje sems la skye ba med //
translated: There is no birth in Vajrasattva.

original: skye med dgongs pa nga la 'dus //
analyzed: skye med dgongs pa nga la 'dus //
translated: The unborn transcendent state is subsumed in me.

original: rnam gzigs rabs bdun sh'akya thub //
analyzed: rnam gzigs rabs bdun sh'akya thub //
translated: Vipaśyin, Śikhin, Viśvabhū, Krakucchanda, Kanakamuni, Kāśyapa, and Śākyamuni,

original: stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang // lhun grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
analyzed: stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang // lhun grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
translated: the twelve thousand buddhas, the buddhas equal to atoms, and the spontaneously present buddhas

original: dgongs pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: dgongs pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
translated: are the transcendent state, the nature of space.

original: skye med mi @57b rtog blang dor med //
analyzed: skye med mi @57b rtog blang dor med //
translated: They are unborn, nonconceptual, and free of acceptance and rejection.

original: dpe yis nga la 'das par bstan //
analyzed: dpe yis nga la 'das par bstan //
translated: The analogy shows that I am beyond.

original: kye sems dpa 'chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa 'chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!🔽O great and courageous one, listen!

original: kye; gong shad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: kye; gong shad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: The transcendent state of all buddhas

original: dgongs pa don gyis 'dus pa ni //
analyzed: dgongs pa don gyis 'dus pa ni //
translated: is subsumed in the meaning.

original: kun byed rgyal po 'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po 'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of the all-creating king

original: skye ba med par bstan pa bzhin //
analyzed: skye ba med par bstan pa bzhin //
translated: is shown to be unborn.

original: sangs rgyas kun la skye med pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun la skye med pas //
translated: Since all buddhas are unborn,

original: skye med chos nyid 'dus par bstan //
analyzed: skye med chos nyid 'dus par bstan //
translated: the unborn dharmatā is shown to be subsumed.

original: kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of the all-creating king,

original: chos nyid 'gag pa med pa bzhin //
analyzed: chos nyid 'gag pa med pa bzhin //
translated: Just as dharmatā is unceasing.

original: gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: As explained above,

original: chos nyid la ni 'gag pa med //
analyzed: chos nyid la ni 'gag pa med //
translated: dharmatā is unceasing in all buddhas.

original: des na chos nyid 'dus par bstan //
analyzed: des na chos nyid 'dus par bstan //
translated: Therefore, dharmatā is revealed to be the gathering.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: rtags kyis 'dus par bstan pa ni //
analyzed: rtags kyis 'dus par bstan pa ni //
translated: The gathering in the signs is revealed.

original: rtags ni kun rtags byang chub sems //
analyzed: rtags ni kun rtags byang chub sems //
translated: The signs are all signs—awakened mind.

original: kun byed rgyal po sems kyis ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po sems kyis ni //
translated: The all-creating king, mind,

original: chos kyi sku dang kun tu bzang //
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang kun tu bzang //
translated: the dharmakāya, Samantabhadra,

original: rdo rje sems la sogs pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje sems la sogs pa yi //
translated: Vajrasattva, and so forth

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i //
translated: are the essence of all buddhas of the three times,

original: snying po rtags ni sems su 'dus //
analyzed: snying po rtags ni sems su 'dus //
translated: gathered in the mind, the sign.

original: des nad dpe don gsum du 'dus //
analyzed: des nad dpe don gsum du 'dus //
translated: Thus, the metaphor, meaning, and essence are gathered.

original: kye; kun byed rgyal po nga la ni //🔽spyi 'dus sgo 'dus dgongs pa 'dus //
analyzed: kye; kun byed rgyal po nga la ni // spyi 'dus sgo 'dus dgongs pa 'dus //
translated: O all-creating king, in me🔽the general gathering, the gathering at the door, and the gathering in enlightened intent

original: spyi 'dus dpe don rtogs 'dus la //
analyzed: spyi 'dus dpe don rtogs 'dus la //
translated: are gathered in the general gathering, the gathering in the metaphor and meaning,

original: sgo 'dul rnam pa lnga 'dus te //
analyzed: sgo 'dul rnam pa lnga 'dus te //
translated: and the gathering in the five aspects of the gathering at the door.

original: chos sku dgongs pa 'dus pa ni //
analyzed: chos sku dgongs pa 'dus pa ni //
translated: The gathering in enlightened intent in the dharmakāya

original: mi rtog mnyam pa nyid 'dus la //
analyzed: mi rtog mnyam pa nyid 'dus la //
translated: is gathered in nonconceptual evenness,

original: mi g-yo cho 'phrul 'byin par nus //
analyzed: mi g-yo cho 'phrul 'byin par nus //
translated: and one is able to emanate without wavering.

original: longs spyod sku yi dgongs 'dus pa //
analyzed: longs spyod sku yi dgongs 'dus pa //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Enjoyment Body🔽The Assembly of the Direct Perception of the Nature of Appearances

original: mngon sum rang bzhin snang ba dang // 'dod pa tshogs pas 'byin par 'dus //🔽kun bzang @58a *//
analyzed: mngon sum rang bzhin snang ba dang // 'dod pa tshogs pas 'byin par 'dus // kun bzang @58a *//
translated: and the Assembly of the Extraction of the Tantra of the Assembly of Desires

original: dgongs pa 'dus pa ni //🔽ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun //🔽bzang ngan blang dor med pa ru //🔽kun byed mngon du phyung bar 'dus //
analyzed: dgongs pa 'dus pa ni // ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun // bzang ngan blang dor med pa ru // kun byed mngon du phyung bar 'dus //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of Samantabhadra

original: rdo rje sems dgongs 'dus pa ni //🔽ma skye mi 'gag dgongs pa 'dus //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dgongs 'dus pa ni // ma skye mi 'gag dgongs pa 'dus //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of Vajrasattva🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Seven Generations🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Two Thousand🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha

original: rabs bdun sh'akya thub pa dang // stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang // sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad pa'i //🔽byung yang sku gsung thugs las byung //🔽sku gsung thugs kyi chos nyid la //
analyzed: rabs bdun sh'akya thub pa dang // stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang // sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad pa'i // byung yang sku gsung thugs las byung // sku gsung thugs kyi chos nyid la //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha

original: sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad tshul //🔽de yang kun byed nyid du 'dus //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad tshul // de yang kun byed nyid du 'dus //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na //🔽nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na // nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas na //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas na //
translated: The Assembly of the Transcendent State of the Buddha🔽The Assembly

original: nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med //
analyzed: nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med //
translated: There is not a single one that is not included in me.

original: ces gsungs pas der sems dpa' rdo rje sdangs te brgyal lo //
analyzed: ces gsungs pas der sems dpa' rdo rje sdangs te brgyal lo //
translated: When these words were spoken, the bodhisattva Vajra was frightened and fainted.

original: der brgyal sangs nas zhus pa //
analyzed: der brgyal sangs nas zhus pa //
translated: When he regained consciousness, he asked:

original: kye; 'dus pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; 'dus pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig /
translated: “O King of the Assembly, listen to me!

original: byas pa'i chos dang kun 'dus na //🔽ma byas pa yang kun 'dus sam //
analyzed: byas pa'i chos dang kun 'dus na // ma byas pa yang kun 'dus sam //
translated: When all phenomena that are created are included,🔽are all those that are not created also included?

original: ma byung ba yang kun 'dus sam //
analyzed: ma byung ba yang kun 'dus sam //
translated: Are all those that do not occur also included?

original: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams //
translated: The realm of phenomena and the realm of space

original: mu stegs phyin ci log lta ba //
analyzed: mu stegs phyin ci log lta ba //
translated: are the views of the extremists, who are mistaken.

original: rtag chad gnyis su lta ba yang //
analyzed: rtag chad gnyis su lta ba yang //
translated: The views of eternalism and nihilism

original: khyod kyi ma nor dgongs yin na //🔽sangs rgyas sems can ci la gdags //🔽mu stegs sangs rgyas ci la rgya //
analyzed: khyod kyi ma nor dgongs yin na // sangs rgyas sems can ci la gdags // mu stegs sangs rgyas ci la rgya //
translated: are also your unmistaken intention.🔽How can buddhas and sentient beings be designated?

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: How can extremists and buddhas be distinguished?

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyal @58b po des bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyal @58b po des bka' stsal pa //
translated: Then the all-creating king, bodhicitta, the king of all that is, spoke:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “O great being, listen!

original: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur na //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur na //
translated: If you realize my nature,

original: kun kyang 'dus par yid ches na //
analyzed: kun kyang 'dus par yid ches na //
translated: you will be confident that everything is included.

original: sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni //
translated: Great being, you have not realized

original: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'dra //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'dra //
translated: my nature, which is not to be realized.

original: rtogs mi 'dra bas yid mi ches //🔽kun byed byang chub sems rtogs shig /
analyzed: rtogs mi 'dra bas yid mi ches // kun byed byang chub sems rtogs shig /
translated: Since it is not to be realized, do not be confident.🔽Realize all-creating bodhicitta.

original: kun byed byang chub sems rtogs na //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems rtogs na //
translated: If you realize all-creating bodhicitta,

original: rang 'byung byang chub sems de yis //
analyzed: rang 'byung byang chub sems de yis //
translated: that self-originated bodhicitta

original: rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' bsal te //
analyzed: rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' bsal te //
translated: will clear away the extremes of eternalism and nihilism.

original: ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba yis //
analyzed: ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba yis //
translated: The unborn state, free of dualistic perception,

original: rtag pa'i dngos po mtha' bsal la //
analyzed: rtag pa'i dngos po mtha' bsal la //
translated: will clear away the extreme of eternalism as an entity.

original: rang 'byung ye shes 'gyur med pas //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes 'gyur med pas //
translated: Since self-originated timeless awareness is unchanging,

original: med pa chad pa'i mtha' yang bsal //
analyzed: med pa chad pa'i mtha' yang bsal //
translated: it will also clear away the extreme of nihilism as nothingness.

original: mu zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: mu zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The “extreme” is the basic space of phenomena.

original: stegs zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: stegs zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i gnas //
translated: The “bridge” is the basis for realization.

original: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis mthong ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis mthong ba //
translated: Seeing both buddhas and ordinary beings

original: kun byed byang chub sems mthong //🔽zhes gsugns so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems mthong // zhes gsugns so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: is seeing all-creating bodhicitta.”

original: dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This is the thirty-fourth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the transmission of the gathering of the enlightened mind of all.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi bstan pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung rgya 'bras rtsol sgrub las 'das pa 'di bstan te /🔽kye sems dpa' chen po /🔽nga yi spyod yul 'di ni dka' ba ste //🔽sgo dang lta ba dang ni dam tshig dang // phrin las dang ni bgrod lam gnas pa dang // ye shes chos nyid rnam pa brgyad po 'di //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi bstan pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung rgya 'bras rtsol sgrub las 'das pa 'di bstan te / kye sems dpa' chen po / nga yi spyod yul 'di ni dka' ba ste // sgo dang lta ba dang ni dam tshig dang // phrin las dang ni bgrod lam gnas pa dang // ye shes chos nyid rnam pa brgyad po 'di //
translated: Then the all-creating mind of awakening, the sovereign, revealed this treatise of the Great Perfection, which is beyond the scope of others, the Great Perfection that is beyond the bounds of effort and achievement:🔽O great and courageous one,🔽this domain of mine is difficult to fathom.🔽The gateway, the view, and the samaya,🔽the activity, the path to be traversed, the state of being, and wisdom-these eight aspects of the nature of phenomena🔽

original: sku gsum theg pa rnam @59a *//🔽pa lnga po yi //🔽theg pa gzhan dang lta spyod mi mthun te //🔽sgo ni btsal du med pa'i sgo nas 'jug /🔽lta ba bsgom du med par bstan pa yin //🔽dam tshig bsrung du med par bstan pa yin //🔽phrin las btsal du med par bstan pa yin //🔽lam la bgrod du med par bstan pa yin //🔽gnas sa sbyang du med par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: sku gsum theg pa rnam @59a *//🔽pa lnga po yi //🔽theg pa gzhan dang lta spyod mi mthun te //🔽sgo ni btsal du med pa'i sgo nas 'jug /🔽lta ba bsgom du med par bstan pa yin //🔽dam tshig bsrung du med par bstan pa yin //🔽phrin las btsal du med par bstan pa yin //🔽lam la bgrod du med par bstan pa yin //🔽gnas sa sbyang du med par bstan pa yin //

original: ye shes mi rtog bskyod pa med pa yin //
analyzed: ye shes mi rtog bskyod pa med pa yin //
translated: Timeless awareness is nonconceptual and unwavering.

original: chos nyid ji bzhin bcos su med pa yin //
analyzed: chos nyid ji bzhin bcos su med pa yin //
translated: The nature of phenomena is just as it is, with nothing to be contrived.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po don 'di ni //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po don 'di ni //
translated: O great and courageous one, if this topic

original: rgyu 'bras theg pa can la bstan 'gyur na //🔽'jig rten rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos bzhin du //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras theg pa can la bstan 'gyur na // 'jig rten rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos bzhin du //
translated: were taught to those who follow spiritual approaches based on either causes or results,

original: rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bas mi rigs zer //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bas mi rigs zer //
translated: they would say that it makes no sense for results to occur🔽in the same way that ordinary causes produce ordinary results.🔽They would claim that results occur🔽through the cultivation of causes,

original: rgyu ni khams gsum sems can las bsgrubs nas //
analyzed: rgyu ni khams gsum sems can las bsgrubs nas //
translated: such as the beings of the three realms,

original: 'bras bu dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod //
analyzed: 'bras bu dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod //
translated: and that the result is the occurrence of buddhahood in the three times.🔽They would claim that the result of whatever is cultivated in meditation

original: rgyu ni lta ba bsgom pa byas pa yis //🔽gang bsgoms 'bras bu de thob 'dod na //
analyzed: rgyu ni lta ba bsgom pa byas pa yis // gang bsgoms 'bras bu de thob 'dod na //
translated: is attained through the practice of view and meditation.

original: bsgom pa de yis 'bras bu thob pa med //
analyzed: bsgom pa de yis 'bras bu thob pa med //
translated: But there is no attainment of the result of whatever is cultivated in meditation.

original: thams cad ji bzhin pa yi chos yin pas //
analyzed: thams cad ji bzhin pa yi chos yin pas //
translated: Since everything is the way it is, the nature of phenomena,

original: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed pa ni //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed pa ni //
translated: to try to contrive what simply is

original: brdzun gyis bden pa bslus pa sdig re che //🔽lta bsgom dam tshig la sogs rtsol bsgrub kyis //
analyzed: brdzun gyis bden pa bslus pa sdig re che // lta bsgom dam tshig la sogs rtsol bsgrub kyis //
translated: is a great misdeed, a lie that deceives the truth.🔽Through striving and achievement in view, meditation, and samaya,

original: dbang po yul la yengs pa phral nas ni //
analyzed: dbang po yul la yengs pa phral nas ni //
translated: one is distracted from the sense objects that are perceived by the senses.

original: dben pa'i yul la thabs kyis khrid nas ni //
analyzed: dben pa'i yul la thabs kyis khrid nas ni //
translated: Having been led by skillful means to a solitary place,

original: rtog med mnyam pa'i thibs kyis bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rtog med mnyam pa'i thibs kyis bstan pa yin //
translated: I have revealed the state of nonconceptual evenness.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub @59b kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub @59b kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: rdzogs pa chen po'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
translated: This completes the thirty-fifth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the transmission of the Great Perfection.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du 'dus pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du 'dus pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, spoke these words:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po //
translated: “O great and courageous one,

original: nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs shig /
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs shig /
translated: realize this nature of mine.

original: nga ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: nga ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te //
translated: I am the nature of awakened mind,

original: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po yin //
translated: and awakened mind is the all-creating monarch.

original: kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs //
translated: The nature of the all-creating monarch is enlightened form, speech, and mind.

original: sku gsung thugs kyis ma byas gcig kyang med //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyis ma byas gcig kyang med //
translated: There is nothing whatsoever that is not created by enlightened form, speech, and mind.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyis byas //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyis byas //
translated: Enlightened form, speech, and mind create the buddhas of the three times.

original: khams gsum sems can lus ngag yid gsum yang //
analyzed: khams gsum sems can lus ngag yid gsum yang //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all sentient beings in the three realms

original: kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas //
translated: are created by my body, speech, and mind.

original: snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kyang //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kyang //
translated: The entire universe of appearances and possibilities🔽is created by my body, speech, and mind

original: ji bzhin ma bcos pa yi chos nyid du //🔽kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma bcos pa yi chos nyid du // kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas //
translated: in the uncontrived dharmatā, just as it is.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / sems dpa' rdo rjes slar zhus pa //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / sems dpa' rdo rjes slar zhus pa //
translated: The spiritual warrior Vajra asked,

original: kye; kun byed rgyal po byed pa'i bdag po lags //
analyzed: kye; kun byed rgyal po byed pa'i bdag po lags //
translated: “Kye! All-creating monarch, master of activity,

original: ma rig ma rtogs don d'i bshad du gsol //
analyzed: ma rig ma rtogs don d'i bshad du gsol //
translated: please explain the meaning of nonrecognition and nonrealization.

original: ji ltar byas pa bdag la bshad du gsol //
analyzed: ji ltar byas pa bdag la bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain to me what has been done.”

original: zhes zhus pas /
analyzed: zhes zhus pas /
translated: He replied:

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Kye! Great spiritual warrior, listen!

original: nga ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin //
analyzed: nga ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin //
translated: I am the nature of awakened body, speech, and mind.

original: sku ni chos nyid mngon du phyung ba des //
analyzed: sku ni chos nyid mngon du phyung ba des //
translated: The body is the actualization of dharmatā,

original: kun bzang rol pa rmad du byung ba byas @60a *//🔽gsung gi sgra tshig mngon du bsgrags nas ni //
analyzed: kun bzang rol pa rmad du byung ba byas @60a *// gsung gi sgra tshig mngon du bsgrags nas ni //
translated: and with it I perform the marvelous display of Samantabhadra.🔽Speech is the actual proclamation of sound and words,

original: don gyi chos nyid tshig gis go bar bstan //
analyzed: don gyi chos nyid tshig gis go bar bstan //
translated: and with it I reveal the meaning of dharmatā through words.

original: thugs ni rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med kyis //
analyzed: thugs ni rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med kyis //
translated: The mind is the unceasing, self-originated pristine consciousness.

original: ston pa ye shes sgron ma byas nas ni //
analyzed: ston pa ye shes sgron ma byas nas ni //
translated: Having acted as the lamp of pristine consciousness,

original: chos nyid don gyi ngo bo ma nor ston //
analyzed: chos nyid don gyi ngo bo ma nor ston //
translated: the teacher reveals the unerring essence of the meaning of dharmatā.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen pos don 'di rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen pos don 'di rtogs par gyis //
translated: O great and courageous one, realize this meaning!

original: snang srid snod bcud de ltar snang ba las //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud de ltar snang ba las //
translated: The apparent universe manifests in that way.

original: nga la sku yi ngo bo gzhan med pas //
analyzed: nga la sku yi ngo bo gzhan med pas //
translated: Since there is no other essence of the body than me,

original: rang gi ngo bos 'chad cing ston pa yin //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos 'chad cing ston pa yin //
translated: I explain and reveal my own essence.

original: sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang //
translated: O great and courageous one, you also

original: ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
analyzed: ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
translated: should give prophecies to others who do not understand.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i sgra grag dang // rgyud drug sems can rnams kyi sgra tshig 'di //
analyzed: sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i sgra grag dang // rgyud drug sems can rnams kyi sgra tshig 'di //
translated: The sounds of earth, water, fire, air, space, and the words of the six classes of migrating beings

original: kun byed nga yi gsung las gzhan med pas //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi gsung las gzhan med pas //
translated: are nothing other than my speech, the all-creating one.

original: tshig sgra don gyis bsdebs bshad de la bya //
analyzed: tshig sgra don gyis bsdebs bshad de la bya //
translated: The words and sounds are explained by combining them with the meaning.

original: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //
translated: O great and courageous one, you

original: ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
analyzed: ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
translated: should give prophecies to others who do not understand.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!🔽All sentient beings of the six classes in the three realms🔽are nonconceptual and equal in the five great elements,

original: khams gsum rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang // 'byung chen lnga yi mi rtog mnyam nyid dang // chos nyid mi skye yi rtog mi 'gag ste //
analyzed: khams gsum rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang // 'byung chen lnga yi mi rtog mnyam nyid dang // chos nyid mi skye yi rtog mi 'gag ste //
translated: and the unborn nature of phenomena is neither produced nor imagined.

original: kun byed nga yi thugs su de las med //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi thugs su de las med //
translated: There is nothing other than this in my mind, the all-creating one.

original: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod kyis ni //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod kyis ni //
translated: O great and courageous one, Vajra,

original: ma rtog gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
analyzed: ma rtog gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
translated: do not imagine this to be something other than it is; proclaim it!

original: sems dpa' chen pos 'di lung ma bstan na //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen pos 'di lung ma bstan na //
translated: If the great and courageous one does not proclaim it,

original: nga yi rang bzhin shin tu mi rtogs te //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin shin tu mi rtogs te //
translated: my nature will not be fully realized.

original: ma @60b rtogs nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur na //
analyzed: ma @60b rtogs nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur na //
translated: If it is not realized, I will not be encountered.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa //
translated: The heirs of the buddhas of the three times,🔽all sentient beings dwelling in the three realms,

original: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang // la dgu lung dgu rgal ba'i sa bcu dang // tshe la dbang sgyur phyag rgya lhun gyis grub pa dang // rig 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i gdung 'tshob kyis //
analyzed: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang // la dgu lung dgu rgal ba'i sa bcu dang // tshe la dbang sgyur phyag rgya lhun gyis grub pa dang // rig 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i gdung 'tshob kyis //
translated: those who have crossed the nine levels and nine transmissions, those on the tenth level, those who have mastered the duration of their lives, those for whom mudra practice is spontaneously accomplished, and the heirs of the three levels of mastery of awareness

original: kun byed nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: will not encounter me, the all-creating one.

original: kun byed nga dang yun du ma phrad na //
analyzed: kun byed nga dang yun du ma phrad na //
translated: If they do not meet me, the all-creating one,

original: khams gsum rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can gyis //
analyzed: khams gsum rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can gyis //
translated: sentient beings dwelling in the three realms and six states

original: rang gi gang bzhin rang gis ngo mi shes //
analyzed: rang gi gang bzhin rang gis ngo mi shes //
translated: will not recognize their own nature for what it is.

original: sa bcu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis //
analyzed: sa bcu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis //
translated: Even if bodhisattvas dwelling on the tenth level

original: grangs med pa yi bskal pa gsum bgrangs kyang //
analyzed: grangs med pa yi bskal pa gsum bgrangs kyang //
translated: count for three incalculable eons,

original: kun byed nga dang phrad par yong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga dang phrad par yong mi 'gyur //
translated: they will not meet me, the all-creating one,

original: des kyang rang gi rang bzhin shes mi 'gyur //
analyzed: des kyang rang gi rang bzhin shes mi 'gyur //
translated: and so they will not know their own nature.

original: lus la dbang sgyu rig 'dzin gsum gyis kyang //
analyzed: lus la dbang sgyu rig 'dzin gsum gyis kyang //
translated: Even if the three vidyadhara levels of mastery over life

original: lus kyis sangs rgyas longs sbyod sku bzung nas //
analyzed: lus kyis sangs rgyas longs sbyod sku bzung nas //
translated: are attained through the rupakaya of sambhogakaya,

original: yid kyi dbang po rang sems mthong med lta //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po rang sems mthong med lta //
translated: the mental faculty will not see its own mind.

original: des kyang kun byed rgyal po nga dang ni //
analyzed: des kyang kun byed rgyal po nga dang ni //
translated: And so they will not see me, the all-creating monarch,

original: rang gi rang bzhin gnyis med de mi mthong //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin gnyis med de mi mthong //
translated: and the nonduality of their own nature.

original: ma mthong bar du tshi chad nad kyis zin //
analyzed: ma mthong bar du tshi chad nad kyis zin //
translated: Until they do, they will be seized by the illness of nihilism.

original: de bas nga yi rang bzhin lung ston cig /🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas nga yi rang bzhin lung ston cig / ces gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, reveal my nature.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: From The All-Creating Monarch, the bodhichitta of the buddhas,🔽this is chapter 4:🔽The Explanation of the Nature of the Teacher, the Buddha.

original: sku gsung thugs su 'dus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o ////🔽de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid @61a *//
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su 'dus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o //// de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid @61a *//
translated: This is the thirty-sixth chapter, on the gathering of awakened body, speech, and mind.

original: bsgom du med pa 'di bstan to //
analyzed: bsgom du med pa 'di bstan to //
translated: Then the mind of enlightenment, the All-Creating King, revealed this teaching on the nature of the Great Perfection, which is not cultivated in meditation:🔽Kye!

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la sogs te //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la sogs te //
translated: O great and courageous one, and so on,🔽you who abide on the level of the awareness holder,🔽you who abide on the bodhisattva levels,

original: rig 'dzin gyi ni sa la gnas pa dang // sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // khams gsum sems can dus la bab pa yi //
analyzed: rig 'dzin gyi ni sa la gnas pa dang // sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // khams gsum sems can dus la bab pa yi //
translated: and you who are the sentient beings of the three realms, the time has come!

original: kun gyi don chen kun byed nga yin gyi //
analyzed: kun gyi don chen kun byed nga yin gyi //
translated: I am the all-creating one who accomplishes the great purpose of all.

original: nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid byang chub sems //
translated: My nature is the reality of awakened mind.

original: chos nyid sems la bsgom med rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: chos nyid sems la bsgom med rtogs par gyis //
translated: Realize that reality, the mind, is not cultivated in meditation.

original: rgyu 'bras ston pa'i sku gsum ston pas ni //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras ston pa'i sku gsum ston pas ni //
translated: The teachers of the three buddha bodies, who reveal cause and effect,

original: nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid bsgom med la //🔽'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos dang don mthun par //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid bsgom med la // 'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos dang don mthun par //
translated: in the reality of my nature, which is not cultivated in meditation,🔽in accord with the meaning of the teachings on worldly cause and effect,

original: rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar lung bstan nas //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar lung bstan nas //
translated: have predicted that effects arise from causes.

original: bsgom pa'i lung ni 'di ltar so sor bstan //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lung ni 'di ltar so sor bstan //
translated: The transmission of meditation is explained as follows:

original: chos nyid byang chub sems gcig ngo bo la //
analyzed: chos nyid byang chub sems gcig ngo bo la //
translated: In the essence of the one suchness of awakened mind,

original: sdug bsngal kun 'byung bden pa rnam pa bzhis //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun 'byung bden pa rnam pa bzhis //
translated: The four aspects of the truth of the origin of suffering

original: sdug bsngal kun 'byung ngan song rgyu zer na //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun 'byung ngan song rgyu zer na //
translated: Are said to be the cause of suffering and lower rebirth.

original: chos nyid byang chub sems de spong bar byed //
analyzed: chos nyid byang chub sems de spong bar byed //
translated: They reject the suchness of awakened mind,

original: de yis chos nyid mi mthong spangs pa yin //
analyzed: de yis chos nyid mi mthong spangs pa yin //
translated: And so they do not see suchness, for they have rejected it.

original: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la //
analyzed: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la //
translated: In the essence of the suchness of awakened mind,

original: don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnams gnyis kyis //
analyzed: don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnams gnyis kyis //
translated: The two truths of the ultimate and the relative

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bcus //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bcus //
translated: Are the ten perfections of generosity and discipline.🔽By training on the ten levels and the ten paths,

original: sa bcu lam la sbyangs te bgrod pa yis; ;chos nyid ma mthong sbyong ba'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: sa bcu lam la sbyangs te bgrod pa yis; ;chos nyid ma mthong sbyong ba'i sa la gnas //
translated: One does not see suchness but abides on the level of training.

original: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la //
analyzed: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la //
translated: In the essence of the suchness of awakened mind,

original: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs bzang sgo nas //
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs bzang sgo nas //
translated: Through the auspicious gates of the planets, constellations, and seasons,

original: byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul chen @61b po bzhis //
analyzed: byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul chen @61b po bzhis //
translated: The five awakenings and the four great miracles🔽Are the suchness of awakened mind.

original: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la //
translated: In all these phenomena that appear in this way,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas lha yi skur bsgom pa //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas lha yi skur bsgom pa //
translated: And, having been empowered, to meditate on the deity’s form.

original: de yis rang sems bsgom med mthong ba min //
analyzed: de yis rang sems bsgom med mthong ba min //
translated: But that will not cause one to see one’s own mind as beyond meditation.

original: chos gcig byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la //
analyzed: chos gcig byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la //
translated: In the single reality, which is the essence of awakened mind,

original: ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga rnam pa lngas //🔽rang rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje phung po la //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga rnam pa lngas // rang rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje phung po la //
translated: Through the three meditative absorptions and the five aspects of ritual,🔽One meditates on the deity through the four aspects of approach and accomplishment

original: bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi yi lha bsgoms nas //
analyzed: bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi yi lha bsgoms nas //
translated: In the pure continuum of one’s own vajra body.

original: snang la rang bzhin med pa byed pa ni //
analyzed: snang la rang bzhin med pa byed pa ni //
translated: But to create what appears yet has no nature

original: btsal zhing bsgrubs nas rang sems lhar bcos pas //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgrubs nas rang sems lhar bcos pas //
translated: And to fabricate the deity out of one’s own mind through seeking and achievement

original: des kyang rang sems bya med mthong ba min //
analyzed: des kyang rang sems bya med mthong ba min //
translated: Will not cause one to see one’s own mind as beyond action.

original: rang gi chos nyid byang chub sems la ni //
analyzed: rang gi chos nyid byang chub sems la ni //
translated: In the awakened mind—one’s own ultimate nature—

original: kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i ston pas kyang //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i ston pas kyang //
translated: Even the teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,🔽Does not teach the three teachers to meditate

original: rang sems ye nas chos nyid grol ba la //🔽ston pa gsum la bsgom pa'i lung ma bstan //
analyzed: rang sems ye nas chos nyid grol ba la // ston pa gsum la bsgom pa'i lung ma bstan //
translated: On the primordially liberated nature of mind.

original: sgom sgrub btsal na rang sems spangs pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sgom sgrub btsal na rang sems spangs pa yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: If one seeks meditation and achievement, one abandons one’s own mind.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po rang sems grub 'dod na //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po rang sems grub 'dod na //
translated: O great and courageous one, if you wish to realize your own mind,

original: 'dod pa med pas grub pa yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dod pa med pas grub pa yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Since there is no desire, it is accomplished.

original: rtog med mnyam pa nyid la gnas mi byed //🔽blang dang dor med yul la rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: rtog med mnyam pa nyid la gnas mi byed // blang dang dor med yul la rang bzhin gnas //
translated: Do not abide in nonconceptual evenness.🔽Abide naturally in the field, which is not to be adopted or rejected.

original: g-yos pa med pa'i ngang la ngang gis gnas //
analyzed: g-yos pa med pa'i ngang la ngang gis gnas //
translated: Abide naturally in the state that does not move.

original: sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo de //
analyzed: sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo de //
translated: The mind is the essence of the way things are.

original: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du grub //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du grub //
translated: All phenomena are accomplished in suchness.

original: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par ma byed cig /
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not fabricate the way things are.

original: ngo bo nyid las gzhan du ma sgrub cig /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid las gzhan du ma sgrub cig /
translated: Do not accomplish anything other than the essence.

original: rang nyid yin gyis gzhan du ma tshol cig /
analyzed: rang nyid yin gyis gzhan du ma tshol cig /
translated: Since it is oneself, do not search for it elsewhere.

original: btsal na rgyal bas dbyings nas rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: btsal na rgyal bas dbyings nas rnyed mi 'gyur //
translated: If it is searched for, the conqueror will not find it in the dhātu.

original: sngar byas zin pas @62a *//
analyzed: sngar byas zin pas @62a *//
translated: Since it was done previously,

original: da ni byed mi bdog /
analyzed: da ni byed mi bdog /
translated: now it is not done.

original: sngar grub zin pas da grub mi byed par //
analyzed: sngar grub zin pas da grub mi byed par //
translated: Since it was accomplished previously, now do not accomplish it.

original: mi rtog cir mi dgongs la mnyam par zhog /
analyzed: mi rtog cir mi dgongs la mnyam par zhog /
translated: Rest in equipoise without thinking and without reflecting.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //
analyzed: snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //
translated: The buddhas of the past

original: rang gi sems las gzhan du chos btsal med //
analyzed: rang gi sems las gzhan du chos btsal med //
translated: did not search for a dharma other than their own mind.

original: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong //
translated: There is no need to contrive what simply is.🔽There is no need to cultivate meditative absorption involving concepts.

original: ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa bsgom ma myong; ;rang sems mi rtog pa yis grub pa yin //
analyzed: ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa bsgom ma myong; ;rang sems mi rtog pa yis grub pa yin //
translated: Accomplishment comes about through the nonconceptual mind itself.

original: da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa yang //
analyzed: da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa yang //
translated: Those who are present now and those who will appear in the future

original: rtog med mnyam pa nyid kyis grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rtog med mnyam pa nyid kyis grub par 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: will accomplish buddhahood through nonconceptual evenness.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: The All-Creating Monarch, the bodhichitta, is the source of all the teachings of the buddhas.

original: bsgom du med pa'i mdo lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: bsgom du med pa'i mdo lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER 37

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor gyi ston pa'i bstan pa gol sa dang / sgrib par gyur pa 'di bstan to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor gyi ston pa'i bstan pa gol sa dang / sgrib par gyur pa 'di bstan to //
translated: The All-Creating Monarch, the bodhichitta, now reveals the teachings of the teachers of the retinue to be deviations and obscurations.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyi //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig / 'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyi //
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!🔽The three teachings of the three teachers of the retinue

original: bstan pa gsum ni gol sgrib ste //
analyzed: bstan pa gsum ni gol sgrib ste //
translated: are three teachings that are deviations and obscurations.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: What are they?

original: nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug /
analyzed: nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug /
translated: The six spiritual approaches that bring about a definitive state

original: rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan //
translated: are shown to be deviations from the Great Perfection.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: What are they?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde ni //
translated: The sūtras of the bodhisattvas

original: kun tu 'od kyi sa 'dod pa //
analyzed: kun tu 'od kyi sa 'dod pa //
translated: are for those who desire the bhūmi of universal illumination.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi rtogs dpyod kyis //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi rtogs dpyod kyis //
translated: Through the analysis of the two truths,

original: chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar 'dod //
analyzed: chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar 'dod //
translated: they assert the emptiness of dharmatā to be space.

original: aa ti yo ga'i bde chen ni //
analyzed: aa ti yo ga'i bde chen ni //
translated: The great bliss of atiyoga

original: rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: is bodhicitta that is beyond analysis.

original: rtog @62b dpyod 'das la mdo sdes bsgribs //
analyzed: rtog @62b dpyod 'das la mdo sdes bsgribs //
translated: Since it is beyond analysis, it is obscured by the sūtras.

original: rdzogs chen rtog dang dpyod pa ni //
analyzed: rdzogs chen rtog dang dpyod pa ni //
translated: The Great Perfection’s analysis and investigation

original: mdo sde dag tu gol bar bshad //
analyzed: mdo sde dag tu gol bar bshad //
translated: is explained as a deviation in the sūtras.

original: kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa //
analyzed: kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa //
translated: The desire of the vajra holders of the kriyā

original: dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas //
analyzed: dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas //
translated: is to enter through the door of the three purities

original: gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas //
translated: and abide in the pure field of percepts and perceivers.

original: aa ti yo ga'i bde chen ni //
analyzed: aa ti yo ga'i bde chen ni //
translated: The great bliss of atiyoga

original: gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: is bodhicitta that is beyond percepts and perceivers.

original: gzung 'dzin 'das la kri yas bsgribs //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin 'das la kri yas bsgribs //
translated: Since it is beyond percepts and perceivers, it is obscured by the kriyā.

original: rdzogs chen gzung dang 'dzin byed pa //
analyzed: rdzogs chen gzung dang 'dzin byed pa //
translated: The Great Perfection’s percepts and perceivers

original: kri ya dag tu gol bar bshad //
analyzed: kri ya dag tu gol bar bshad //
translated: is explained as a deviation in the kriyā.

original: au pa ya yi lta spyod ni //
analyzed: au pa ya yi lta spyod ni //
translated: The view and conduct of the upa

original: kri ya spyod cing yo ga sgrub //

original: bde chen ni //

Effort🔽

analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi //

analyzed: chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la //

analyzed: byang chub sems las byung ba yi //

analyzed: chos nyid mngon du phyung ba yi //

original: rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de //

analyzed: rang gi rkyen gyis dor mi btub //

original: mi btub dor bar byed pas 'khor //
analyzed: mi btub dor bar byed pas 'khor //

original: byang chub sems las byung ba yi //
analyzed: byang chub sems las byung ba yi //

original: mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de //
analyzed: mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de //

original: de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las //

analyzed: chos nyid yul ni lnga snang ste //

analyzed: sku gsung thugs su gdod sgrub byed //

analyzed: ye nas yin la sgrub byed pas //

analyzed: byang chub sems spangs pha rol na //

original: rang 'byung ye shes ye nas med //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes ye nas med //

original: 'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol na //
analyzed: 'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol na //

original: mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba med //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba med //

original: chos can spangs pa'i pha rol na //
analyzed: chos can spangs pa'i pha rol na //

analyzed: chos nyid bya ba ye nas med // thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig / de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la //
translated: there is never any dharmata.🔽Everything is one within suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid @67a *//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid @67a *//
translated: Within suchness, which is one,

original: la bcos pas nor //
analyzed: la bcos pas nor //
translated: suchness is obscured by fabrication.

original: de ni ma nor ba yi ming //
analyzed: de ni ma nor ba yi ming //
translated: That is the name of what is unerring.

original: bzhin ni bcos su med pa'i don //
analyzed: bzhin ni bcos su med pa'i don //
translated: Suchness means that the meaning is unfabricated.

original: nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid bstan //
analyzed: nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid bstan //

original: de bzhin nyid la 'chos ma byed; ;de bzhin nyid la 'chos byed pa //🔽byang chub sems la su 'chos pa //🔽des ni 'khor ba'i snying po bsgrub //

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: will accomplish the essence of samsara.🔽CHAPTER XL

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las; byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o ////
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las; byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o ////
translated: The Nature of Bodhicitta

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nga yin pa 'di bstan to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nga yin pa 'di bstan to //
translated: Then the all-creating king, bodhicitta, revealed that the nature of all phenomena is me.

original: kye; sems dpa' dam pa rdo rje khyod //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' dam pa rdo rje khyod //
translated: O sublime spiritual warrior Vajra,

original: nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar shes par gyis //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar shes par gyis //
translated: understand that my nature is as follows:

original: nga ni ston pa'i sgron ma byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga ni ston pa'i sgron ma byang chub sems //
translated: I am the lamp of the Teacher, awakened mind,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin //
translated: the heart essence of all buddhas of the three times,

original: khams gsum sems can kun gyi pha dang ma //
analyzed: khams gsum sems can kun gyi pha dang ma //
translated: father and mother of all beings of the three realms,

original: snang srid snod bcud kun gyi rgyu yang yin //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud kun gyi rgyu yang yin //
translated: and the cause of the entire universe of appearances and possibilities.🔽There is nothing that does not come from me,

original: nga las ma byung ba ni gcig kyang med; ;nga ni mi gnas kun tu khyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nga las ma byung ba ni gcig kyang med; ;nga ni mi gnas kun tu khyab pa'i phyir //
translated: because I abide in no location but am all-pervasive.

original: nga ni ye nas dus gsum sangs rgyas yin //
analyzed: nga ni ye nas dus gsum sangs rgyas yin //
translated: I am the timeless buddhahood of the buddhas of the three times.

original: nga ni mi rtog mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nga ni mi rtog mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir //
translated: Because I abide in nonconceptual evenness,

original: rtog med mnyam nyid chos sku ye sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rtog med mnyam nyid chos sku ye sangs rgyas //
translated: dharmakaya, nonconceptual evenness, is timelessly awakened.

original: nga yi ngo bo kun tu longs spyod phyir //
analyzed: nga yi ngo bo kun tu longs spyod phyir //
translated: Because my essence is enjoyed in all ways,

original: nga nyid longs spyod rdzogs skur ye sangs rgyas //
analyzed: nga nyid longs spyod rdzogs skur ye sangs rgyas //
translated: I am timelessly awakened as sambhogakaya.

original: nga nyid rang 'byung ye shes snang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: nga nyid rang 'byung ye shes snang ba'i phyir //
translated: Because I am the light of self-originated pristine consciousness,

original: nga nyid thugs rje sprul skur @67b mngon sangs rgyas //
analyzed: nga nyid thugs rje sprul skur @67b mngon sangs rgyas //
translated: I, the nirmāṇakāya of compassion, am manifestly enlightened.

original: des na dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por bshad //
analyzed: des na dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por bshad //
translated: Therefore, I am explained to be the essence of all buddhas of the three times.

original: nga yi ye shes byang chub sems snang ba //
analyzed: nga yi ye shes byang chub sems snang ba //
translated: My pristine consciousness is the light of bodhicitta.

original: rang 'byung ye shes lnga po rgyud drug sems //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes lnga po rgyud drug sems //
