translated: The five self-originated pristine consciousnesses are the mind of the six continuums.

original: des na khams gsum sems can pha dang ma //
analyzed: des na khams gsum sems can pha dang ma //
translated: Therefore, the sentient beings of the three realms are fathers and mothers.

original: snang srid snod bcud kun gyi ngo bo yang //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud kun gyi ngo bo yang //
translated: The essence of all the world and its contents

original: nga yi ngo bor byung ba snang bas na //
analyzed: nga yi ngo bor byung ba snang bas na //
translated: appears as the essence of me.

original: nga nyid ye nas snang ba sangs rgyas yin //
analyzed: nga nyid ye nas snang ba sangs rgyas yin //
translated: Therefore, I am the primordially manifest buddha.

original: nga la gnyis med gcig tu 'dus pa chu //
analyzed: nga la gnyis med gcig tu 'dus pa chu //
translated: Water is gathered into one in me.

original: sdung par byed pa sems nyid chu yin no //
analyzed: sdung par byed pa sems nyid chu yin no //
translated: The mind itself is the water that is drunk.

original: nga ni thams cad mnyam pa drod snyom me //
analyzed: nga ni thams cad mnyam pa drod snyom me //
translated: I am the fire of the uniform equality of all.

original: kun la mnyam par gnas pas me sangs rgyas //
analyzed: kun la mnyam par gnas pas me sangs rgyas //
translated: Since I abide equally in all, I am the buddha of fire.

original: nga ni thogs med yang zhing g-yo ba yin //
analyzed: nga ni thogs med yang zhing g-yo ba yin //
translated: I am unobstructed, light, and moving.

original: thogs med g-yo bas rlung du mngon sangs rgyas //
analyzed: thogs med g-yo bas rlung du mngon sangs rgyas //
translated: Since I am unobstructed and moving, I am manifestly enlightened as air.

original: nga ni ma sgrib kun khyab gsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: nga ni ma sgrib kun khyab gsal ba'i phyir //
translated: Because I am unobstructed, all-pervading, and clear,

original: nam mkha' zhes ni ming btags sangs rgyas yin //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes ni ming btags sangs rgyas yin //
translated: I am the Buddha, designated by the name “space.”

original: nga las ma byas pa yi sangs rgyas ni //
analyzed: nga las ma byas pa yi sangs rgyas ni //
translated: There is no Buddha who has not been created by me.

original: 'byung chen srid pas bsdus pa'i chos la med //
analyzed: 'byung chen srid pas bsdus pa'i chos la med //
translated: There is no phenomenon included within the great elements and existence that does not exist.

original: 'byung lnga nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
analyzed: 'byung lnga nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
translated: The five elements are taught to be my nature.

original: gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin tshang //
analyzed: gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin tshang //
translated: The twenty-five exist in the nature of one.

original: snang bas la sdud pa chu yin te //
analyzed: snang bas la sdud pa chu yin te //
translated: Appearance is earth; gathering is water.

original: mnyam pa me la g-yo ba rlung du gsal //
analyzed: mnyam pa me la g-yo ba rlung du gsal //
translated: Equality is fire; movement is wind.

original: ma sgribs gsal bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: ma sgribs gsal bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
translated: Unimpeded clarity is the nature of space.

original: gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga tshang ba ni //
analyzed: gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga tshang ba ni //
translated: The twenty-five existing in one

original: byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan bstan //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan bstan //
translated: teaches the great qualities of bodhicitta.

original: chos la gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig /
analyzed: chos la gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig /
translated: Dharmas are nondual, one in bodhicitta.

original: gcig gis kun byas kun byed rgyal pos byas //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun @68a *//
analyzed: gcig gis kun byas kun byed rgyal pos byas // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun @68a *//
translated: One creates all; all are created by the all-creating king.

original: byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byed rgyal po las /
translated: From the Tantra of the All-Creating King, the sole unique bindu,🔽this completes the forty-first chapter:

original: ngo bo gcig pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: ngo bo gcig pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o ////
translated: the chapter on the single essence.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kho nar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kho nar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, taught that all phenomena are awakened simply within awakened mind.🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽kye; chos kyi sku ni byang chub sems //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig / kye; chos kyi sku ni byang chub sems //
translated: Listen, O great and courageous one!🔽Kye!🔽The dharmakaya is awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems las chos kyi sku //
analyzed: byang chub sems las chos kyi sku //
translated: The dharmakaya is not other than awakened mind.

original: rdul tsam sus kyang bcos pa med //
analyzed: rdul tsam sus kyang bcos pa med //
translated: Not even an atom has been fabricated by anyone.

original: des na sangs rgyas sems las med //🔽longs spyod rdzogs sku byang chub sems //
analyzed: des na sangs rgyas sems las med // longs spyod rdzogs sku byang chub sems //
translated: Therefore, buddhahood does not exist apart from mind.🔽The sambhogakaya is awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems la longs spyod sku //
analyzed: byang chub sems la longs spyod sku //
translated: The sambhogakaya is not other than awakened mind.

original: sems las byung ba'i gzugs rnams las //
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i gzugs rnams las //
translated: It is the forms that arise from mind.

original: longs spyod rdzogs las sku gzhan med //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs las sku gzhan med //
translated: The sambhogakaya is not a body that is other than that.

original: sprul pa'i sku ni byang chub sems //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku ni byang chub sems //
translated: The nirmanakaya is awakened mind.🔽The nirmanakaya is not other than awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems kyi sprul pa las //🔽'gro ba'i don mdzad gzhan na med //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi sprul pa las // 'gro ba'i don mdzad gzhan na med //
translated: It is the emanations of awakened mind.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
translated: All buddhas of the three times

original: byang chub sems las gzhan med de //
analyzed: byang chub sems las gzhan med de //
translated: are none other than awakened mind.

original: snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The buddhas of the past

original: rang sems ma bcos sngar mthong rtogs //
analyzed: rang sems ma bcos sngar mthong rtogs //
translated: The uncontrived mind is the realization seen before.

original: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //🔽ma bcos pa yi rang sems des //
analyzed: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // ma bcos pa yi rang sems des //
translated: The buddhas who are present now🔽Have realized the uncontrived mind

original: ma bcos ji bzhin rtogs gyur nas //
analyzed: ma bcos ji bzhin rtogs gyur nas //
translated: Just as it is, without contrivance,

original: da ltar 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad //
analyzed: da ltar 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad //
translated: And now they are accomplishing the benefit of beings.

original: slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The buddhas who will appear in the future🔽Will not be prophesied to contrive

original: rang 'byung sems nyid 'di la ni //🔽sngar bar 'chos par lung ma bstan //
analyzed: rang 'byung sems nyid 'di la ni // sngar bar 'chos par lung ma bstan //
translated: This self-originated mind itself.

original: da ltar ting 'dzin sems mi 'chos //
analyzed: da ltar ting 'dzin sems mi 'chos //
translated: In the present, they will not contrive the mind of samādhi.

original: ma @68b bcos lam du zhugs nas byon //
analyzed: ma @68b bcos lam du zhugs nas byon //
translated: Having entered the uncontrived path, they will come.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la //
translated: The phenomena that appear

original: byang chub sems su ma rtogs te //
analyzed: byang chub sems su ma rtogs te //
translated: Are not realized to be awakened mind.

original: bcos shing bsgrubs pas 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bcos shing bsgrubs pas 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: They will not be accomplished through contrivance and achievement.

original: ma rtogs bcos pas grub par byed //
analyzed: ma rtogs bcos pas grub par byed //
translated: Without realization, they will be contrived and accomplished.

original: bskal pa du ma'i grangs bgrangs kyang //
analyzed: bskal pa du ma'i grangs bgrangs kyang //
translated: Even if they count for many eons,

original: mi rtsol bde ba phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtsol bde ba phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: They will not encounter effortless bliss.

original: kye; sku gsum sems las ma bcos phyir //
analyzed: kye; sku gsum sems las ma bcos phyir //
translated: O! Because the three kāyas are uncontrived in the mind,

original: sku gsum ston pa'i mdo lung las //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa'i mdo lung las //
translated: In the sūtras and scriptures that teach the three kāyas,

original: 'chos par byed pa'i don 'byung ba //
analyzed: 'chos par byed pa'i don 'byung ba //
translated: The meaning of contrivance will arise.

original: de ni ston pa sku gsum yang //
analyzed: de ni ston pa sku gsum yang //
translated: The Teacher is the three buddha bodies.

original: nyid kyi ston pa rang bzhin ston pa min //
analyzed: nyid kyi ston pa rang bzhin ston pa min //
translated: The Teacher is not the teacher of the nature of things.

original: de bzhin 'chos par byed pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin 'chos par byed pa yi //
translated: In the same way, the Teacher who is the creator

original: ston pas bden tshul ji bstan yang //
analyzed: ston pas bden tshul ji bstan yang //
translated: teaches the way things are in the truth of the Buddha,

original: des lung ma yin drang lung yin //
analyzed: des lung ma yin drang lung yin //
translated: but that is not the transmission; it is the indirect transmission.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽This is the forty-second chapter, on “The Absence of Amendment,” of the Dharma treatise called “The Treatise of the🔽Bodhisattva.”

original: bcos su med pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: bcos su med pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER XLIII🔽THE PLEDGE OF THE TEACHER🔽OF ALL DHARMAS

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi ston pa nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi ston pa nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating king, Bodhichitta, made the following statement, accepting the role of teacher of all dharmas:🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: Listen, great and courageous being!

original: nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston pa ste //
analyzed: nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston pa ste //
translated: I am the teacher of all dharmas.

original: nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las ni //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las ni //
translated: From my three aspects,

original: ston pa yang ni rnam pa gsum du bstan //🔽bstan pa yang ni rnam gsum nga yis bstan //
analyzed: ston pa yang ni rnam pa gsum du bstan // bstan pa yang ni rnam gsum nga yis bstan //
translated: the three teachers are taught.🔽The three teachings are also taught by me.

original: de 'dzin 'khor tshogs gsum yang nga yis bstan //
analyzed: de 'dzin 'khor tshogs gsum yang nga yis bstan //
translated: The three assemblies of followers are also taught by me.

original: ston pa gsum yang gang dang gang zhe na //
analyzed: ston pa gsum yang gang dang gang zhe na //
translated: What are the three teachers?

original: chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa dang // chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa dang // don gyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa dang // chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa dang // don gyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pa'o //
translated: The teacher who reveals the nature of phenomena,🔽The teacher who reveals the essence of phenomena,🔽And the teacher who reveals the words and phrases of the meaning.

original: @69a *// chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ni //🔽skye ba med las byin gyis brlabs phyung ste //🔽ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: @69a *// chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ni // skye ba med las byin gyis brlabs phyung ste // ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: The teacher who reveals the nature of phenomena🔽Is the one who reveals all phenomena,🔽Which appear in various ways,

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid du ston par byed //
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid du ston par byed //
translated: As the suchness of phenomena.

original: chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa ni //
analyzed: chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa ni //
translated: The teacher who reveals the essence of phenomena🔽Is the one who reveals all phenomena,

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: Which appear in various ways,

original: ston pa nyid kyi sku ru phyung nas ni //🔽chos kyi ngo bor de las med par ston //
analyzed: ston pa nyid kyi sku ru phyung nas ni // chos kyi ngo bor de las med par ston //
translated: As being nothing other than the teacher's own body.

original: chos kyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pas ni //
analyzed: chos kyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pas ni //
translated: The teacher who reveals the words and phrases of the meaning🔽Is the one who gathers the meanings of all phenomena

original: chos rnams kun gyi don ni sgra bsdus nas //🔽ma rig mi shes khams gsum sems can la //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi don ni sgra bsdus nas // ma rig mi shes khams gsum sems can la //
translated: Into sounds and words🔽And reveals them to sentient beings in the three realms,

original: don de sgra dang tshig gis bsdebs nas ston //
analyzed: don de sgra dang tshig gis bsdebs nas ston //
translated: Who are ignorant and lack understanding.

original: des na ston pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bshad //
analyzed: des na ston pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bshad //
translated: Thus, it is explained that the nature of the teacher is revealed.

original: de 'dzin 'khor ni rnam pa gsum bstan te //
analyzed: de 'dzin 'khor ni rnam pa gsum bstan te //
translated: The retinue that holds that is explained to be of three kinds.

original: shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'khor //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'khor //
translated: The retinue of the utterly pure yoga that is beyond effort and achievement

original: sgor zhugs yid ches sangs rgyas sa la gnas //
analyzed: sgor zhugs yid ches sangs rgyas sa la gnas //
translated: Enters the door, has confidence, and abides on the stage of buddhahood.

original: rig 'dzin sa dang dang por bcu pa'i 'khor //
analyzed: rig 'dzin sa dang dang por bcu pa'i 'khor //
translated: The retinue of the tenth stage of the vidyādhara

original: ma thob nye reg bsgom pa'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: ma thob nye reg bsgom pa'i sa la gnas //
translated: Has not attained the stage of empowerment and abides on the stage of meditation.

original: sems bskyed mos pa spyod pa'i 'khor rnams ni //
analyzed: sems bskyed mos pa spyod pa'i 'khor rnams ni //
translated: The retinue of the bodhicitta of devoted conduct

original: rgyu dges 'bras bu dug 'joms sa la gnas //
analyzed: rgyu dges 'bras bu dug 'joms sa la gnas //
translated: Abides on the stage of the cause of delight and the result of overcoming poison.

original: de ni ston pa gsum gyi 'khor du bstan //
analyzed: de ni ston pa gsum gyi 'khor du bstan //
translated: That is explained to be the retinue of the three teachers.

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: O teacher, the teacher is the all-creating king.

original: ston pa gsum dang 'khor tshogs de ltar na //
analyzed: ston pa gsum dang 'khor tshogs de ltar na //
translated: Since the three teachers and the retinue are like that,

original: bstan pa rnam gsum ji ltar bstan par bgyi //
analyzed: bstan pa rnam gsum ji ltar bstan par bgyi //
translated: how are the three kinds of teachings to be taught?”

original: zhes zhus pas /
analyzed: zhes zhus pas /
translated: Then this was said:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Oh great being, listen!

original: chos kyi sku yi bstan pa de @69b bzhin nyid bstan te //
analyzed: chos kyi sku yi bstan pa de @69b bzhin nyid bstan te //
translated: The teaching of the dharmakāya is the teaching of suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid la rnam pa dbye ru med //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la rnam pa dbye ru med //
translated: Suchness cannot be differentiated.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,

original: sems kyi ngo bo yin pas de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: sems kyi ngo bo yin pas de bzhin nyid //
translated: Since it is the essence of mind, it is suchness.

original: de la gang su sgom zhing 'chos byed pa //
analyzed: de la gang su sgom zhing 'chos byed pa //
translated: Those who meditate on and fabricate anything

original: de yis chos sku bstan pa rtogs pa med //
analyzed: de yis chos sku bstan pa rtogs pa med //
translated: will not realize the teaching of the dharmakāya.

original: snang ba med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
translated: In the nonapparent dharmatā of awakening,

original: ma nor de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te //
analyzed: ma nor de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te //
translated: the unerring suchness is not realized.

original: de la gang su 'chos shing sgom byed pa;/
analyzed: de la gang su 'chos shing sgom byed pa;/
translated: Those who meditate on and fabricate anything

original: de yis rang sems bcos med de mi rig /
analyzed: de yis rang sems bcos med de mi rig /
translated: will not understand the unfabricated mind.

original: snang srid chos med byang chub sems //
analyzed: snang srid chos med byang chub sems //
translated: The phenomena of apparent existence are awakened mind.

original: sems kyi de bzhin nyid 'byung de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: sems kyi de bzhin nyid 'byung de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of mind arises as suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs so sor mthong //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs so sor mthong //
translated: Suchness is individually perceived without being realized.

original: de bzhin nyid ni dbyings nas tshol byed pa //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni dbyings nas tshol byed pa //
translated: Those who search for suchness in the dhātu

original: dug gsum rgyal bas btsal yang mi rnyed do //
analyzed: dug gsum rgyal bas btsal yang mi rnyed do //
translated: will not find it, even if the victorious ones search for it.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan pa longs spyod de //🔽longs spyod lnga ni chos nyid longs spyod gcig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan pa longs spyod de // longs spyod lnga ni chos nyid longs spyod gcig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!🔽The teaching of the enjoyment body is enjoyed🔽as the enjoyment of the five enjoyments and the single enjoyment of dharmatā.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i longs spyod lnga la ni //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i longs spyod lnga la ni //
translated: The five enjoyments of form and so on

original: gcig la'ang lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga spyod //
analyzed: gcig la'ang lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga spyod //
translated: Each of the five has five, so there are twenty-five.

original: rtsa lnga longs spyod de ni sku lnga'i tshul //
analyzed: rtsa lnga longs spyod de ni sku lnga'i tshul //
translated: The five nāḍīs are enjoyed in the manner of the five kāyas.

original: tshul ni chos nyid don gyi ngo bo nyid du bshad //🔽sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi longs spyod du //
analyzed: tshul ni chos nyid don gyi ngo bo nyid du bshad // sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi longs spyod du //
translated: The manner is explained to be the essence of the meaning of dharmatā.

original: longs sku nga yi gzugs la spyad du med //
analyzed: longs sku nga yi gzugs la spyad du med //
translated: The sambhogakāya is not enjoyed in the form of mine.

original: rig 'dzin sa bcu rnams la nga yis bstan //
analyzed: rig 'dzin sa bcu rnams la nga yis bstan //
translated: I have revealed it to the vidyādharas and the ten stages.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: sprul sku bstan pa thugs rjes don 'tsham ste //
analyzed: sprul sku bstan pa thugs rjes don 'tsham ste //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya is the teaching that is the appropriate meaning of compassion.

original: khams gsum sems can bsam pa @70a *//
analyzed: khams gsum sems can bsam pa @70a *//
translated: The thoughts of the sentient beings of the three realms

original: tha dad la //
analyzed: tha dad la //
translated: are different.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnam gsum gyis //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnam gsum gyis //
translated: With the three—body, speech, and mind—

original: bsam pa tha dad sku gsung thugs rjes bzlog /
analyzed: bsam pa tha dad sku gsung thugs rjes bzlog /
translated: the different thoughts are reversed with compassion.🔽Having reversed the clinging of the sense organs to objects,

original: dbang po yul la zhen pa de bzlog nas; ;dben pa'i yul ni gang 'thad de bstan nas //
analyzed: dbang po yul la zhen pa de bzlog nas; ;dben pa'i yul ni gang 'thad de bstan nas //
translated: having taught the isolated object that is suitable,

original: des ni nga yi thugs rje 'dren lung byed //
analyzed: des ni nga yi thugs rje 'dren lung byed //
translated: that is the guide of my compassion.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston yin phyir //
analyzed: nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston yin phyir //
translated: Because I am the teacher of all phenomena,

original: sangs rgyas la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan //
translated: I reveal my nature even in the buddhas,

original: sems can la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan //
analyzed: sems can la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan //
translated: I reveal my nature even in sentient beings.

original: rang bzhin bstan pas ston par zhal gyis bzhes //
analyzed: rang bzhin bstan pas ston par zhal gyis bzhes //
translated: By revealing my nature, I have accepted the role of teacher.

original: nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar rig par gyis //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar rig par gyis //
translated: Know that my nature is like this:

original: ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams ni //
analyzed: ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams ni //
translated: The teacher, the teaching, and the retinue

original: nga yi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan med do //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan med do //
translated: are nothing other than my three aspects.

original: ston pa rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med min //
analyzed: ston pa rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med min //
translated: The teacher is not the unceasing, self-originating pristine consciousness.

original: bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin ma bcos yin //
analyzed: bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin ma bcos yin //
translated: The teaching is my unfabricated nature.

original: de 'dzin 'khor ni nga yi ngo bos 'dzin //
analyzed: de 'dzin 'khor ni nga yi ngo bos 'dzin //
translated: The retinue that upholds that is upheld by my essence.

original: ces gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: CHAPTER 43:

original: ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o ////
translated: ACCEPTING THE ROLE OF TEACHER

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid la bya ba med pa'i don 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid la bya ba med pa'i don 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating king, awakened mind, spoke these words about the ultimate meaning of nonaction:🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Great and courageous one,

original: bya ba med pa'i don 'di ni //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i don 'di ni //
translated: this ultimate meaning of nonaction

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin te //
translated: Are the nature of me, the all-creating one.

original: nga la bya ba med pa ni //
analyzed: nga la bya ba med pa ni //
translated: I am without activity.

original: nga ni ye nas byas zin pas //
analyzed: nga ni ye nas byas zin pas //
translated: Since I am timelessly ensured,

original: bya ba med pa'i chos nyid yin //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i chos nyid yin //
translated: I am the nature of phenomena, which is not to be accomplished.

original: chos nyid nga yi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: chos nyid nga yi rang bzhin las //
translated: In the nature of phenomena, which is mine,

original: rang @70b bzhin de la bya ru med //
analyzed: rang @70b bzhin de la bya ru med //
translated: there is nothing to be done.

original: rang bzhin rang bzhin bya ba de //
analyzed: rang bzhin rang bzhin bya ba de //
translated: The nature of that nature

original: bcos su med pa'i rang bzhin yin //
analyzed: bcos su med pa'i rang bzhin yin //
translated: is a nature that cannot be contrived.

original: bcos med byang chub de la ni //🔽sems dpa' rdo rje khyod ma 'chos //
analyzed: bcos med byang chub de la ni // sems dpa' rdo rje khyod ma 'chos //
translated: In that uncontrived enlightenment,🔽you, Bodhisattva Vajra, are uncontrived.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje de 'chos na //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje de 'chos na //
translated: If you, Bodhisattva Vajra, were contrived,

original: kun byed nga la bcos pa yin //
analyzed: kun byed nga la bcos pa yin //
translated: you would be contriving me, the all-creating one.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin yin //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin yin //
translated: are the nature of me, the all-creating one.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: nga yi rang bzhin 'gyur med la //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin 'gyur med la //
translated: In my unchanging nature,

original: bsgoms na 'chos shing bsgyur ba yin //
analyzed: bsgoms na 'chos shing bsgyur ba yin //
translated: to meditate is to contrive and alter.

original: nga ni ye nas lhun grub la //
analyzed: nga ni ye nas lhun grub la //
translated: Since I am timelessly and spontaneously present,

original: bsgrubs na nga la bcos pa yin //🔽nga la bgrod pas phyin pa med //
analyzed: bsgrubs na nga la bcos pa yin // nga la bgrod pas phyin pa med //
translated: to practice is to contrive in regard to me.🔽Since there is nothing to attain in me, there is no reaching me.

original: nga la btsal bas grub pa med //
analyzed: nga la btsal bas grub pa med //
translated: Since there is nothing to seek in me, there is no accomplishment.

original: nga la sbyangs pas byang ba med //
analyzed: nga la sbyangs pas byang ba med //
translated: I am not trained in learning.

original: nga la ma lta yul med kyis //
analyzed: nga la ma lta yul med kyis //
translated: Do not look at me, for I am not an object.

original: nga la ma bsgrod lam med kyis //
analyzed: nga la ma bsgrod lam med kyis //
translated: Do not travel to me, for I am not a path.

original: nga la ma sbyongs sgrib med kyis //🔽mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul dang bral //
analyzed: nga la ma sbyongs sgrib med kyis // mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul dang bral //
translated: Do not train in me, for I am not an obscuration.🔽I am not a location, free of objectifiable reference points.

original: spros med bsam pa'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: spros med bsam pa'i yul las 'das //
translated: I am not a conceptual object, free of elaboration.

original: 'dzin pas brtags pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: 'dzin pas brtags pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: Dharmas imputed by reification

original: nga yi ngo bo bstan pa yin //
analyzed: nga yi ngo bo bstan pa yin //
translated: are shown to be my essence.

original: de la spong 'gegs su byed pa //🔽bskal pa gsum gyi bar du ni //
analyzed: de la spong 'gegs su byed pa // bskal pa gsum gyi bar du ni //
translated: Those who engage in renunciation and obstruction🔽will not meet with me, the all-creating one,

original: kun byed nga dang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: kun byed nga dang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: even in three eons.

original: spang `bar bya ba'i chos de ni //
analyzed: spang `bar bya ba'i chos de ni //
translated: The phenomena to be renounced

original: rang gi ngo bo yin par bshad //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo yin par bshad //
translated: are explained to be one’s essence.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Ah! Great and courageous one!

original: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: Bodhicitta is the all-creating monarch.

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa ni //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa ni //
translated: What is created by all-creating bodhicitta

original: byang chub sems las gzhan du byas pa med //
analyzed: byang chub sems las gzhan du byas pa med //
translated: is not created apart from bodhicitta.

original: byang chub sems ni ye nas ma nor yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni ye nas ma nor yin //
translated: Bodhicitta is timelessly unerring.

original: ye nas yin pas ye nas nor ba @71a *//
analyzed: ye nas yin pas ye nas nor ba @71a *//
translated: Since it is timeless, it is timelessly unerring.

original: med; ;nor ba med pa'i bden rdzun sgros mi 'dogs //
analyzed: med; ;nor ba med pa'i bden rdzun sgros mi 'dogs //
translated: There is no existence, and no claims are made about the truth or falsity of what is not erroneous.

original: rgyu bden 'bras bu rtsol sgrub kun las 'das //
analyzed: rgyu bden 'bras bu rtsol sgrub kun las 'das //
translated: The truth of the cause is beyond all effort and achievement.

original: byas zin rtsol sgrub 'das pa ma rig nas //
analyzed: byas zin rtsol sgrub 'das pa ma rig nas //
translated: Not knowing that what is already done is beyond effort and achievement,

original: rtsol sgrub bya byed bsgoms nas grub lta na //
analyzed: rtsol sgrub bya byed bsgoms nas grub lta na //
translated: those who meditate on effort and achievement, thinking that they will achieve something,

original: byang chub bgegs su de las che ba med //
analyzed: byang chub bgegs su de las che ba med //
translated: create obstacles to enlightenment that are greater than any other.

original: mi gnas mi rtog cir yang dgongs med pas //
analyzed: mi gnas mi rtog cir yang dgongs med pas //
translated: Since there is no abiding, no thoughts, and no frame of reference whatsoever,

original: mi rtog mnyam pa'i yul la rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: mi rtog mnyam pa'i yul la rang bzhin gnas //
translated: there is natural rest in the nonconceptual, uniform expanse.

original: ye nas byas zin rtsol ba'i sems mi 'byung //
analyzed: ye nas byas zin rtsol ba'i sems mi 'byung //
translated: Since everything is timelessly ensured, the mind that strives does not occur.

original: bde chen de la gang su gnas pa ni //
analyzed: bde chen de la gang su gnas pa ni //
translated: Whoever abides in that supreme bliss

original: chos rnams kun gyi snying por de 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi snying por de 'gyur ro //
translated: will become the heart essence of all phenomena.

original: de yis bdag gzhan kun gyi don mi byed //
analyzed: de yis bdag gzhan kun gyi don mi byed //
translated: That essence does not benefit oneself or others.

original: gcig 'dus thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po des //
analyzed: gcig 'dus thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po des //
translated: The heart essence, in which all things are included in one,

original: ma bltas dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyang gsal //
analyzed: ma bltas dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyang gsal //
translated: is not looked at, yet the minds of buddhas of the three times are clear.

original: ma sgribs sems can kun gyi sems kyang snang //
analyzed: ma sgribs sems can kun gyi sems kyang snang //
translated: It is not obscured, yet the minds of all beings are evident.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: kun byed nga yis sems can don byas zin //
analyzed: kun byed nga yis sems can don byas zin //
translated: I, the all-creating one, have ensured benefit for beings.

original: nga yi don byas gzhan gyis bya mi dgos //
analyzed: nga yi don byas gzhan gyis bya mi dgos //
translated: There is no need for others to do what I do.

original: gzhan la ltos pa'i chos ni nga lung min //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa'i chos ni nga lung min //
translated: A Dharma that depends on others is not my transmission.

original: nga la kun rdzogs ye nas byas zin rdzogs //
analyzed: nga la kun rdzogs ye nas byas zin rdzogs //
translated: Everything is perfect in me, perfect from the very beginning.

original: ye nas byas zin lta ba bsgom mi dgos //
analyzed: ye nas byas zin lta ba bsgom mi dgos //
translated: Since it is already perfect from the beginning, there is no need to meditate on the view.

original: ye nas rnam dag dam tshig srung mi dgos //
analyzed: ye nas rnam dag dam tshig srung mi dgos //
translated: Since it is already pure from the beginning, there is no need to guard samaya.

original: ye nas byang chub sa la kun gnas pas //
analyzed: ye nas byang chub sa la kun gnas pas //
translated: Since everything is already present on the stage of awakening,

original: rig 'dzin sa dang sa bcu sbyangs mi dgos //
analyzed: rig 'dzin sa dang sa bcu sbyangs mi dgos //
translated: there is no need to purify the stage of vidyādhara or the ten stages.

original: ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
translated: Since it is not sought and is spontaneously present from the beginning,

original: btsal ba'i phrin las ye nas bya mi dgos //
analyzed: btsal ba'i phrin las ye nas bya mi dgos //
translated: there is no need to engage in the activity of seeking.

original: @71b rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog pas //
analyzed: @71b rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog pas //
translated: Since self-originated pristine consciousness does not conceive of objects,

original: rig pa'i ye shes yul gyis bsal mi dgos //
analyzed: rig pa'i ye shes yul gyis bsal mi dgos //
translated: there is no need to clear the objects of pristine consciousness of vidyā.

original: bde chen chos sku sems kyis gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bde chen chos sku sems kyis gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: Since the dharmakāya of great bliss is one with the mind,

original: snga phyi dus gsum med de khyad par gcig /
analyzed: snga phyi dus gsum med de khyad par gcig /
translated: there is no past or future, only the one time.🔽Since everything is perfect, the time and place are the same for all,

original: phun sum tshogs dang dus gnas kun gcig dang // thams cad gcig phyir nga la kun rdzogs te //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs dang dus gnas kun gcig dang // thams cad gcig phyir nga la kun rdzogs te //
translated: and everything is one, everything is perfect in me.

original: rdzogs pa chen po nga la kun rdzogs pas //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po nga la kun rdzogs pas //
translated: Since everything is perfect in me, the Great Perfection,

original: lta spyod phrin las dam tshigs lam ni //
analyzed: lta spyod phrin las dam tshigs lam ni //
translated: There is no need to seek and accomplish the view, conduct, activity, and samaya paths,

original: gong bshad bzhin du btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos //
analyzed: gong bshad bzhin du btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos //
translated: As explained above.

original: de ltar ma rig rtsol sgrub byas 'gyur na //
analyzed: de ltar ma rig rtsol sgrub byas 'gyur na //
translated: If you engage in such ignorant effort and achievement,

original: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur nas //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur nas //
translated: You will contradict the meaning that is beyond causality,

original: bya med bde chen de dang mi phrad de //
analyzed: bya med bde chen de dang mi phrad de //
translated: And you will not encounter that great bliss that is free of action.

original: rtsol bsgrub nad kyis ma rig de zin 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsol bsgrub nad kyis ma rig de zin 'gyur //
translated: The illness of effort and achievement will infect your ignorance.

original: de bas rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rdzogs chen la //
analyzed: de bas rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rdzogs chen la //
translated: Therefore, since the Great Perfection, which is beyond causality,

original: skal med rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pas //
analyzed: skal med rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pas //
translated: Is not the domain of those who lack good fortune,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos la spyad par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos la spyad par bya // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: You should engage in spiritual practices that involve causality.🔽This is the forty-fourth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining that the Great Perfection is meaningless for those who lack good fortune.

original: rdzogs chen skal med don med kyi le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: rdzogs chen skal med don med kyi le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER FORTY-FIVE🔽The Transmission of the Sutra of Nonmeditation🔽for the View of the Great Perfection

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rdzogs pa chen po la lta ba bsgom med kyi mdo lung 'di bstan to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rdzogs pa chen po la lta ba bsgom med kyi mdo lung 'di bstan to //
translated: Then, the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, revealed the transmission of the sutra of nonmeditation for the view of the Great Perfection:🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po //
translated: Great and courageous one!

original: rang gi lta ba bsgom med ni //
analyzed: rang gi lta ba bsgom med ni //
translated: Your view is nonmeditation.

original: kun byed nga yin nga la bsgom du med //
analyzed: kun byed nga yin nga la bsgom du med //
translated: I am the all-creating one, and there is nothing to meditate upon in me.

original: kun byed nga ni sgom pa'i yul ma yin //
analyzed: kun byed nga ni sgom pa'i yul ma yin //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am not an object of meditation.

original: nga ni ma bcos kun la rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: nga ni ma bcos kun la rang bzhin gnas //
translated: I am uncontrived, and my nature abides in all.

original: rang bzhin gnas pa'i bsgom du med pa de //🔽nga las @72a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas pa'i bsgom du med pa de // nga las @72a *//
translated: The uncontrived nature abides in meditation.

original: byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
analyzed: byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
translated: The three teachers who have come from me🔽have said that the nature of phenomena,

original: nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la //
translated: which is revealed by me,

original: brkam chags lnga yi sdug bsngal yin zer nas //
analyzed: brkam chags lnga yi sdug bsngal yin zer nas //
translated: is the suffering of the five kinds of craving.🔽They meditate on the practice of abandoning

original: ma bcos mi 'jog brtul zhugs spong 'gengs bsgom //
analyzed: ma bcos mi 'jog brtul zhugs spong 'gengs bsgom //
translated: uncontrived and unfixed states,

original: de lung bstan par ma bcos don dang 'gal //
analyzed: de lung bstan par ma bcos don dang 'gal //
translated: but this contradicts the meaning of the uncontrived transmission.🔽The four classes of tīrthikas,

original: mu stegs sde bzhi sprul pa'i thugs rje yis //
analyzed: mu stegs sde bzhi sprul pa'i thugs rje yis //
translated: through the blessing of the compassion that emanates from me,

original: byin brlabs 'khor du bkod nas lung bstan pas //
analyzed: byin brlabs 'khor du bkod nas lung bstan pas //
translated: are placed in the retinue and receive the transmission,

original: bya bral bde ba de nyid thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bya bral bde ba de nyid thob mi 'gyur //
translated: but they will not attain the state of carefree bliss.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po //
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po //
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la //
translated: the nature of phenomena, which is revealed by me,

original: brkam chags lnga yis sdug bsngal skye zer nas //
analyzed: brkam chags lnga yis sdug bsngal skye zer nas //
translated: is said to give rise to suffering through the five kinds of craving.

original: dang po sa nas bcu bar sems dpa' la //
analyzed: dang po sa nas bcu bar sems dpa' la //
translated: From the first stage up to the tenth, the bodhisattvas

original: bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis //
analyzed: bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis //
translated: The investigation of the two kinds of reality

original: don dam med la kun rdzob yod pa ru //
analyzed: don dam med la kun rdzob yod pa ru //
translated: Is the ultimate nonexistence and the relative existence.

original: sprul pas lung bstan rtog dpyod sgom pa byed //
analyzed: sprul pas lung bstan rtog dpyod sgom pa byed //
translated: The emanations give prophecies and meditate on investigation,

original: ma bcos ji bzhin nga yi don dang 'gal //
analyzed: ma bcos ji bzhin nga yi don dang 'gal //
translated: But this is contrary to the meaning of me, the uncontrived state just as I am.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de //
analyzed: nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de //
translated: The dharmatā that is revealed from me

original: ma bcos ji bzhin pa yi chos nyid la //
analyzed: ma bcos ji bzhin pa yi chos nyid la //
translated: Is the uncontrived dharmatā just as it is.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung bstan pa //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung bstan pa //
translated: The saṃbhogakāya gives prophecies to the retinue

original: ji bzhin bcos pa med par ma rtogs te //
analyzed: ji bzhin bcos pa med par ma rtogs te //
translated: But they do not realize the uncontrived state just as it is.

original: phyi nang snod bcud dag par byin brlabs te //🔽byang chub yan lag cho ga kun sgo nas //
analyzed: phyi nang snod bcud dag par byin brlabs te // byang chub yan lag cho ga kun sgo nas //
translated: The pure world and inhabitants are consecrated,🔽And the deity of the meditation of pristine consciousness

original: bsgom pa'i ye shes lha ni snang bar byed //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i ye shes lha ni snang bar byed //
translated: Is made to appear through the rites of the branches of awakening.

original: skad cig mchod nas gshegs gsol ting 'dzin bshig /
analyzed: skad cig mchod nas gshegs gsol ting 'dzin bshig /
translated: After a moment, the deity is requested to depart, and the samādhi is destroyed.

original: yang bsgom yang bshig byis pa'i @72b 'dag khang 'dra //
analyzed: yang bsgom yang bshig byis pa'i @72b 'dag khang 'dra //
translated: Again meditating and again destroying is like a child’s sand castle.

original: ji bzhin ma bcos nga yi don dang 'gal //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma bcos nga yi don dang 'gal //
translated: This is contrary to the meaning of me, the uncontrived state just as I am.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa lung ston gyi //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa lung ston gyi //
translated: The teachers who have arisen from me teach the scriptures.

original: nga yis phyung ba'i chos nyid mngon phyung la //
analyzed: nga yis phyung ba'i chos nyid mngon phyung la //
translated: The nature of phenomena that I have revealed is revealed.

original: ting 'dzin mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas //
translated: Having entered the door of the existence and nonexistence of signs of samādhi,

original: chos nyid gcig la blang dor byas nas ni //
analyzed: chos nyid gcig la blang dor byas nas ni //
translated: having adopted and rejected the one nature of phenomena,

original: ye shes dam tshig so sor bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: ye shes dam tshig so sor bsgoms nas ni //
translated: having meditated on the individual pristine consciousness and samaya,

original: grogs po dag gis dngos grub ster re ba //
analyzed: grogs po dag gis dngos grub ster re ba //
translated: friends hope to be given spiritual powers.

original: gcig la gnyis su ltas pa'i bsgom pa nor //
analyzed: gcig la gnyis su ltas pa'i bsgom pa nor //
translated: The meditation that views one as two is lost.

original: ngo bo gcig la gnyis kyis thob pa med //
analyzed: ngo bo gcig la gnyis kyis thob pa med //
translated: There is no attainment of two in one essence.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Oh! Great being, listen!

original: nga yi rang bzhin mngon du byung ba la //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin mngon du byung ba la //
translated: In the manifestation of my nature,

original: phung po 'byung ba rnam shes dbang po la //
analyzed: phung po 'byung ba rnam shes dbang po la //
translated: the aggregates, elements, consciousnesses, and sense organs

original: rang rgyud dag pa rdo rje lhar byas te //
analyzed: rang rgyud dag pa rdo rje lhar byas te //
translated: are made into pure vajra deities.

original: bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi cho ga bsgom byas nas //
analyzed: bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi cho ga bsgom byas nas //
translated: Having meditated on the four branches of approach and accomplishment,

original: sems kyi 'phro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byed //
analyzed: sems kyi 'phro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byed //
translated: the emanation and gathering of mind make offerings to the noble ones and benefit migrating beings.

original: 'phro 'dus bsdus nas dngos grub thob 'tshal bas //
analyzed: 'phro 'dus bsdus nas dngos grub thob 'tshal bas //
translated: Thinking that spiritual powers are attained by the gathering of emanations,

original: rang gis rang gi dngos grub thob par bsgom //
analyzed: rang gis rang gi dngos grub thob par bsgom //
translated: one meditates on the attainment of one’s own spiritual powers.

original: de yang sems kyi ting 'dzin tshi chad 'gyur //
analyzed: de yang sems kyi ting 'dzin tshi chad 'gyur //
translated: Moreover, the samādhi of mind is a worn-out garment.

original: rdzogs chen lta ba bsgom du med pa ni //
analyzed: rdzogs chen lta ba bsgom du med pa ni //
translated: The view of the Great Perfection, which is not cultivated in meditation,

original: kun byed nga yi sems kyi yon tan te //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi sems kyi yon tan te //
translated: is the quality of my mind, the all-creating one.

original: byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan gyis //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan gyis //
translated: The greatness of the qualities of awakened mind

original: btsal zhing bsgrubs pa'i dka' ba spyad mi dgos //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgrubs pa'i dka' ba spyad mi dgos //
translated: do not require the hardships of searching and accomplishing.

original: rgyu rkyen med pas btsal ba'i las mi dgos //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen med pas btsal ba'i las mi dgos //
translated: Since there are no causes and conditions, there is no need for the activity of searching.

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gzhan nas bsgrub mi dgos //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gzhan nas bsgrub mi dgos //
translated: The nature of the result does not need to be accomplished elsewhere.

original: chos nyid rang yin bsgom pa bya mi dgos //🔽ma skyes pas na 'jig @73a *//
analyzed: chos nyid rang yin bsgom pa bya mi dgos // ma skyes pas na 'jig @73a *//
translated: Since it is the nature of phenomena itself, there is no need to cultivate meditation.

original: pa'i gnyen po med //
analyzed: pa'i gnyen po med //
translated: Since it is unborn, there is no antidote to destruction.

original: gzhan la ma ltos bsgom gnas tshol mi byed //
analyzed: gzhan la ma ltos bsgom gnas tshol mi byed //
translated: Since it does not depend on anything else, do not search for a place to meditate.

original: nga la gang zhig sgom par byed pa des //
analyzed: nga la gang zhig sgom par byed pa des //
translated: Those who meditate on me

original: bsgom pa nyid kyis nga dang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgom pa nyid kyis nga dang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: will not meet me through meditation.

original: chos nyid mngon du phyung bang yin pas //
analyzed: chos nyid mngon du phyung bang yin pas //
translated: Since the nature of phenomena is revealed,

original: sdug bsngal mi skye rnam par spang mi dgos //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mi skye rnam par spang mi dgos //
translated: suffering does not arise and need not be abandoned.

original: rang 'byung yin pas skye 'jig med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang 'byung yin pas skye 'jig med pa'i phyir //
translated: Since it is self-originated, it is neither born nor destroyed.

original: ma rig rten 'brel dbang po dgag mi dgos //
analyzed: ma rig rten 'brel dbang po dgag mi dgos //
translated: There is no need to block the sense faculties of ignorance and dependent origination.

original: rang 'byung rnam dag chos nyid sbyang mi dgos //
analyzed: rang 'byung rnam dag chos nyid sbyang mi dgos //
translated: The pure, self-originated dharmatā does not need to be purified.

original: ye nas dag pas gtsang sbra bya mi dgos //
analyzed: ye nas dag pas gtsang sbra bya mi dgos //
translated: Since it is pure from the beginning, there is no need to purify it.

original: ye nas lhun grub rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos //
analyzed: ye nas lhun grub rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos //
translated: Since it is spontaneously present from the beginning, there is no need to strive.

original: bltas pas ma dag pa yi chos med de //
analyzed: bltas pas ma dag pa yi chos med de //
translated: There is no impure phenomenon that can be seen.

original: de bzhin nyid dang rnam snang kun tu bzang //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang rnam snang kun tu bzang //
translated: Suchness, Vairocana, and Samantabhadra

original: dbang po drug la snang ba'i chos rnams kyang //
analyzed: dbang po drug la snang ba'i chos rnams kyang //
translated: The phenomena that appear to the six sense faculties

original: ye nas de yin de las gzhan ma med //
analyzed: ye nas de yin de las gzhan ma med //
translated: are always that and nothing else.

original: de la gang zhig sgom dang sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: de la gang zhig sgom dang sgrub byed pa //
translated: Whoever meditates and practices

original: de ni mdongs pas nam mkha' snyeg pa 'dra //
analyzed: de ni mdongs pas nam mkha' snyeg pa 'dra //
translated: is like a blind person reaching for the sky.

original: nga yi rang bzhin spyod yul kun las 'das //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin spyod yul kun las 'das //
translated: My nature is beyond all objects.

original: nga yis mngon du phyung ba'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: nga yis mngon du phyung ba'i chos rnams ni //
translated: The phenomena that I have revealed

original: nga yi ngo bo kun gyis mthong bya'i phyir //
analyzed: nga yi ngo bo kun gyis mthong bya'i phyir //
translated: are for all to see my essence.

original: sna tshogs dbang po nga la bstan pa yin //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang po nga la bstan pa yin //
translated: The various sense organs are shown to me.

original: de la nga yi rang bzhin kun rtogs shig /
analyzed: de la nga yi rang bzhin kun rtogs shig /
translated: Understand my nature in that way.

original: de la nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong na; ;kun byed nga yi theg pa bstan mi bya //
analyzed: de la nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong na; ;kun byed nga yi theg pa bstan mi bya //
translated: they should not be taught my vehicle, the all-creating one.🔽Those who are unfortunate and do not have the fortune

original: rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang skal med pas //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang skal med pas //
translated: to understand the meaning of the Great Perfection

original: rgyu 'bras theg pa drang ba'i lung la gzung //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras theg pa drang ba'i lung la gzung //
translated: should rely on the scriptures that guide them in the vehicles of cause and effect.🔽Since I, who am primordially beyond the realm of experience,

original: nga ni ye nas spyod yul 'das pa @73b 'di; ;rgyu 'bras dga' ba'i skal ba med rnams la //
analyzed: nga ni ye nas spyod yul 'das pa @73b 'di; ;rgyu 'bras dga' ba'i skal ba med rnams la //
translated: have been taught to those who do not have the fortune to delight in cause and effect,

original: bstan na sgro dang skur pa 'ong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bstan na sgro dang skur pa 'ong ba'i phyir //
translated: there are exaggerations and denials.

original: bstan na rang gi sems la skur btab pas //
analyzed: bstan na rang gi sems la skur btab pas //
translated: If I am taught, my mind is denigrated.

original: drug tu skye zhing gtan du 'khor bar 'khyam //
analyzed: drug tu skye zhing gtan du 'khor bar 'khyam //
translated: One will be born into the six realms and wander in samsara forever.

original: kye / sems dpa' chen po nga don rtogs //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' chen po nga don rtogs //
translated: O great spiritual warrior, understand my meaning!

original: nga ni spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nga ni spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir //
translated: Since I am beyond all realms of experience,

original: tshig gis mi phebs dbang po'i spyod yul 'das //
analyzed: tshig gis mi phebs dbang po'i spyod yul 'das //
translated: I cannot be reached with words and am beyond the realm of the senses.

original: nga yi rang bzhin bsdus te thig ler gnas //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin bsdus te thig ler gnas //
translated: My nature is gathered into the bindu and abides.

original: ma spros gnyis med ye nas gcig tu bstan //🔽dam tshig bsrung ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos //
analyzed: ma spros gnyis med ye nas gcig tu bstan // dam tshig bsrung ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos //
translated: I am taught to be originally one, unelaborate, and nondual.🔽There is no need to meditate on the samaya to be guarded.

original: phrin las btsal ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos //
analyzed: phrin las btsal ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos //
translated: There is no need to meditate on the activity to be pursued.

original: lam la mi bgrod la mi sbyong ste //
analyzed: lam la mi bgrod la mi sbyong ste //
translated: Do not travel on a path or train on it.

original: rang las gzhan du chos nyid tshol mi byed //
analyzed: rang las gzhan du chos nyid tshol mi byed //
translated: Do not seek dharmatā apart from yourself.

original: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i dogs pa med //
analyzed: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i dogs pa med //
translated: Since it is unborn, there is no fear of destruction.🔽Since I am not apparent, I am free from meditating on an object.

original: nga mi snang bas dmigs pa bsgom dang 'bras 'das pas rtsol dang sgrub mi byed //
analyzed: nga mi snang bas dmigs pa bsgom dang 'bras 'das pas rtsol dang sgrub mi byed //
translated: Since I transcend results, I do not strive or accomplish.

original: ma byung bas na dngos po sgom mi byed //
analyzed: ma byung bas na dngos po sgom mi byed //
translated: Since I do not occur, I do not meditate on entities.

original: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i dogs pa med //🔽nga mi snang bas dmigs pa bsgom dang bral; ;bde chen bdal ba'i klong dkyil na //
analyzed: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i dogs pa med // nga mi snang bas dmigs pa bsgom dang bral; ;bde chen bdal ba'i klong dkyil na //
translated: Since I am unborn, there is no fear of destruction.🔽Since I am not apparent, I am free from meditating on an object.🔽The nature of nonconceptual evenness

original: mi rtog mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gnas //
analyzed: mi rtog mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gnas //
translated: resides in the middle of the expanse of the display of great bliss.

original: chos nyid snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: chos nyid snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of the appearance of dharmatā,

original: rig pas mi rtog ting 'dzin ma byed cig /
analyzed: rig pas mi rtog ting 'dzin ma byed cig /
translated: do not conceptualize with vidyā; do not meditate in samādhi.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: bsgoms na gang bsgom nga yi nad yin gyi //
analyzed: bsgoms na gang bsgom nga yi nad yin gyi //
translated: if you meditate, whatever you meditate on is a disease of mine.

original: kun gyi snying po byang chub sems yin na //
analyzed: kun gyi snying po byang chub sems yin na //
translated: If the essence of all is bodhicitta,

original: byang chub sems ni gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir //🔽bsgom par @74a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems ni gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir // bsgom par @74a *//
translated: since bodhicitta is free from apprehender and apprehended,🔽there is not even an atom

original: bya ba rdul tsam yod ma yin //
analyzed: bya ba rdul tsam yod ma yin //
translated: of meditation to be performed.

original: gong bshad bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma thob bzhin //
analyzed: gong bshad bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma thob bzhin //
translated: If you do not attain the result through meditation, as I have explained above,

original: nga yang bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma thob par lung mi ston //
analyzed: nga yang bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma thob par lung mi ston //
translated: I will not give teachings that the result is not attained through meditation.

original: kye; sems dpa' chen po nga la ltos //
analyzed: kye; sems dpa' chen po nga la ltos //
translated: “O great and courageous one, look at me!

original: nga ni kun byed byang chub sems yin te //
analyzed: nga ni kun byed byang chub sems yin te //
translated: I am the all-creating mind of awakening.

original: kun byed byas pas kun byas nyid du byas //
analyzed: kun byed byas pas kun byas nyid du byas //
translated: Since the all-creating one creates everything, everything is created.

original: kun ni ma lus pa yi sgrar bshad de //
analyzed: kun ni ma lus pa yi sgrar bshad de //
translated: The word all is explained to be all without exception.

original: byed pa'i snying po de yis thams  cad byed //
analyzed: byed pa'i snying po de yis thams  cad byed //
translated: The essence of creation creates everything.

original: byang ba gzung du yod pa ma yin la //
analyzed: byang ba gzung du yod pa ma yin la //
translated: Awakening is not something that can be apprehended.

original: chub pa kun gyi snying pos snying por chub //
analyzed: chub pa kun gyi snying pos snying por chub //
translated: Being fully awakened, the essence of everything is fully awakened.

original: sems ni rang 'byung ye shes kun tu sems //🔽zhes gsungs so; ;byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: sems ni rang 'byung ye shes kun tu sems // zhes gsungs so; ;byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: The mind is the all-creating self-originated gnosis.”

original: lta ba bsgom med kyi le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: lta ba bsgom med kyi le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o ////
translated: This completes the forty-fifth chapter of The All-Creating Mind, the King, on the view that is not cultivated in meditation.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po des rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig bsrung du med pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po des rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig bsrung du med pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating king, the mind of awakening, spoke this chapter on the Great Perfection, the Great Perfection’s commitment that is not to be guarded:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: rdzogs chen dam tshig bsrung du med bstan pa //
analyzed: rdzogs chen dam tshig bsrung du med bstan pa //
translated: The Great Perfection’s “samaya” is taught to be nothing to be guarded.

original: kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of all-creating mind is

original: ma skyes spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: ma skyes spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: unborn and free of elaboration.

original: skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs yul byung nas //
analyzed: skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs yul byung nas //
translated: The various magical displays of birth arise as objects,🔽and those objects are said to be its nature.

original: yul de rang gi rang bzhin yin zhes byas; ;de la mi rtog rtog pa'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: yul de rang gi rang bzhin yin zhes byas; ;de la mi rtog rtog pa'i yul las 'das //
translated: It is not conceptual, for it transcends being an object of thought.

original: yul la mi 'dzin spong dang len med pas //
analyzed: yul la mi 'dzin spong dang len med pas //
translated: It does not grasp at objects, for it is free of rejection and acceptance.

original: med pa phyal ba gcig pu lhun grub ste //
analyzed: med pa phyal ba gcig pu lhun grub ste //
translated: It is a single state of openness, ineffable and spontaneously present.

original: bsrung bar bya ba'i sdom khrims @74b kun dang bral //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya ba'i sdom khrims @74b kun dang bral //
translated: It is free of all vows and ethical conduct to be observed.

original: bsrung med nga las byung ba'i ston gsum gyis //🔽mu stegs sde bzhi thugs rjes byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: bsrung med nga las byung ba'i ston gsum gyis // mu stegs sde bzhi thugs rjes byin brlabs nas //
translated: The three teachers who emerge from me, who am without anything to be guarded,🔽bless with compassion the four tīrthika groups🔽and give them the transmission of the vinaya.

original: 'dul ba phog pa'i 'khor ni sde bzhi la //
analyzed: 'dul ba phog pa'i 'khor ni sde bzhi la //
translated: The four groups of disciples

original: bsrung bar bya ba'i khrims ni 'di lta ste //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya ba'i khrims ni 'di lta ste //
translated: have the following ethical conduct to observe:

original: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bsrung bar grangs //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bsrung bar grangs //
translated: the main points and the branches.

original: nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga brgya lnga bcu khrims //
analyzed: nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga brgya lnga bcu khrims //
translated: The five hundred, five hundred, and ten thousand precepts

original: bsrung ba'i dus na grangs dang don mi shes //
analyzed: bsrung ba'i dus na grangs dang don mi shes //
translated: Are not known in terms of number or meaning when they are being guarded.

original: des na sdom pa mi thub bsrung thabs med //
analyzed: des na sdom pa mi thub bsrung thabs med //
translated: Therefore, there is no way to guard the vows that cannot be observed.

original: rdzogs chen ci spyod rtog pa kun las 'das //
analyzed: rdzogs chen ci spyod rtog pa kun las 'das //
translated: In the Great Perfection, whatever is done is beyond all concepts.

original: sdom pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas grangs mang ba //
analyzed: sdom pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas grangs mang ba //
translated: The ocean of vows is limitless and has many enumerations.

original: lus ngag yid la bsdus pa rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: lus ngag yid la bsdus pa rnam pa gsum //
translated: They are summarized in three: body, speech, and mind.

original: dbang po yul las sdug bsngal byung nas ni //
analyzed: dbang po yul las sdug bsngal byung nas ni //
translated: When suffering arises from the objects of the sense faculties,

original: lus kyi 'gro 'dug gom pa bor sa med //
analyzed: lus kyi 'gro 'dug gom pa bor sa med //
translated: There is no place to put down the body’s going and staying.

original: ngag gis tshig brjod don gyis bden par dka'//
analyzed: ngag gis tshig brjod don gyis bden par dka'//
translated: It is difficult for the speech’s verbal expressions to be true in meaning.

original: yid kyis bsam pa bden pa kun las 'gal //
analyzed: yid kyis bsam pa bden pa kun las 'gal //
translated: The mind’s thoughts are contrary to all truths.

original: ma nor bsam pa kun kyang bsgrub du med //
analyzed: ma nor bsam pa kun kyang bsgrub du med //
translated: Not a single unmistaken thought can be accomplished.

original: lus ngag sdom pa rgya mdud dam po des //
analyzed: lus ngag sdom pa rgya mdud dam po des //
translated: The tight knot of the vows of body and speech

original: bden nyid don dang phrad pa shin du dka'//
analyzed: bden nyid don dang phrad pa shin du dka'//
translated: Makes it very difficult to encounter the meaning of truth.

original: bsrung med nyams pa med dang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsrung med nyams pa med dang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: One will not encounter the absence of protection and the absence of downfall.

original: bsrung med nyams pa med pa kun byed lung //
analyzed: bsrung med nyams pa med pa kun byed lung //
translated: The absence of protection and the absence of downfall is the all-creating mind.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pas lung phog pa //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pas lung phog pa //
translated: The teachers who have come from me give prophecies.

original: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshig bzang sgo nas //
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshig bzang sgo nas //
translated: Through the auspicious conjunctions of planets and stars,

original: phyi nang gtsang ma'i khrus kyis dag byas te //
analyzed: phyi nang gtsang ma'i khrus kyis dag byas te //
translated: Having been purified by outer and inner pure ablutions,

original: sngom pa tshul khrims 'gro don zhal 'ches pa //🔽gang yang dam bcas tshul bzhin mi 'grub ste //
analyzed: sngom pa tshul khrims 'gro don zhal 'ches pa // gang yang dam bcas tshul bzhin mi 'grub ste //
translated: The vows, the ethics, and the promise to benefit migrating beings🔽Are not accomplished in accordance with the promise.

original: dam bcas ma grub @75a *//
analyzed: dam bcas ma grub @75a *//
translated: If the promise is not accomplished,

original: bshags pas sems mi 'dag /
analyzed: bshags pas sems mi 'dag /
translated: Confession does not purify the mind.

original: bsrung med nga dang yun du thag ring nyams //
analyzed: bsrung med nga dang yun du thag ring nyams //
translated: Far from me, who has nothing to protect, is the practice.

original: kye; rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig ni //
analyzed: kye; rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig ni //
translated: The samaya of the three secret vajras

original: rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag lnga rnams te //
analyzed: rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag lnga rnams te //
translated: Is the three roots and the five branches.

original: rtsa ba gsum ni sku gsung thugs 'dus te //
analyzed: rtsa ba gsum ni sku gsung thugs 'dus te //
translated: The three roots are the body, speech, and mind.

original: sku ni lnga yi skur bsgoms lus kyang 'ching //
analyzed: sku ni lnga yi skur bsgoms lus kyang 'ching //
translated: The body is the body of the five buddhas, and the body is also bound.

original: ngag ni 'dzab dang ting 'dzin zhi ba min //
analyzed: ngag ni 'dzab dang ting 'dzin zhi ba min //
translated: Speech is not the peace of jaṃbha and samādhi.

original: yid kyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'dus bzung nas ni //
analyzed: yid kyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'dus bzung nas ni //
translated: Having grasped the mind’s samādhi of emanating and gathering,

original: rtsa ba mi rtog dam tshig bde dang bral //
analyzed: rtsa ba mi rtog dam tshig bde dang bral //
translated: The root is nonconceptual, free from the bliss of samaya.

original: yan lag rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste //
analyzed: yan lag rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste //
translated: The five branches are as follows:🔽The five branches are the five families.

original: dang por shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
analyzed: dang por shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
translated: First, the samaya to be understood is as follows:

original: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba rnam pa lnga //
translated: The five aggregates and the five elements,

original: rnam shes dbang po yul la sogs pa rnams //
analyzed: rnam shes dbang po yul la sogs pa rnams //
translated: The consciousnesses, the faculties, the objects, and so on,

original: lha dang dkyil 'khor rang bzhin shes par bya //
analyzed: lha dang dkyil 'khor rang bzhin shes par bya //
translated: Are to be understood as the nature of the deity and the maṇḍala.

original: shes bya shes byed med pa des ma mthong //
analyzed: shes bya shes byed med pa des ma mthong //
translated: Since there is neither something to be known nor a knower, that is not seen.

original: spyad par bya pa'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
analyzed: spyad par bya pa'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
translated: The five samayas to be practiced are as follows:🔽Sexual union, theft, taking what is not given,🔽Immorality, and lying—

original: sta na ga na ma byin blangs pa dang // mi tshangs spyod dang brdzun du smra ba dang // rnam pa lnga ni thabs mkhas spyod byed pa //
analyzed: sta na ga na ma byin blangs pa dang // mi tshangs spyod dang brdzun du smra ba dang // rnam pa lnga ni thabs mkhas spyod byed pa //
translated: The five are to be practiced with skillful means.

original: ma spyod nyams mthong rtog dang bcas nas spyod //
analyzed: ma spyod nyams mthong rtog dang bcas nas spyod //
translated: If one sees that one has not practiced, one practices with concepts.

original: de yang mi rtog mnyam dang bral ba yin //
analyzed: de yang mi rtog mnyam dang bral ba yin //
translated: Moreover, that is free from nonconceptuality and equipoise.

original: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
analyzed: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
translated: The five samayas to be adopted are as follows:

original: dri chen dri chu la sogs dam rdzas lngas //🔽rgyal ba'i sku lnga 'di las 'grub zer nas //🔽dpa' bo 'bru lngas 'phro 'du byas nas ni //
analyzed: dri chen dri chu la sogs dam rdzas lngas // rgyal ba'i sku lnga 'di las 'grub zer nas // dpa' bo 'bru lngas 'phro 'du byas nas ni //
translated: The five samaya substances, such as feces and urine,🔽Are said to accomplish the five kāyas of the victors.🔽Having emanated and reabsorbed the five seed syllables of the heroes,

original: rgyal ba'i sku lnga dang du len byed pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku lnga dang du len byed pa //
translated: The five kāyas of the victors are adopted.

original: dang du ma blang sku lnga mi grub rtog /
analyzed: dang du ma blang sku lnga mi grub rtog /
translated: If one does not accept them, the five buddha bodies are not accomplished.🔽The nonaccomplishment of the nonconceptual state free from acceptance and rejection

original: blang dor bral ba'i rtog 'das de ma @75b grub; ;mi spang ba yi dam rdzas rnam lnga ni //
analyzed: blang dor bral ba'i rtog 'das de ma @75b grub; ;mi spang ba yi dam rdzas rnam lnga ni //
translated: The five pledge substances that are not to be abandoned

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs dug lnga po //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs dug lnga po //
translated: Are the five poisons of desire, hatred, and so forth.

original: gsang ba rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po ru //
analyzed: gsang ba rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po ru //
translated: In the great pledge of the secret vajra,

original: nyon mongs lnga bsgyur ye shes rnam pa lngar //
analyzed: nyon mongs lnga bsgyur ye shes rnam pa lngar //
translated: The five afflictions are transformed into the five aspects of timeless awareness.

original: dug lnga mi spong ye shes rnam lngar len //
analyzed: dug lnga mi spong ye shes rnam lngar len //
translated: The five poisons are not abandoned, but accepted as the five aspects of timeless awareness.

original: blang dor med pa'i bde ba des ma grub //
analyzed: blang dor med pa'i bde ba des ma grub //
translated: The nonaccomplishment of bliss free from acceptance and rejection.

original: grub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
analyzed: grub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
translated: The five pledges that are to be accomplished

original: bung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga rnam dang // rnam shes yul rnams dkyil 'khor grub byed pa //
analyzed: bung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga rnam dang // rnam shes yul rnams dkyil 'khor grub byed pa //
translated: Are the five aggregates, the five elements, the five sense objects, and the five sense consciousnesses, which are to be accomplished as the mandala.

original: ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga lnga rdzogs nas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga lnga rdzogs nas //
translated: Once the three meditative absorptions and the five rites are complete,

original: rgyal ba'i rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor grub byed pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor grub byed pa //
translated: The mandala of the five buddha families is accomplished.

original: ting 'dzin cho ga lnga yis sems rtsol byed //
analyzed: ting 'dzin cho ga lnga yis sems rtsol byed //
translated: The mind is activated by the five rites of meditative absorption.

original: mi rtog ma btsal lhun gyis grub dang 'gal //
analyzed: mi rtog ma btsal lhun gyis grub dang 'gal //
translated: This contradicts the effortless, spontaneous accomplishment of nonconceptuality.

original: bsgom pa'i sku ni mi rtog 'ja' tshon 'dra //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i sku ni mi rtog 'ja' tshon 'dra //
translated: The body of meditation is like a rainbow without thought.

original: cho ga bzlas brjod 'dzab kyang rtsi sgra 'dra //
analyzed: cho ga bzlas brjod 'dzab kyang rtsi sgra 'dra //
translated: Ritual, recitation, and mantra repetition are like the sound of an echo.🔽Accomplishment is not spontaneously present through the conduct of effort and achievement.

original: rtsol sgrub spyod pas lhun gyis grub mi 'gyur; ;med par bsgrub pas shin tu grub pa med //
analyzed: rtsol sgrub spyod pas lhun gyis grub mi 'gyur; ;med par bsgrub pas shin tu grub pa med //
translated: Since there is nothing to accomplish, there is no accomplishment.

original: kun byed nga la bsrung ba'i dam tshig med //🔽rgyu rkyen med pas rtsol zhing bsgrub mi dgos //
analyzed: kun byed nga la bsrung ba'i dam tshig med // rgyu rkyen med pas rtsol zhing bsgrub mi dgos //
translated: I, the all-creating one, have no samaya to protect.🔽Since there are no causes or conditions, there is no need to make effort or achieve.

original: lhun gyis grub pas spyad par bya mi dgos //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pas spyad par bya mi dgos //
translated: Since it is spontaneously present, there is no need to practice.

original: ye shes yin pas shes par bya mi dgos //
analyzed: ye shes yin pas shes par bya mi dgos //
translated: Since it is pristine consciousness, there is no need to know it.

original: rang 'byung yin pas rgyu dang rkyen mi dgos //
analyzed: rang 'byung yin pas rgyu dang rkyen mi dgos //
translated: Since it is self-originated, there is no need for causes and conditions.

original: bzang ngan med pas blang dor bya mi dgos //
analyzed: bzang ngan med pas blang dor bya mi dgos //
translated: Since there is no good or bad, there is no need to accept or reject.

original: dngos po med pas med pa zhes su bshad //
analyzed: dngos po med pas med pa zhes su bshad //
translated: Since it is not an entity, it is explained as “nonexistent.”

original: dngos su mi spyod ye shes ma 'gags pas //
analyzed: dngos su mi spyod ye shes ma 'gags pas //
translated: Since pristine consciousness is unceasing, it does not actually engage.

original: de la phyag ba zhes su btags pa yin //
analyzed: de la phyag ba zhes su btags pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is designated as “prostration.”

original: sems su kun gcig gcig pur btags pa yin //🔽ji ltar snang ba'i @76a *//
analyzed: sems su kun gcig gcig pur btags pa yin // ji ltar snang ba'i @76a *//
translated: Since everything is one in the mind, it is designated as “one.”

original: chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,🔽are the same in the mind.

original: yid ches byang chub sems su rdzogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yid ches byang chub sems su rdzogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because confidence is perfected in the mind of enlightenment,

original: lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes su nga yi bshad //
analyzed: lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes su nga yi bshad //
translated: I explain it as “perfected spontaneously.”

original: tsha grang bkres skom /
analyzed: tsha grang bkres skom /
translated: Heat, cold, hunger, thirst,

original: blun lkugs chos nyid la //
analyzed: blun lkugs chos nyid la //
translated: stupidity, and muteness are the nature of reality.

original: sku gsum 'khor sdangs 'bros pa'i cho ga drug /
analyzed: sku gsum 'khor sdangs 'bros pa'i cho ga drug /
translated: The three kāyas are the ritual of the frightened retinue’s escape.

original: gong bshad bzhin du btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos //
analyzed: gong bshad bzhin du btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos //
translated: As explained above, there is no need to search for or accomplish it.

original: rgyu nyid rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu nyid rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the cause is self-originated gnosis,

original: las kyi rkyen gyi dbang du de mi 'gyur //
analyzed: las kyi rkyen gyi dbang du de mi 'gyur //
translated: it is not subject to the power of the conditions of karma.

original: chos nyid rang bzhin cir yang 'gyur med pas //
analyzed: chos nyid rang bzhin cir yang 'gyur med pas //
translated: Because the nature of reality does not change into anything,

original: btsal bas grub par nga yis lung ma bstan //
analyzed: btsal bas grub par nga yis lung ma bstan //
translated: I do not prophesy that it is accomplished by searching.

original: rang 'byung ye shes kun dang mtshungs med pas //
