analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes kun dang mtshungs med pas //
translated: Because self-originated gnosis is not the same as all others,

original: rgyu rkyen las kyis rang 'byung de mi 'grub //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen las kyis rang 'byung de mi 'grub //
translated: it is not accomplished by causes, conditions, or karma.

original: bden pa gnyis kyis gtan la dbab du med //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyis gtan la dbab du med //
translated: It is not confirmed by the two truths.

original: nges pa gcig la bden pa rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: nges pa gcig la bden pa rnam pa gnyis //
translated: In the one certainty, there are two truths.

original: ma nges the tshom can gyi lung de la //
analyzed: ma nges the tshom can gyi lung de la //
translated: How can the scripture of the uncertain and doubtful

original: nges pa gcig tu bstan pa ga la yod //
analyzed: nges pa gcig tu bstan pa ga la yod //
translated: be taught as the one certainty?

original: rnal 'byor gang zag chos la rlom byed ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gang zag chos la rlom byed ni //
translated: The yogic practitioner who is proud of the Dharma

original: ston gsum rgyu 'bras lung la brten smra ba //
analyzed: ston gsum rgyu 'bras lung la brten smra ba //
translated: Speaks of the three teachers, cause, effect, and scripture.

original: de la bden gnyis tshad ma bzhi yang dgos //
analyzed: de la bden gnyis tshad ma bzhi yang dgos //
translated: In that, the two truths and the four valid cognitions are necessary.

original: kun byed nga yis chos kun byas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kun byed nga yis chos kun byas pa'i phyir //
translated: Because I, the all-creating one, create all phenomena,

original: ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis mi dgos //
analyzed: ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis mi dgos //
translated: In the phenomena created by me, the two truths are unnecessary.

original: ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis dgos su //
analyzed: ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis dgos su //
translated: If the two truths were necessary in the phenomena created by me,

original: ngas byas thams cad byang chub sems su byas //
analyzed: ngas byas thams cad byang chub sems su byas //
translated: All that I create would be created as awakened mind.

original: byang chub sems la don dam kun rdzob med //🔽ces gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub sems la don dam kun rdzob med // ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: In awakened mind, there is no ultimate or relative.

original: dam tshig bsrung @76b du med pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o ////
analyzed: dam tshig bsrung @76b du med pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o ////
translated: This is the forty-sixth chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, explaining the samaya that is not to be guarded.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po la phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po la phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, spoke these words:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “Oh great and courageous one, listen!

original: kun byed nga ni rdzogs pa chen po ste //
analyzed: kun byed nga ni rdzogs pa chen po ste //
translated: I, the all-creating one, am the great perfection.

original: rdzogs pa chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the great perfection is spontaneously present,

original: phrin las ye nas btsal du med par bstan //
analyzed: phrin las ye nas btsal du med par bstan //
translated: It is shown that awakened activity is timelessly and infinitely beyond being sought.

original: phrin las btsal du yod par lung ston pa //
analyzed: phrin las btsal du yod par lung ston pa //
translated: The scriptures that prophesy that awakened activity is to be sought

original: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //🔽rang re 'khor la btsal ba'i las phog pa //🔽btsal ba'i las ni rang res so sor phog /
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis // rang re 'khor la btsal ba'i las phog pa // btsal ba'i las ni rang res so sor phog /
translated: are the teachings of the three kayas, teachers who have emerged from me.🔽They have assigned the activity of seeking to their respective retinues.🔽The activity of seeking has been assigned to each of them individually.

original: sprul pas btsal ba'i rgyu la las phog pa //
analyzed: sprul pas btsal ba'i rgyu la las phog pa //
translated: The emanations have assigned the cause of seeking to their respective retinues.🔽Once they have entered the gateway of the four immeasurables

original: lus ngag yid gsum tshad med sgor zhugs nas //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum tshad med sgor zhugs nas //
translated: with their bodies, speech, and minds,

original: lus kyi sdom pa srog gcod rku g-yem spang //
analyzed: lus kyi sdom pa srog gcod rku g-yem spang //
translated: they abandon the physical acts of killing, stealing, and sexual misconduct.

original: ngag gi sdom pa dag khyal tshig rtsub dang // brdzun dang phra ma la sogs ngag gis spang //
analyzed: ngag gi sdom pa dag khyal tshig rtsub dang // brdzun dang phra ma la sogs ngag gis spang //
translated: With their speech, they abandon lying, divisive speech, harsh speech, and idle talk.

original: yid kyis mnab sems gnod sems log lta spang //
analyzed: yid kyis mnab sems gnod sems log lta spang //
translated: With their minds, they abandon malice, harmful thoughts, and wrong views.

original: dge bcu spyod pa'i las de rgyur bkod nas //
analyzed: dge bcu spyod pa'i las de rgyur bkod nas //
translated: Having set forth the cause of engaging in the ten virtues,

original: sbyin pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin bcu las //
analyzed: sbyin pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin bcu las //
translated: they practice the ten paramitas, from generosity to discipline.

original: spyad na sa dang kun 'od thob 'dod pa //
analyzed: spyad na sa dang kun 'od thob 'dod pa //
translated: If they wish to attain the levels of The Stainless One and The Luminous One,

original: tshi chad las ni bskal pa gsum du spyod //
analyzed: tshi chad las ni bskal pa gsum du spyod //
translated: they will practice for three eons.

original: de yang kun byed nga yis lung phog min //
analyzed: de yang kun byed nga yis lung phog min //
translated: However, they have not been prophesied by me, the all-creating one.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung phog pa //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung phog pa //
translated: The sambhogakāya bestows the transmission to the retinue.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas las phog pa //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas las phog pa //
translated: The transmission of the activity is through the door of cause and result.

original: sems can ting 'dzin las ni 'di lta ste //
analyzed: sems can ting 'dzin las ni 'di lta ste //
translated: The activity of the saṃbhogakāya is as follows:

original: khrus dar gtsang sbrar phyi nang dag byas te //
analyzed: khrus dar gtsang sbrar phyi nang dag byas te //
translated: Having washed and purified the outer and inner,

original: cho 'phrul las kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
analyzed: cho 'phrul las kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
translated: having blessed with the activity of the miracle,

original: @77a *// ye shes sems dang dam tshig gnyis ltas nas //
analyzed: @77a *// ye shes sems dang dam tshig gnyis ltas nas //
translated: having seen the two—the gnosis being and the pledge being—

original: ting 'dzin las kyis mchod cing gshegs gsol byed //
analyzed: ting 'dzin las kyis mchod cing gshegs gsol byed //
translated: one should make offerings and request departure with the activity of samādhi.

original: las des mi tshe bdun du tshi chad 'gyur //🔽chos kyi sku las longs spyod skur bzhengs nas //
analyzed: las des mi tshe bdun du tshi chad 'gyur // chos kyi sku las longs spyod skur bzhengs nas //
translated: By that activity, one will be reborn seven times.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i 'khor la lung phog pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i 'khor la lung phog pa //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya is the emanation of the saṃbhogakāya.🔽The nirmāṇakāya bestows the transmission to the retinue.

original: bdag nyid chen po yin par lung bstan nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po yin par lung bstan nas //
translated: Having given the prophecy of being a great being,

original: rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams la //
analyzed: rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams la //
translated: in the maṇḍala of the pure continuum

original: kha dog rigs dang sbyar ba'i lha bsgoms nas //🔽zhi lhas zhi bar byed pa'i las byed pa //
analyzed: kha dog rigs dang sbyar ba'i lha bsgoms nas // zhi lhas zhi bar byed pa'i las byed pa //
translated: one should meditate on the deity in the color of the family.🔽The peaceful deities perform the activity of pacifying.

original: rgyas lhas rgyas par byed pa'i las byed pa //
analyzed: rgyas lhas rgyas par byed pa'i las byed pa //
translated: The increasing deities perform the activity of increasing.

original: dbang lhas dbang du sdud pa'i las kyang byed //
analyzed: dbang lhas dbang du sdud pa'i las kyang byed //
translated: The empowerment deities also perform the activity of magnetizing.

original: drag lhas stongs par byed pa'i las kyang byed //
analyzed: drag lhas stongs par byed pa'i las kyang byed //
translated: The wrathful deities also perform the activity of annihilating.

original: tshe la gnas dang phyag rgya rig 'dzin 'grub //
analyzed: tshe la gnas dang phyag rgya rig 'dzin 'grub //
translated: The siddhi of the vidyadhara who abides in life and mudra

original: phrin las rnam bzhis tshe chad grub ba med //
analyzed: phrin las rnam bzhis tshe chad grub ba med //
translated: is accomplished through the four activities.

original: mi rtsol bya med las ni de ma 'grub //
analyzed: mi rtsol bya med las ni de ma 'grub //
translated: It is not accomplished through the activity of nonexertion and nonaction.

original: rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the Great Perfection is primordially beyond cause and effect,

original: btsal zhing bsgrubs pas bya med grub pa med //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgrubs pas bya med grub pa med //
translated: it is not accomplished through the activity of nonaction by searching and accomplishing.

original: rgyu 'bras lta ba'i ston pas lung bstan pa //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras lta ba'i ston pas lung bstan pa //
translated: The teacher who views cause and effect gives predictions

original: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos la tshod btsugs nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos la tshod btsugs nas //
translated: by setting the measure on the phenomena of worldly signs.

original: rgyu las btsal nas 'bras bu grub byed pa //
analyzed: rgyu las btsal nas 'bras bu grub byed pa //
translated: After searching for the cause, the result is accomplished.

original: sems la rgyu med ye nas 'bras bu med //
analyzed: sems la rgyu med ye nas 'bras bu med //
translated: The mind has no cause and is primordially without result.

original: byang chub sems la skye ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: byang chub sems la skye ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because there is no arising in awakened mind,

original: 'jig rten skye ba'i chos la dpe blangs nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten skye ba'i chos la dpe blangs nas //
translated: taking the example of the phenomena of arising in the world,

original: skye las 'jig pa 'byung bar sgros mi gdags //
analyzed: skye las 'jig pa 'byung bar sgros mi gdags //
translated: it is said that destruction arises from arising.

original: rang 'byung rgyu 'bras 'das pa ma @77b brtags par //
analyzed: rang 'byung rgyu 'bras 'das pa ma @77b brtags par //
translated: Without examining the self-originated state beyond cause and effect,

original: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos la tshod btsugs nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos la tshod btsugs nas //
translated: The worldly, who are fixated on the phenomena of characteristics,

original: rgyu las btsal bas 'bras bu 'byung zer ba //
analyzed: rgyu las btsal bas 'bras bu 'byung zer ba //
translated: say that results arise from causes that are sought.

original: de ni rgyu 'bras theg pa drang lung yin //
analyzed: de ni rgyu 'bras theg pa drang lung yin //
translated: This is the provisional transmission of the vehicle of causes and results.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: Oh, great and courageous one, listen!

original: ye shes ye shes zhes su bstan pa ni //
analyzed: ye shes ye shes zhes su bstan pa ni //
translated: What is called “wisdom”

original: rang 'byung ye shes ma 'gags kun dang mtshungs //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes ma 'gags kun dang mtshungs //
translated: is self-originated wisdom, unceasing and equal to all.

original: rgyu las ma byung mtshungs med ye shes de //
analyzed: rgyu las ma byung mtshungs med ye shes de //
translated: That incomparable wisdom, which does not arise from causes,

original: thams cad bskyed pas gzhan nas chos 'byung med //
analyzed: thams cad bskyed pas gzhan nas chos 'byung med //
translated: generates everything, so the Dharma does not arise from elsewhere.

original: 'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos la tshod btsugs nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos la tshod btsugs nas //
translated: The worldly, who are fixated on the phenomena of causes and results,

original: btsal ba med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: btsal ba med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: will not find the result that does not arise.

original: byang chub sems ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because awakened mind is not a cause or a condition,

original: 'jig rten skye 'gag chos la tshod mi gzugs //
analyzed: 'jig rten skye 'gag chos la tshod mi gzugs //
translated: do not take the phenomena of worldly origination and cessation as a model.

original: byang chub sems ni rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas //
translated: Because awakened mind is not created by conditions,

original: 'jig rten rkyen bskyed chos la dpe ma len //
analyzed: 'jig rten rkyen bskyed chos la dpe ma len //
translated: do not take the phenomena of worldly conditions as a model.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Oh, great and courageous one,

original: che ba 'dod nas bsgom bsgrub rtsol byed pa //
analyzed: che ba 'dod nas bsgom bsgrub rtsol byed pa //
translated: if you aspire to greatness, do not strive in meditation and accomplishment.

original: bsgom bsgrub btsal bas che ba de mi 'grub //
analyzed: bsgom bsgrub btsal bas che ba de mi 'grub //
translated: The greatness that is sought through meditation and accomplishment is not accomplished.

original: che ba rang 'byung ye nas che ba yin //
analyzed: che ba rang 'byung ye nas che ba yin //
translated: Greatness is self-originated and has always been great.

original: bsgoms na sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'chos pa yin //
analyzed: bsgoms na sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'chos pa yin //
translated: If one meditates, the transcendent state of buddhahood is fabricated.

original: sangs rgyas dgongs pa gang zhig 'chos byed pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dgongs pa gang zhig 'chos byed pa //
translated: Whoever fabricates the transcendent state of buddhahood

original: de yis sangs rgyas thams cad spangs pa yin //
analyzed: de yis sangs rgyas thams cad spangs pa yin //
translated: has abandoned all buddhas.

original: de yis sangs rgyas spongs pa ma yin te //
analyzed: de yis sangs rgyas spongs pa ma yin te //
translated: That is not abandoning the buddhas;

original: de yis rang gi byang chub sems spangs pas //
analyzed: de yis rang gi byang chub sems spangs pas //
translated: it is abandoning one’s own mind of awakening.

original: rang gi rang bzhin bskal par phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin bskal par phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: One’s own nature will not be encountered for an eon.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: O great and courageous one,

original: sems kyis ting 'dzin sgom pa ma byed cig /🔽ye shes yul la @78a *//
analyzed: sems kyis ting 'dzin sgom pa ma byed cig / ye shes yul la @78a *//
translated: do not meditate on the samādhi of mind.

original: rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the object of pristine consciousness.

original: ngag gis 'dzab dang snying po bzla mi dgos //
analyzed: ngag gis 'dzab dang snying po bzla mi dgos //
translated: Do not recite the essence mantra with the voice.

original: lag gis 'dud byed phyag rgya bca' mi dgos //
analyzed: lag gis 'dud byed phyag rgya bca' mi dgos //
translated: Do not make mudras with the hands.

original: sems kyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'du las ma byed //
analyzed: sems kyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'du las ma byed //
translated: Do not engage in the emanating and gathering of the samādhi of mind.

original: dang la gnas pas g-yos med lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: dang la gnas pas g-yos med lhun gyis grub //
translated: Since one rests in the state, one is effortlessly accomplished without wavering.

original: rang bzhin gnas pas sus kyang bcos su med //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas pas sus kyang bcos su med //
translated: Since one rests in the natural state, no one can alter it.

original: ma btsal ji bzhin par gnas pa des //
analyzed: ma btsal ji bzhin par gnas pa des //
translated: Abiding just as it is, without being sought,

original: bya ba med pa las kyi mchog tu bstan //
analyzed: bya ba med pa las kyi mchog tu bstan //
translated: It is taught to be the supreme activity that is without activity.

original: don de rtogs pas las rnams mi byed de //
analyzed: don de rtogs pas las rnams mi byed de //
translated: By realizing this meaning, activities are not performed,

original: las ma byas pas de bzhin nyid du gnas //
analyzed: las ma byas pas de bzhin nyid du gnas //
translated: And by not performing activities, one abides in suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid la gang zhig su gnas pa //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gang zhig su gnas pa //
translated: Whoever abides in suchness

original: de yis ma nong ma bcos 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis ma nong ma bcos 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Will accomplish the unerring and uncontrived.

original: de ni ma nor bzhin ni ma bcos yin //🔽nyid ni ma nor ngo bo nyid la bya //🔽de bzhin nyid las sangs rgyas chos med do //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni ma nor bzhin ni ma bcos yin // nyid ni ma nor ngo bo nyid la bya // de bzhin nyid las sangs rgyas chos med do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: That is the unerring state, uncontrived.🔽“Suchness” refers to the unerring essence itself.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /🔽phrin las btsal du med pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o ////🔽de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad gzhi ma kun byed nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so //🔽kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽kun byed nga ni kun gyi byang chub sems //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /🔽phrin las btsal du med pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o ////🔽de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad gzhi ma kun byed nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so //🔽kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /🔽kun byed nga ni kun gyi byang chub sems //
translated: The buddhas’ qualities are not other than suchness.

original: byang chub sems ni chos kun gzhim ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni chos kun gzhim ste //
translated: Awakened mind is the ground of all phenomena.

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las //
translated: From my three aspects of nature, all-creating,

original: phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa kun kyang tshang //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa kun kyang tshang //
translated: all that is necessary for perfection is fulfilled.

original: rang bzhin gsum @78b ni 'di ltar shes par bya //
analyzed: rang bzhin gsum @78b ni 'di ltar shes par bya //
translated: You should understand that these three aspects are as follows:

original: skye ba med dang 'gag pa med pa dang // mi 'gag skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba gsum //
analyzed: skye ba med dang 'gag pa med pa dang // mi 'gag skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba gsum //
translated: nonarising, unceasing, and the miraculous display of unceasing arising.

original: gsum ni phun sum tshogs par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: gsum ni phun sum tshogs par bstan pa yin //
translated: These three are taught to be perfect.

original: ma skyes skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: ma skyes skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las //
translated: From the unborn nature, which is nonarising,

original: chos kyi gzhi ma bstan pa phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: chos kyi gzhi ma bstan pa phun sum tshogs //
translated: the teaching of the ground of phenomena is perfect.

original: ma bsgribs ma bkag pa yi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: ma bsgribs ma bkag pa yi rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature that is unobstructed and unrestrained,

original: ston pa gsum gyi rang bzhin phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: ston pa gsum gyi rang bzhin phun sum tshogs //
translated: the nature of the three teachers is perfect.

original: ma skyes skye ba'i cho 'phrul ngo bo las //
analyzed: ma skyes skye ba'i cho 'phrul ngo bo las //
translated: From the essence of the miraculous display of unceasing arising,

original: 'khor gyi rang bzhin rnam gsum phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: 'khor gyi rang bzhin rnam gsum phun sum tshogs //
translated: the nature of the three kinds of retinue is perfect.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid gcig pu la //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid gcig pu la //
translated: In the single nature of phenomena, which is mine,

original: nga ma 'gags pa'i ston pa rnam gsum gyis //
analyzed: nga ma 'gags pa'i ston pa rnam gsum gyis //
translated: the three aspects of my unobstructed teaching

original: skye ba'i 'phrul 'byung ba'i 'khor gsum las //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'phrul 'byung ba'i 'khor gsum las //
translated: From the three wheels of the arising of emanations.

original: nga yi chos nyid de bzhin nyid gcig la //
analyzed: nga yi chos nyid de bzhin nyid gcig la //
translated: In the suchness of my dharmatā,🔽the six bases of the method of realization

original: rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyi gzhi ma drug ;lta ba chos nyid mthong ba'i gzhi ma byed //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyi gzhi ma drug ;lta ba chos nyid mthong ba'i gzhi ma byed //
translated: are the basis of seeing the dharmatā view.

original: des ni mthong bar bya ba'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: des ni mthong bar bya ba'i thabs yin te //
translated: That is the method of seeing.

original: ma skyes dmigs par bya ba'i yul med pas //
analyzed: ma skyes dmigs par bya ba'i yul med pas //
translated: Since there is no object of observation that is nonarisen,

original: bltas pas de bzhin nyid la mthong ba med //
analyzed: bltas pas de bzhin nyid la mthong ba med //
translated: there is nothing to see in suchness by looking.

original: dam tshig rang skyon sel ba'i gzhi ma byed //
analyzed: dam tshig rang skyon sel ba'i gzhi ma byed //
translated: The basis of the self-purification of samaya

original: des ni bar chad med ba'i thabs yin te //🔽de bzhin nyid la bsrung ba'i yul med pas //
analyzed: des ni bar chad med ba'i thabs yin te // de bzhin nyid la bsrung ba'i yul med pas //
translated: is the method of being without obstacles.🔽Since there is no object of protection in suchness,

original: bsrungs pas de bzhin nyid la thub pa med //
analyzed: bsrungs pas de bzhin nyid la thub pa med //
translated: there is no suchness to be protected by guarding.

original: las ni grub par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed //
analyzed: las ni grub par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed //
translated: The basis of accomplishing karma

original: btsal bas grub par byed pa'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: btsal bas grub par byed pa'i thabs yin te //
translated: is the method of accomplishing by searching.

original: de bzhin nyid la btsal ba'i yul med pas //🔽de bzhin nyid la las kyi @79a *//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la btsal ba'i yul med pas // de bzhin nyid la las kyi @79a *//
translated: Since there is no object to search for in suchness,

original: grub pa med //
analyzed: grub pa med //
translated: there is no accomplishment of karma in suchness.🔽The basis of going by traveling on the path

original: lam gyis bgrod pas phyin pa'i gzhi ma byed //
analyzed: lam gyis bgrod pas phyin pa'i gzhi ma byed //
translated: is the method of going without traveling.

original: des ni gnas su phyin pa'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: des ni gnas su phyin pa'i thabs yin te //
translated: That is the method of arriving at the place.🔽Because there is no traversing a path to suchness,

original: de bzhin nyid la lam gyis bgrod med phyir; ;bgrod pas phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la lam gyis bgrod med phyir; ;bgrod pas phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin //
translated: Suchness is not suchness that is arrived at by traversing.

original: sa ni gnas par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed //
analyzed: sa ni gnas par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed //
translated: The stage does not serve as a basis for abiding.

original: des ni sbyang mi dgos pa'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: des ni sbyang mi dgos pa'i thabs yin te //
translated: That is the method of not needing to train.

original: de bzhin nyid la thams cad kun gnas pas //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la thams cad kun gnas pas //
translated: Because everything abides in suchness,

original: gnas par bya ba'i sa la sbyang du med //
analyzed: gnas par bya ba'i sa la sbyang du med //
translated: There is no training on the stage of abiding.

original: ye shes rtogs par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed //
analyzed: ye shes rtogs par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed //
translated: The stage does not serve as a basis for the realization of pristine consciousness.

original: des ni chos nyid rig pa'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: des ni chos nyid rig pa'i thabs yin te //
translated: That is the method of knowing dharmatā.

original: de bzhin nyid la rtogs pa'i yul med pas //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la rtogs pa'i yul med pas //
translated: Because there is no object of realization in suchness,

original: rang 'byung ye shes yul la rtog pa med //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes yul la rtog pa med //
translated: Self-originated pristine consciousness does not conceptualize an object.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: O great and courageous one, listen!

original: byang chub sems ni chos kyi gzhi yin pas //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni chos kyi gzhi yin pas //
translated: Since bodhicitta is the basis of the Dharma,

original: theg pa so so lta spyod drug drug gis //
analyzed: theg pa so so lta spyod drug drug gis //
translated: The six views and six conducts of each vehicle

original: rgyu 'bras ltos pa'i 'khor la de bstan pas //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras ltos pa'i 'khor la de bstan pas //
translated: Are explained to the retinue that depends on cause and result.

original: de re rang 'thad bsam pa re re yis //
analyzed: de re rang 'thad bsam pa re re yis //
translated: Each one is suitable for each individual’s thoughts.

original: lta spyod gzhi ma drug la btsal byas kyang //
analyzed: lta spyod gzhi ma drug la btsal byas kyang //
translated: Even if one searches for the basis of view and conduct,

original: de bzhin nyid la btsal ba'i yul med pas //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la btsal ba'i yul med pas //
translated: since there is no object to search for in suchness,

original: btsal bas de bzhin nyid la bcos pa'i phyir //
analyzed: btsal bas de bzhin nyid la bcos pa'i phyir //
translated: since suchness is fabricated by searching,

original: rang sems gzhi ma bcos med de mi phrad //
analyzed: rang sems gzhi ma bcos med de mi phrad //
translated: one does not encounter one’s own mind, the unfabricated basis.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
translated: “O great and courageous one, listen!

original: lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan pa ni //
analyzed: lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation that ‘the view is not to be cultivated’

original: chos kyi rtsa ba rang las med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: chos kyi rtsa ba rang las med pa'i phyir //
translated: is because the root of phenomena is not from oneself.

original: rang gi rang la blta ru med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang gi rang la blta ru med pa'i phyir //
translated: Since one’s own mind is not an object to be seen,

original: rang med yul ni nga yis bstan pa med //
analyzed: rang med yul ni nga yis bstan pa med //
translated: I do not teach a self-originated object.

original: des na @79b lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan //
analyzed: des na @79b lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan //
translated: Therefore, the view is explained as not to be cultivated.

original: dam tshig bsrung du med ces bstan pa ni //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrung du med ces bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation that ‘samaya is not to be guarded’

original: bsrung bas mi thub rang gi sems mi khegs //
analyzed: bsrung bas mi thub rang gi sems mi khegs //
translated: is because it cannot be guarded and one’s mind is not satisfied.

original: rang 'byung ye shes yin par bsrung du med //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes yin par bsrung du med //
translated: Since it is self-originated pristine consciousness, there is nothing to guard.🔽“O great and courageous one, listen!

original: kye; phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kye; phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation that ‘activity is not to be sought’

original: rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir //
translated: is because the Great Perfection is primordially beyond cause and effect.

original: phrin las rgyu las bsgrubs nas 'bras bur 'dod //
analyzed: phrin las rgyu las bsgrubs nas 'bras bur 'dod //
translated: Activity is accomplished from a cause and is asserted to be the result.

original: rdzogs chen 'bras bu 'dod pa med pa ni //
analyzed: rdzogs chen 'bras bu 'dod pa med pa ni //
translated: The Great Perfection, the fruition, is not something to be sought.

original: phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa yin //
analyzed: phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa yin //
translated: It is taught that there is no activity to be pursued.

original: lam la bgrod du med ces bstan pa ni //
analyzed: lam la bgrod du med ces bstan pa ni //
translated: It is taught that there is no progress to be made on a spiritual path.

original: kye; dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la //
analyzed: kye; dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la //
translated: O! Buddhas of the three times and ordinary beings of the three realms,

original: bgrod pa byang chub sems kyi lam la bgrod //
analyzed: bgrod pa byang chub sems kyi lam la bgrod //
translated: progress on the path of awakened mind, the path to enlightenment.

original: sems su sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med //
analyzed: sems su sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med //
translated: In mind, buddhas and ordinary beings are not a duality.🔽Therefore, there is no progress on a path in mind from mind.

original: des na sems kyis sems la lam bgrod med; ;sa la sbyang du med ces bstan pa ni //
analyzed: des na sems kyis sems la lam bgrod med; ;sa la sbyang du med ces bstan pa ni //
translated: It is taught that there is no ground to be refined.

original: chos dbyings byang chub sems kyis 'di la //
analyzed: chos dbyings byang chub sems kyis 'di la //
translated: In this ground of all phenomena, awakened mind,

original: sbyangs pas thob par 'dod pa rgyu 'bras can //
analyzed: sbyangs pas thob par 'dod pa rgyu 'bras can //
translated: there is attainment through refinement, and so there is causality.

original: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi sa 'di la //
analyzed: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi sa 'di la //
translated: In this ground of all phenomena, awakened mind,

original: sbyangs bcos byas grub lung ni ngas ma bstan //
analyzed: sbyangs bcos byas grub lung ni ngas ma bstan //
translated: I do not teach that there is attainment through refinement and contrivance.

original: ye shes yul la mi rtog ces bstan pa //
analyzed: ye shes yul la mi rtog ces bstan pa //
translated: It is taught that wisdom does not conceive of an object.

original: yul de ye nas rang 'byung ye shes te //
analyzed: yul de ye nas rang 'byung ye shes te //
translated: That object is timelessly and naturally occurring wisdom.

original: ye shes la ni ye shes yul ma mchis //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes la ni ye shes yul ma mchis // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Wisdom does not have an object that is wisdom.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: From The All-Creating Monarch, the mind of perfect enlightenment,
